She has long, black hair and a large similarly-coloured bow on top. Her yellow eyes are intently focused on whatever she is reading as her slender hand occassionally moves to the bag of snacks she has set out to retrieve a bite of food. You recognise her as Blake Belladonna, another new student to Beacon who is part of team RWBY. You've heard those girls are pretty good, so talking to Blake should be really useful. At your size, yelling to her isn't loud enough, and physical interaction will probably go unnoticed. Pyrrha seemed concerned- she thought you could communicate with them while Nora just thought you'd make a neat pet, talking about training and toys she would get you. Your eyes widened as-
11331.title: Pyrrha and Nora's pet?

114.content:
You swallowed down your nerves and began your trek outside. Your eyes darted around the trampling feet of students as you edged your way around,
"I think I'll just get to know the location" you stuck to the wall as much as possible, flicking out your pamphlet that you printed out back at home. You were slightly disheartened at the detail in the map. Shaking off the feeling you stepped back against the wall as students passed by, they talked about some kind of tour that perked your interest. You nervously bit your lip before putting your map away and giving chase, a tour sounded kind of interesting albeit dangerous.

Sticking to the walls, you managed to join the tour group. A student seemed to be giving the tour, a polite looking girl who you overheard as being called Pyrra. She stood out in the crowd and was quite easy to follow, her voice seemed a bit soft though, forcing you to get closer in order to hear. Luckly the majority of the tour had a wall you could hang onto, letting you stick close to the amazon woman as she gave her tour.

As you were following, the tour started to head away from the wall. Holding your breath to stop your nerves, you quickly looked around the near empty ground before running after the group. Your mind suddenly registered Pyrras movements, her blush and apologies came out as she slowly turned the tour group around. You gasped at the group of giggling girls as they walked towards you, not giving you any chance as you were pounded into the ground. The chatter muffled out your cries as the new students walked over you, sticking your flattened body to some shoes, while others mercylessly crushed you into the dirt or simply kicked you forward. Unable to yell you simply took the weight of the future hunters.

You lay in the dirt, your body flat and aching as the final girl stepped over you. A pair of brown boots slowly stomped towards your unmoving body as you tried to get out of the way.
"Oh?" A soft voice called out. You tried to turn around as harsh gloved fingers crushed your body further, "What a cute sticker, I wonder if it still sticks" Pyrrha's smiling face came into view as she fiddled with your body, not able to detect your desperate beg for attention.
114.title: Wandering

1141.content: She looks at you a little bit longer, then she moves you toward her left breast. As you get closer, you get more and more scarred with the thought of whats about to happen. She then presses you right against her boob (which is kind of sweaty from being outside and all that.) Do you stick against this amazing beauty or do you fall down her shirt into her underwear?
1141.title: Pyrra's boob

11411.content:
The overpowered amazon gently pushed you down with oddly soft fingers, her gentle smile oddly calmed you as she gazed down.
"Cute-" She spoke happily, "It's like I flattened a little person-" She chuckled to herself before retreating her hand from her warrior top. Not realizing she sealed a real person within the confounds of her clothes. "I'll add it to my sticker book later-"

The calm feeling you had when she was talking to you quickly vanished as she began to walk, her boobs jiggling softly, threatening to shake you off. The hot day quickly left a thin layer of sweat over your body, making your trip more and more uncomfortable. Thankfully, your were beginning to reform without falling into the depths of her cleavage, your paper thin body resisting the prospect of being turned into a permanent sticker in a gentle giantesses sticker book.

You had hardly made any progress as you heard an engine start up. Hyperactive chatter flooded around you as you slowly unstuck from your prison. While the noises frightened you, that didn't stop your determination.

After a few hours of reforming and crawling, you finally managed to get to the edge of her shirt. The engine sounds had vanished, only to be replaced with exciting noises. It was obvious Pyrrha had travelled somewhere. The mixture of heat, sweat and the occasional crossing and uncrossing of arms overrode your fears of a new location, your flattened body slipped out to freedom only to be taken by the wind.

The open world rushed around you as you recognised the location. The tournament had started, this was the festival that happened based around that. You always wanted to go, for a moment you were thankfull you decided to escape. Pyrraha was currently wandering over to a food stall, the wind carried you with her as she met up with team RWBY. Panic flooded your system as you floated dangerously close to the bowls of food Pyrrha had just ordered. You tried screaming for help, but with flattened lungs and the noise of the crowd your yells went unheard-
11411.title: Pyrrha's preparations

You couldn't even scream as you landed into a pool of oily noodles, your still reforming body easily stuck to the food as you desperatly tried to gain a more solid shape. Before you could attempt anything however, a pair of chopsticks jammed you deep into the mix before stirring in some sauce. You wanted to scream but your freshly flattened lungs refused to produce sound as random herbs stuck to your helpless body and a fresh coat of sauce pasted over you.

It wasn't long before you heard laughter and chatting up above. After the stir, you were almost at the top of the huge bowl of food. Desperatly struggling against your fate, you realized you would be unable to unstick yourself from the noodle thanks to all the sauce and pressure from the chopsticks. It didn't take long before you managed to see whose bowl you had landed in-
114111.title: You land on someones food-

1141111.content: You whimpered as you saw the girls face- her chopsticks jammed past you once more in an attempt at shovelling in more food. You recognised the girl from somewhere-

114111111.content:
You had the misfortune of landing in a bowl of green, leafy food. A salad, you assumed. Looking up, you noticed that this salad was about to be consumed by Ruby Rose, the leader of Team RWBY herself!

Before you could run, however, a great silvery fork came down and stabbed into the lettuce you were standing on, scooping it - and you - toward the giantess's parted lips. You and the piece of lettuce were quickly deposited into Ruby's mouth, where her pearly-white teeth easily chewed the leafy greens. While you managed to dodge the moving molars, your luck ran out when your captor's slimy tongue flicked you into the depths of her throat...
114111111.title: Ruby's Extra Ingredient

choices: You fall out- dribbling down Weiss's chin
You fall out, landing back in the almost empty bowl of sauce and noodles

You landed with a splat, sliding slightly down the slick surface of a greased up noodle with a groan. A snap whipped overhead just as you started to notice where you had landed, your eyes looked up in horror as you saw the RWBY team breaking open their chopsticks overhead, with Weiss closest to you.

SNAP

The well maintained girl snapped open her own chopsticks, making your stomach drop slightly as you scrambled to your feet- ready to wave and get her attention before things went too far. The noodles were pretty thick, thick enough for you to stand up on one of them with both feet at your size, but slippery. In your rush to get found, you quickly found yourself sliding inbetween the noodles, Weiss's face vanishing from sight.

You slid a couple of layers, your attempts to grab the slick food only slowing your decent rather then stopping it completely. With a panicked flail, you just about managed to stick to one of the noodles fairly close to the surface. The boiling heat messed with your head as you glanced down- just barely able to see a pool of boiling liquid at the very bottom of the bowl where the food was hotter.

Not wanting to fall lower, you carefully ajusted yourself before everything shifted slightly. You felt the piece you were on sink lower for a moment before settling. You held on, not wanting to fall into the soup down below as you tried to call out- but there was no way she could hear.
"Th-there's someone in here!" You cried out, before something pushed past you- knocking you from your noodle onto another one. The black column lifted up, dragging the foot out of the steamy pit and making more room for noodles to fall into. A small yelp crossed over you as you tumbled down- this time feeling the weight as noodles fell over you. A shudder ran through as you quickly realised in this small time frame that the girl had started eating.

Again, the food fell around you as more noodles were taken out of the bowl. Again, your yell was unheard. For Weiss, it must of been a normal meal, oblivious to your plight.

You felt a drop in your stomach as the black column came close, before slowly pushing you into the doughy texture of one of the noodles. Unable to call out as the greasy food was forced into your mouth- you decided to try to slip out of the iron grip of the chopsticks.

Glancing out of the small slit, adrenaline started to pump through you as you just barely saw Weiss's lips as she blew on the strands. Her air warmed by the hot food as it washed over you.
"W-wait- no no no" You managed to stutter, pushing your way to freedom as the unaware maw opened up.

Pyrrha didn't notice a thing as she chewed, she simple examined her food, chopsticks poking through it to check how much was left while she ate. It took a while to reform to a point where you could actually shout, her stomach was already half empty. By this time, the fight seemed to have stopped.
"Pyrrha! Help!" You yelled, your weak body bashed against the walls as you desperately tried to get the big girls attention. You noticed the walls secreting more stomach acid as she started to relax after her battle.

Pyrrha was none to wiser to your plight as she rubbed her grumbling stomach. The cheers of the crowd a distant murmer as she headed towards her current bed.
"Perhaps it wasn't a good idea to eat so much before a fight-" She spoke jokingly as she wandered around outside with her friends. No one realised that within the warriors gut lay an actual human, why would they?
114111211.title: On her tongue

1141112111.content:
As you pound and punch and kick the walls of Pyrrha's stomach, you suddenly feel a sharp burning sensation on your leg, halting your attempt at getting her attention. The stomach acids must be going into overdrive! No matter how much you pound and yell for help, you are unable to fight the natural process of digestion. Before long, you succumb to the juices and black out.

...

Surprisingly, you eventually awaken to the sight of the outside world. Are you alive and free?

...Nope. Not even close.

You try to run, but are shocked to find yourself unable to move! You can't feel your legs...or your arms...or...any part of yourself, really. What is going on here?

Soon, Pyrrha pats her belly, apparently feeling unusually energized after her meal, unaware of the extra ingredient. You somehow feel her hand with each impact, and it feels very strange.

...wait...but that means..!

It turns out you've been digested and absorbed by Pyrrha! Your nutrients have added a millimeter of fat onto her abs, and your consciousness is trapped within her torso!

Well, look on the bright side -- no more tedious homework for you, right?

...There's no bright side to this, is there?

Well, I tried.

As the acids rise you her whatever god there is out there to spare your life. You don't want to die! The digestive juices rise higher and higher, engulfing you completely.

You didn't have time to wonder about that however, the air in your lungs was quickly growing stale. Soon forced to open your mouth, you took in a breath...

And took in air. Somehow you could breath in here! You dared not question why, for whatever saw fit to allow you to live probably wouldn't appreciate being questioned.

And so you calmly floated to the top of the digestive acids and sighed as your head resurfaced. Knowing it was pointless trying to get her attention now, you simply waited for the food to be digested.

Dazed and confused, you gave a weak yell as the boot lifted off to charge up the steps you had once dreaded to climb. After a few steps, the tormenting foot began to slam you off onto the hard concrete in an attempt to warm itself up, dislodging you in the process,
"Did I step in gum? Disgusting" A white haired girl sneered down at you, before bending over, "Oh, it's a sticker" You could barely twitch as her powerful fingers pinched your tiny frame, dragging you up into the sky.

Finally face to face with the girl, you suddenly realize who this was. She appeared a few times in the papers as Weiss Schnee, her dad was quite well known and powerful where you came from.

Thankfully your body managed to pop back into shape before the dust user had time to stick you to her notebook, giving yourself the chance to introduce yourself,
"H...hello" You spoke, a little winded from being under Weiss's boot. You gave a brief wave as she slowly started to grab ahold of the situation.

"Your... small" She finally stuttered out, "You were... under my boot" You nodded to both questions,
"As far as I know I'm invincible, I'm also pretty stretchy" You called out to her, making her blink a few times before she regained her posture,
"Are you a new form of Grim," Weiss looked sternly at you, causeing you to recoil, "No human can be this size" Her frown grew deeper as she started to stretch your body, testing the last thing you said and not letting you get a word in edge way. "Can those monsters even talk" Weiss spoke slowly, thinking about what do do with you. It seemed impossible for such a weak being to be a student, it could just as easily be a spy from another, lesser, academy.

Surely she didn't think you were a creature of Grimm, they had no soul, they were mindless killing machines. Perhaps she was saying it to scare you, or perhaps she thought you were some form of spy?! You tried to communicate before she decided:

Weiss wasn’t as physically strong as her teammates, that was something she’d come to terms with very soon after the team was formed. Yang could bench-press a car and though not quite as strong Blake was nevertheless still physically tougher than most of the academy’s students and was extremely agile as well. And Ruby, somehow in defiance of her small frame, was not only strong enough to swing around that monstrosity of a weapon of hers but had a semblance that radically increased the speed and, by virtue of the momentum behind them, power of her physical attacks.

The heiress on the other hand relied more on finesse to win her battles. Combat skills gained from hours of practice, combined with an extremely versatile semblance and an encyclopaedic knowledge of dust and its applications. Not to mention a steady supply of the latest in dust products.

That was why, while the rest of her team were out wasting time, or ‘team building’ as Ruby called it, Weiss was busy mixing powdered dust into complex compounds for use in battle. It was a fairly dangerous task, since dust was dangerous at the best of times, and even more so if mixed incorrectly, but she’d done this a hundred times and she had a meticulous system for storing her dust that ensured she wouldn’t get the vials mixed up. Which was why she could only stare in confusion for a moment as the mixture in her mortar turned a colour it definitely should not have.

Still holding the now luminescent concoction, Weiss’s eyes shifted to her dust supply only to belatedly realise that they were not, in fact, in the order they should have been but had been haphazardly rearranged by person’s unknown or, more likely, by Ruby after the klutz knocked them over or something. For a split second she considered just throwing the mixture out the window, but then she’d just get in trouble if someone else was hurt. It didn’t matter in the end anyway as no sooner had the thought crossed her mind then the dust evaporated with a violent hissing noise, the resulting smoke bellowing around her face and leaving Weiss coughing and wheezing as she involuntarily breathed it in.

All at once the heiress was overcome with an intense bout of dizziness and fatigue, barely having the presence of mind to set down the now empty mortar before stumbling to her bed and collapsing in an undignified heap. Her body felt like it was on fire, yet at the same time she was freezing cold. The juxtaposition of sensations were making her sick and her head was spinning in a way she’d never felt before. With a final weak shudder she closed her eyes and allowed unconsciousness to claim her.

…

When Weiss awoke, everything had changed. She no longer felt particularly unwell, though there was still some lingering dizziness and a general sense of wrongness. Her eyes took a moment to come into focus as she gazed at the impossible sight before her. This was, her bed, but… not at the scale she had seen it before. Clutching her hands to her head the fencer felt tears forming in the corner of her eyes as she underwent a mild panic attack. She couldn’t understand how this had happened. Even the most volatile of dust mixtures shouldn’t have this kind of effect. Yet she couldn’t deny the reality that was unfolding before her eyes, the changed world that now towered above her.

A loud bang echoed through the room and Weiss immediately whirled around to see what had happened, her instincts expecting some form of attack. What she saw instead was the dorm room’s door swinging open and the rest of her team piling in, now impossibly huge colossi that literally towered over her. They may as well have been moving mountains from Weiss’s perspective, each of them hundreds of times her height and able to shake the earth with their booming footsteps.

She was used to being smaller than her teammates. Even Ruby was taller than her when she wasn’t wearing her heels (not that she ever took them off if she could avoid it), but this was on a whole different level. Every part of them was bigger than her whole body, and she had no doubt that they could snuff out her life without even noticing if she wasn’t careful. Heading towards the edge of her bed, Weiss could tell her friends were chatting casually but the cacophony of noise was so much that it took the shrunken student a moment to properly comprehend their speech.

Dumping her backpack beside the door, Ruby quickly scanned the room and noticed the absence of her partner, taking no notice at all of the tiny white bug scrambling across the heiress’s sheets. “That’s weird. Didn’t Weiss say she was staying behind to study or something?” She was sure it had been something like that. She remembered her disappointment that the girl wouldn’t join them.

Shrugging, Yang threw her own backpack up onto her bed as Blake more carefully laid hers at the foot of her own. “Who knows? Maybe she went to the library or something. She had to know we’d come back here eventually, so maybe she just wanted to make sure she wasn’t disturbed.” Her Faunus partner nodded in agreement as she absently brushed a few stray hairs from her vest.

At any other time Weiss would probably had been pleased by Yang reaching a fairly logical conclusion like that, but as it was she wished they’d all put a bit more thought into her absence. Completely unaware of their friend’s distress, Blake and Yang grabbed their gym bags from beneath their bunk bed and casually strolled over to the heiress’s bed, their colossal shadows falling over the frightened girl as they looked up at Ruby. The blonde met her sister’s silver eyes and shot her a quick grin. “Me and Blake are going to head to the gym for a bit Rubes. We’ll let you know if we see Weiss.”

Weiss didn’t bother listening to Ruby’s response. It didn’t matter right now. She had to make a choice. She could stay here and try to get Ruby’s attention… somehow. Or she could try and make the jump to Blake and Yang and get their attention instead. Her leader would, presumably, remain relatively still for the time being, but the heiress didn’t exactly have overwhelming confidence in the younger girl’s ability to deal with this situation. Blake and Yang would probably be better bets for getting help, but she may have more difficulty getting their attention in these circumstances.

Knowing she didn’t have time to ponder her options for long, Weiss…
13133.title: Test of Reflexes

choices: Flattened to Blake’s shorts, having been caught between their hips
Tangled in Yang’s hair, having been caught in the strands as they swept over her
Caught between Blake’s fingers and trying to get her attention
131331.content:
Shaking off her fear and springing to her feet, Weiss took a running start and leapt from the edge of the bed. She aimed for Blake’s leggings over Yang’s bare legs, feeling that the sheer material would be easier to climb. Though the Faunus was standing right in front of the bed, the tiny girl was so small that she wouldn’t have made it if it wasn’t for her glyphs. Summoning several beneath her feet, she used them as stepping stones to bridge the gap, jumping off the last to land just above Blake’s left knee. Oddly the heiress felt much more drained from the experience than she had suspected, glumly realising that her ability to use her semblance had been drastically reduced in this state.

While Weiss lamented her lack of energy, the unaware Blake turned to leave the room with Yang and the little heiress remembered that she had much bigger things to worry about. The speed and momentum of her friend’s leg lifting through the air was nearly enough to make her loose her grip and she probably would have thrown up if her entire body wasn’t stiff with fear. The jarring impact that followed as the Faunus stepped down was even worse and Weiss was extremely glad she had not chosen Yang to climb, as it was only her grip on Blake’s leggings that kept her in place.

The motion and the impacts repeated again and again as the two partners exited the dorm room and headed down the hallway towards the gym, hefting their gym bags over their shoulders in the process. Fortunately for Weiss, Blake had chosen to carry her bag on the opposite side from the leg the heiress now clung to but even without the added danger the tiny girl was starting to wonder if this had been the right choice after all. The hallway blurred pass at what seemed to her an impossible speed but was truly little more than a casual stroll and even as the duo made their way past other students, no-one so much as spared a glance for the tiny bug slinging to the Faunus’s legs.

Still, knowing that staying where she was would do little to help her, and fearing what might happen when the partners reached the gym, Weiss swallowed her fear and struggled to make her way up the seemingly infinite fabric, nearly losing her grip several times but eventually making it to the larger girl’s white shorts. She was aware that the colour of the garment would make her even harder to see, but it wasn’t like anyone had noticed her up to now anyway. Seeing one of the tails of Blake’s vest hanging just to her right, she quickly shimmied across the shorts and reached out to grab it, temporarily loosening her otherwise iron grip as she struggled to reach the shifting garment.

But in focusing on her goal, Weiss had failed to keep track of the conversation between her two giant friends. Of the playful tone in Yang’s voice as she teased her partner. Of the blonde’s proximity to her. And of the mischievous glint in the brawler’s eyes as she closed in.

Smirking as her partner turned her attention away for a moment to slip past another student, Yang pounced. The two had been engaging in their usual playful banter and Blake had made a comment to the effect that the curvy blonde could stand to lose a few pounds. That could not go unanswered, so with a quick skip she closed the distance between them and swung her own hips into Blake’s, happily hip checking the Faunus and nearly knocking her completely off balance in the process. “Hah, don’t pretend you don’t have some curves of your own their Blakey. We’ve all seen that Bellabooty.” Dancing forward a couple of steps to escape any immediate retaliation, she playfully whipped her friend with her hair for good measure but also shot her a small wink to ensure it was all in good fun.

Stumbling slightly, Blake shot Yang a glare as she briefly rubbed her hip but ultimately let the matter drop. It wasn’t worth anyone getting hurt over after all.

Little did Blake know that Weiss had already gotten caught up in their game, and was now…
131331.title: Scaling the Colossi

choices: Managed to cling to Yang’s shoulder and maintain her perch
Was knocked off Yang’s shoulder and fell into the blonde’s cleavage
Was whipped around with Yang’s hair and flung off deep into the gym
1313312.content:
Weiss had been caught completely unaware by Yang’s sudden actions. She’d just barely managed to grab onto Blake’s vest when the shadow of the blonde’s body fell over her and in the next instance a massive pair of hips slammed into the spot she had just been. The flesh of both girls’ hips compacted together as the force of the blow was transferred to the Faunus, a slight ripple running through her buttocks as she stumbled from the impact. The sudden and violent movement sent Weiss swinging on the tail of her friend’s vest, her head spinning as she frantically struggled to keep her hold. As desperately as she held on however, it was ultimately in vain and with her heart in her throat the fencer’s fingers slipped and she began to fall towards the floor below.

In the next instant however she was suddenly swept up by a sea of gold that came seemingly out of nowhere, violently swung around as she was tangled in golden threads and sent flying through the air before colliding solidly with an unfamiliar surface. For a few seconds Weiss thought that she may have died and ended up in some strange other world, but as Yang’s jubilant laughter boomed above and her entire world shook in time with the exhalations, she realised where she was. Someone she had been scooped up by Yang’s hair as the blonde girl skipped past Blake, inadvertently saved by the same girl who had nearly crushed her seconds earlier.

Several strands of the long golden hair had tangled themselves around Weiss, getting caught around her limbs and through the loose threads of her clothes. Her first instinct was to untangle herself immediately but as she continued to bounce along with her capture’s rhythmic steps, she realised that that wouldn’t be a very good idea. Rather, she freed herself just enough to allow use of her arms and then started the long process of climbing up through her teammate’s hair.

Yang’s movements were more erratic than Blake’s and her hair was less secure, so Weiss found herself being thrown every which way as the blonde practically skipped down the hall, but on the other hand she found the hair easier to climb than she had suspected. At her scale the small knots that the brawler had allowed to form deep within her locks made excellent footholds, turning what should have been more of a rope climb into a steep but manageable ascent. Weiss’s stamina was running low, but even as her arms burned from the exertion she knew that she had to do this, less a casual hand or brush tear her from her perch and to the unforgiving ground below.

Spitting out a stray hair from her mouth, the heiress finally found herself within reach of Yang’s shoulder, peering out from the dense forest of hair at the back of the girl’s neck. Making sure that several strands were still wrapped around her waist for safety, she waited for a moment of relative stillness before swinging out across the small gap and landing with exceptional grace on the brown fabric of her friend’s jacket. After such a marathon climb, the tiny girl was glad for the chance to rest, crouching down and gripping the edge of the jacket where it met her teammate’s neck.

A part of Weiss had hoped that now that she had reached an elevated position she would be noticed by her friends, but Yang wasn’t in the habit of looking at her own shoulder and Blake had other things on her mind than any stray bugs crawling on her partner. The two had finally reached the gym, swinging open the large doors and looking out over the expansive space.

Beacon’s gym was large, large enough to cater to an academy full of trained combatants, and was full of a mix of exercise equipment and large open training areas. From her perch on Yang’s shoulder Weiss took in the many other students, both Beacon-based and visiting, and gripped down a little harder on the fabric under her fingers. The last thing she wanted was to get lost away from her teammates, especially with people she didn’t even know.

Unfortunately for Weiss, Yang remained unaware of her presence and, as such, unconcerned with her safety. She’d turned her head to look over to the left of the gym, before suddenly turning back to face Blake, swinging her head around and allowing her hair to swing wildly behind her as a broad grin bedecked her face. “Alright partner, let’s go show off a little!”

Blake shot her a sly grin in response. “If you count exercising as showing off I guess.” As usual, the Faunus couldn’t help but get dragged along by her partner’s enthusiasm, too focused on the mischievous grin of the girl before her to take note of the tiny Weiss as the heiress…
1313312.title: Tangled in Golden Locks

choices: Weiss remains in Yang’s cleavage and is crushed more
Weiss falls out of Yang’s cleavage and into the back of Blakes pants
13133122.content:
Weiss’ life flashed before her eyes as she plummeted from Yang’s shoulder. She was certain she was about to fall to her death but to her surprise she was alive and was now in a mysterious dark place.

She could still hear Yang’s booming voice above which lead her to realize she was now in her unaware giant friends cleavage.

Although there was little light, Weiss was able to make out Yang’s now mountain sized breasts. Yang already had one of the biggest busts at beacon but now they were absolutely ginormous.

Weiss’ world then began to shift as Yang made her way to her first machine of the day with Blake.

First up was the rowing machine. Yang and Blake found two free machines right next to each other.

As Yang began her workout, the motion cause her breast to push up against each other cause Weiss to be crushed in a fleshy and soon to be sweat vice.

As Yang and Blake continued their workout they talked with other about their stuff, Blake pretending not to notice her check her out.

Meanwhile Weiss was in absolute hell as her bones were turned to dust and her body absorbed Yang’s boob sweat. Weiss tried to scream out for help despite knowing it probably wouldn’t do anything. As she opened her mouth to scream nothing came out due to a crushed windpipe and a river of Yang’s boob sweat flowed into her open mouth.

After what seemed like an eternity to Weiss, Yang and Blake finished their workout.

However, Weiss’ torment has only just begun as she heard Yang say to Blake, “Let’s head over to the sparring mats next and work on hand to hand combat and other combat techniques”.
13133122.title: Crushed between Yangs sweaty breast

choices: The exercise mats (used for stretching, yoga, sparring etc.)
The cardio equipment (bikes, treadmills, rowing machines etc.)
The weightlifting equipment (bench-press and weight machines)
13133123.content:
When Weiss had made sure some of Yang’s hair was wrapped around her waist she had rationalised that the strands would prevent her from falling to the floor below. But in her panic over the chance of falling she’d failed to think ahead to what those strands would mean if the blonde made any sudden movements. While the brawler’s movements had remained relatively sedate the heiress’s weight, though tiny, was enough to keep the strands still, but as the whole mass of hair shifted with Yang’s enthusiastic turn of her head Weiss found herself ripped from her perch in a single violent movement that saw her do a complete 180 degree arc in less than a second.

The sheer shock of the inertia very nearly rendered the little heiress unconsciousness and sent black dots swimming across her vision. Even then, she retained enough of her senses to feel a deep dread as the hairs momentarily pulled tight at the apex of their arc and then unravelled, snapping back towards their owner as Weiss herself continued on. With next to no weight to speak of and a significant boost to start her off, she sailed high over the gym below in an uncontrollable tumble.

With her body spinning around and around it was difficult for the heiress to get any impression of her current location, though she did catch a few blurry glances of her fellows students milling around the gym, none of them so much as sparing a glance for the unfortunate student as she reached the height of her tumble and quickly began falling. Fully believing that a fall from this height would kill her in an instant, Weiss summoned what little strength she had yet to summon a series of glyphs in a vain attempt to control her descent, but ending up just crashing through most of them as she continued to tumble wildly. They did slow her slightly but she was nevertheless sure that she was going to die as the ground came up to meet her with a crushing finality.

At the last moment before impact, the heiress glumly noted that she was heading towards…
13133123.title: Weiss’s Flight

choices: An unrecognisable smear across the ball of Pyrrha’s foot
Left behind in the indent of Pyrrha’s footstep
131331231.content:
Seeing the vast expanse of the gym’s exercise mats expand out before her, Weiss squeezed her eyes shut and waited for her end. She hit the ground with a force that didn’t even register to anyone else in the gym but which to her felt distinctly like being hit by a truck, even against the relatively cushioned surface of the mats. And yet, much to her own surprise she felt winded but surprisingly very much still alive, not even really that sore.

Allowing her eyes to creep open and slowly catching her breath, Weiss turned her head to the side and noted that she had fallen quite close to the edge of the mat, with the entrance of the gym to her right and the remainder of the mats expanding out behind her. What she couldn’t see is that the impact with the ground had caused part of her body, particularly her chest and legs, to flatten slightly against the mat. Far from two dimensionally but enough to be noticed if she had taken to time to look down.

Her flattened parts popping back to shape without protest, Weiss rolled onto her back to catch her breath, sighing in relief for a second before her eyes went wide with fear and shock.

High above her, hanging ominously in the air like the looming spectre of death, the bare right foot of Pyrrha Nikos began its silent but deadly descent.

For Pyrrha it was just a simple step on her way to the rest of her team on the other side of gym, but for Weiss the image of that descending foot was burned into her mind as what might very well be the last thing she would ever see in her life. The red hair of the amazon’s ponytail and the swell of her breasts faded into obscurity, and all she could see was the bare sole, interposed with still shots of her own life flashing before her eyes as she found herself frozen in abject terror.

At the last possible second, the heiress found her voice and screamed in complete and utter despair only to be brutally silenced as Pyrrha completed her step and buried Weiss under an endless wall of flesh. The slightly sweaty foot, made moist from several hours already spent at the gym, sunk deep into the cushioned surface of the mat, the body of the tiny fencer offering no resistance whatsoever as she disappeared completely under the ball of Pyrrha’s foot.

Weiss had expected a lot of things in this instant. She had expected pain, and there was certainly no absence of that, her entire body experiencing a sense of agony like nothing she had ever felt before. She had expected the darkness and the heat that surrounded her as she was buried in a steamy hell. She had even expected the sweat that clung to her like a second skin and the smell that violently assaulted her nostrils. Yet, she had expected to experience all of these things for a fraction of a second at most, only to have them replaced by the sweet, if undesired, release of death.

Rather than end however, the torment just continued as her tortured body failed to burst into the red mess she had expected but instead flattened out under the pressure of Pyrrha’s unrelenting weight, her chest, arms, legs and head quickly compacted into a two dimensional shape that defied reason. The sensations she was feeling were impossible to describe, her body transfigured into putty yet remaining biologically, if not structurally, functional. A blob of putty that somehow was able to be crushed even flatter as Pyrrha’s left foot lifted for her next step, instantly doubling the weight.

All of this was experienced in little more than a second as the foot dug in and then started to lift again, the heel lifting off first as the ball twisted down, smearing Weiss into a tortured lump of flesh and torn clothes before lifting off and moving on for another step. Still completely unaware of the agony she had inflicted on her friend, Pyrrha stepped off the mat and walked the remaining distance to her team, greeting the enthusiastic Nora with a casual fist bump as she idly lifted her left foot to scratch an itch half way up her right thigh, absentmindedly grinding the sole of her right foot into the hard wooden timbers of the gym’s main floor.

As Pyrrha and her team headed back towards their gym bags and a change of clothes, Weiss was…
131331231.title: Squashed on the Mats

choices: They should grab the boys and go back to the dorms for a night in
She’s going for a run, the workout session was just her warm up
She’s finally going to take Nora to that new salon for a foot massage
1313312311.content:
As Pyrrha stepped off the mat a quiet squelch emanated from beneath her sole, too soft to reach her ears and unheeded as she met with her teammates and scratched at her thigh, allowing all of her weight to press down on her sole and the unfortunate heiress still stuck beneath. It had been a close battle between the spongy mat and the redhead’s moist foot, but in the end Pyrrha’s sole had won out and claimed the shrunken girl as its own, slamming her down again and again into the mat and the hard wooden floor as Weiss was engrained ever deeper into the sweaty flesh.

Smiling pleasantly as she returned Nora’s offered fist bump, Pyrrha remained blissfully oblivious to the torment she was inflicting on her friend as she followed the rest of her team towards the locker rooms. Weiss meanwhile was barely able to comprehend what was happening as she was smashed beneath the towering redhead. Just a few moments ago she’d been under the impression that, while tiny, her body functioned much the same as it had always done. Yet now she found herself twisted into a tormented gooey mass and inexplicably flattened to a nearly two dimensional shape.

Approaching the entry to the locker room, Pyrrha passed Yang and Blake heading out, raising a hand in greeting and receiving a smile from the Faunus and a wave and “Good hustle Pyrrha!” from the blonde. For some strange reason the brawler followed the comment by going to take a step towards her only to be stopped by an arm and a small glare from her partner as the two headed off.

Waving off Jaune and Ren to the men’s side, Pyrrha followed Nora towards her locker and started to peel off her sweat-soaked clothing, allowing first her shirt and then her shorts to fall to the nearby bench with a wet slap. Opening the locker door, she retrieved a towel and began to wipe off the excess sweat, frowning slightly at the sheer quantity of moisture that was released. Her shorter friend struck up a conversation, and the two happily chatted as they cleaned.

Weiss meanwhile was nowhere near as happy with this situation. Even the quick walk to the lockers had smeared her into an unrecognisable mass across the ball of Pyrrha’s massive foot, her head stretched out into a flat disc while the rest of her body was twisted all over the place. Facing the sole, the tiny heiress could see nothing but darkness and her other senses were dominated entirely by the sheer agony of her body and the horrendous smells emanating from her sweaty prison. Even the smallest movements of the redhead continued to twist the sole above her, reducing Weiss to a sobbing broken mess, wondering if there was any end in sight to this torment.

Pulling on another loose shirt and some comfortable shorts, Pyrrha sat back on the bench, temporarily providing some relief to the squished fencer, but instantly making things a hundred times worse as she tugged on a worn pair of socks and shoved her feet into her sneakers, sealing Weiss inside. From the heiress’s perspective there was a noticeable rise in heat accompanied by the coarse feeling of cloth against her skin. All of which was totally overwhelmed by the massive spike in the horrific stench that rose up around her, the musky scent of dried sweat assaulting her nose.

Still unaware of the effect of her actions, Pyrrha hopped up from the bench and gave a few good stomps to make sure her shoes were secured, feeling no irritation whatsoever as she smashed her tiny friend into oblivion beneath her weight. Giving her right foot a good twist to make sure the sneaker was on as tightly as possible, she turned to Nora and announced that…
1313312311.title: Pyrrha’s Prisoner

Shed escape the foot safely (now has to escape the dorm and get back to her own)

Each and every step was torture. The feeling of weightlessness for a few seconds, then immediate pressure as she was grinded into the floor beneath the ball of Pyrrha’s foot. Again, again and again. Weiss could barely comprehend what was going on anymore, the immense pressure was doing a number on her body, her vision blocked by her face being smushed into the girls sole, the intense smell of sweat surrounded her, she felt as if she was losing consciousness, but held out for the moment.

After reaching the dormitory, Pyrrha slipped off her shoes, releasing a bit of the pressure off of Weiss, as she sat on her bed massaging her feet, unaware of the ‘stain’ also known as Weiss, stuck to her sole. Eventually, after dinner, each member began getting ready for bed. Pyrrha, after taking off her socks and throwing on her sleepwear, hopped into her respective bed just as the light went out, falling fast asleep. Luckily for the bug-sized heiress, Pyrrha slept barefoot, giving her a chance at escape. Slowly reforming, Weiss was able to get her still somewhat flattened head unstuck from the sole of Pyrrha's foot, although the rest of her body was still reforming, she could at least see now. The massive toes of Pyrrha’s foot clenched and unclenched subtly, slowly wiggling in her sleep, Weiss had gotten a singular arm free and was trying hard to push herself off of the foot, unaware that the movement of the huntress’s feet was slowly speeding up.

still unconscious, Pyrrha’s body had felt a disturbance on her foot, like a bug crawling up it, subtly tickling her, slowly moving the opposite foot over to try and scratch at it, which of course, Weiss was unaware of, until it was already too late, the heiress screamed as Pyrrha’s opposite foot came from behind her, the huntresses toes squishing Weiss even more into the foot, undoing some of her progress, before retreating slowly, satisfied with its itch. With what just happened still in mind, Weiss knew she would have to be more subtle with her escape, even Pyrrha's unconscious body was out to get her, so she continued to try to reform off the foot, but did so slowly, so that she would not disturb the giant huntress once more.

After what had felt like ages, the bug-sized girl had gotten the majority of her body reformed, and some of her body unstuck from the sweaty foot. With only her waist and legs to go, Weiss tried her best to reform as slowly as possible, as to not impede all her progress once more by causing another itch or tickle sensation for Pyrrha. 13133123111.title: They should grab the boys and go back to the do...

choices: Moving to peel off her incredibly sweaty socks
Reaching down to massage her aching soles
Spotting the remaining members of Team RWBY (looking for Weiss)
13133123112.content:
“I’m going to go on my run now Nora. Sure you don’t want to join?” Slinging her towel over her shoulder and wearing an easy smile, Pyrrha raised one eyebrow at her teammate in question as she slowly shifted her weight from foot to foot. The workout in the gym had done a good job of getting her adrenaline going, and now she was ready to really begin her workout. Classes had kept her from getting through her usual routine as of late, and she was looking forward to rectifying that.

Nora meanwhile just laughed at the offer, waving off her friend with a lazy movement of her hand. “No no, the track’s all yours. Seriously Pyrrha, your stamina is super crazy.” The smaller redhead was known as being a near endless ball of energy but this was one area in which her teammate definitely surpassed her. Really, she was pretty sure she and the guys could run a relay of the track while Pyrrha did the whole thing solo and she’d still have the most energy left at the end of it all.

Far below, Weiss had no idea what was going on. All she knew was that she was stuck in a hot and musky world of pressure and sweat, which only got worse as Pyrrha left the locker room and headed outside. Each time the redhead’s right foot came down the heiress was smashed into paste beneath the relentless sole, pressed deeply into the moist flesh as all of the girl’s considerable weight shifted to that foot, and twisted tortuously each time she went to step off. The fibres of the sock at her back felt like they were already adhering to her body as sweat soaked through anything and everything.

Yet all of that was only the preview as Pyrrha wandered outside and broke into a jog. For Weiss there was no warning as her friend’s foot rose into the air once more, only to crash down with much greater force. If the force of the redhead’s footsteps had been enough to reduce her to paste before, the force of the jog was enough to smash her into a truly two dimensional object. As Pyrrha picked up speed the sole bombardment became a near constant wave of crushing feet, one step blurring into the next until the smeared fencer could no longer even tell if there were any gaps at all.

Wanting to get in as good a workout as possible, Pyrrha quickly headed to the edge of the academy grounds, coming dangerously close to the edge of the cliff before pivoting on the ball of her right foot and starting a complete circuit of the grounds. The path around the edge of the academy was not entirely cleared, but that just gave her a chance to practice her footing as she side-stepped or leapt over the occasional obstacle, never stumbling even as her sweaty feet slid around within the increasingly spongy interior of her shoes. In no time at all Beacon’s buildings came back into view, as she skirted around the exterior and headed towards the docks on the other side.

By the time the redhead reached the docks and started on the second half of her circuit the tiny heiress beneath her right foot had been reduced to a barely distinguishable smear of tortured flesh practically ironed into the sole. The rough texture of the soaked sock at her back ensured that Weiss was constantly covered in a thick coating of sweat and grime, even as more sweat flowed from the pours of Pyrrha’s feet, soaking directly into her flattened body. The heat of the foot was enough to burn her sensitive skin, turning the tiny girl the same pinkish red as the flesh of the overexerted feet.

Every one of Weiss’s senses was dominated by the entirety of Pyrrha. Her vision was utterly obscured by the massive foot above. Her hearing was consumed by booming explosions. All she could feel was the agony of each crushing step and all she could taste was the horrid texture of the sweat being forced inexorably down her crushed throat. Perhaps worse of all, the combined stench of the foot, sock and shoe had engrained itself so deeply in her nostrils she was sure it would never leave even if, by some miracle, she was eventually able to escape this endless hell.

This constant torment continued for over two hours as Pyrrha returned to her starting position and kept going, feeling like she could get in a few good laps before calling it a day. She was in the zone now, her legs moving in a constant even rhythm and her feet pounding away, driving her forward with impressive speed as her powerful aura boosted the strength of her well-muscled legs. Had she any idea what she was doing to Weiss she would have stopped long ago, but as it was her only clue to the crushed girl’s presence was that her right foot felt slightly more comfortable than her left. Like there was a little more springiness to the insole of that shoe. Subconsciously, she shifted more of her weight to that side each time she turned, the ball of her right foot digging into the moist insole just a little bit deeper each time she took a step, wearing down the thin fabric of the well-used sock.

Three full laps later, the redhead finally redirected her course to take her back to the courtyard, doing a few quick cool down stretches before dropping heavily onto a stone bench and pulling out her scroll to check the time. Frowning slightly at the burning sensation in her feet, Pyrrha set her scroll aside momentarily to reach down and remove her shoes, smiling in contentment as her feet started to cool off while pointedly keeping her nose as far away from them as possible.

Struggling for a moment to catch her breath, Pyrrha glanced down at her socked feet before…
13133123112.title: Weiss Joins the Routine

choices: Pyrrha takes a bath in the dorms, giving Weiss a chance to soak off her sole
Pyrrha just towels off her sweat quickly and goes about her day
Pyrrha and her team are sent on an emergency mission outside the city
131331231122.content:
Breathing heavily, Pyrrha flexed her toes as she looked down at her aching feet. Her entire body was tired and sore at this point, but her feet were a particular point of concern, having taken a majority of the beating dished out by her workout. Not counting Weiss of course.

Contemplating for a moment, and admittedly somewhat concerned at the potential smell and feel of the utterly soaked socks, the amazonian beauty eventually decided to bite the bullet and reached down to grab her own feet, pulling them up onto the bench and resting them on their heels as she started to massage the aching soles. Pushing through the socks, her powerful fingers dug deeply into her flesh, travelling across the moist feet yet paying the most attention to a few spots of tension and pleasure both. The ball of her right foot in particular giving her a pleasant sensation as she dug her fingers into the tender flesh, pressing as deeply as possible as she rubbed soothing circles.

With no means of defending herself from the unexpected and invisible assault, Weiss’s short reprieve from the crushing weight of her friend’s jog was ended with a new wave of pain as the redhead’s fingers compressed her between the moist sock at her back and the somehow even sweatier foot at her front. One finger in particular found the back of the heiress’s head with an unerring accuracy, pressing her face deeper against Pyrrha’s sole and shifting it around all across the sole, smearing the already completely flattened girl all the worse across the sweaty expanse.

High above, Pyrrha sighed in bliss as the soreness in her feet finally began to dissipate, allowing her more time to focus on the more pleasurable aspects of the massage. That pleasant little kink on her right sole in particular drove her to really try to knead it into her flesh, neither knowing nor caring what the source of the feeling was, only that it was making her feel nice and refreshed.

Wanting to get both feet at once, Pyrrha retracted her fingers and opted to bring her feet together directly, rubbing her soles against each other as she slid them back and forth. For Weiss this meant being entombed between both sweaty soles and being instantly bombarded with the full force of her unintentional torturer’s foot stench. The friction of the shifting feet quickly multiplied the heat surrounding her and ensured that if she wasn’t ironed on before, she definitely was now. While Yang leaned in for a closer inspection, Weiss’s senses slowly started to return, her sight and hearing both still blurry as she tried to centre herself, but good enough at least to make out both of her teammates now leaning in extremely close. She was still unable to talk, but she could at least keep her eyes focused on her potential saviours as she willed herself to reform as quickly as possible.

It wasn’t until the squished head began to gain some definition that Blake finally gasped in recognition, her eyes narrowing to tiny slits as she focused all of her attention on the face that was starting to make itself known, and the slightly-soiled white hair gradually emerging from the mixed gunk. Yang raised an eyebrow at the explanation, and opened her mouth to speak, but was cut off by her partner’s own words. “Wait wait, look closely… doesn’t this remind you of Weiss?”

“Weiss?” Somehow managing to push even closer, and ignoring the low grunt from Blake as her sizeable assets flattened against her partner’s back, Yang peered at the now mostly reformed heiress. She had to admit that, grime and muck notwithstanding, it did look remarkably like their teammate. “I guess, though the Ice Queen would never be caught dead looking like that.” It was rare enough to see the girl with her hair loose, and downright unknown to see her naked like this, even if they did live together. After all, the heiress had always been keen to stay away from any group showers.

The static that persisted in her head prevented Weiss from figuring out exactly what the relative giants were talking about, but she could tell that they were discussing her, and knew that now was the best chance she’d had all day to get their attention. Her body was painfully weak after everything she had been through, but she retained enough strength to slowly raise the hand of her unrestrained arm and reach it up to touch Blake’s fingers in a silent plea to be released, moving her head at the same time to face as best she could towards the blurry figures of her friends.

Blake’s reaction was immediate, gasping loudly as she released the heiress’s arm and quickly reached out to catch her with her other hand, cupping the tiny naked girl in her palm while she looked down in horror. Finally coming around to stand beside her partner, Yang looked equally surprised, though there was an unmistakable glint of interest in her eyes at this new discovery. Mouths opened and closed as words failed to come, both girls lost in their own thoughts.

With safety within her reach, Weiss willed herself to sit up and wave her arms in a tired greeting while she forced some air through her crushed throat. “He-hey. Thanks for finding me.” She really was thankful. Beyond thankful. Despite everything these two had unknowingly put her through, it was nice to know that she could still rely on them to come through for her when she needed them. That said, the barrage of questions that instantly assaulted her was not helpful, and she quickly covered her ears with her hands while curling into a ball for protection.

Thankfully her companions caught on quickly and quieted down, giving Weiss the chance to uncurl in time for Yang to lean down to get eye to eye with her and quietly ask the most important questions. “Weiss, is that really you? What happened to you? Are you okay? How’d you end up on the soap?”

Sighing, the tiny girl looked up to meet two pairs of worried eyes, blushing slightly as she realised for the first time that all three of them were naked. If the circumstances were a bit different see would probably have screeched and tried to cover herself, but as it was she quite literally had bigger things to worry about. “Yeah, it’s really me Yang, and to be honest I don’t know what happened. I was experimenting with some dust when, well… this happened.” Weiss gestured to herself vaguely, still unsure of what exactly had gone wrong. “As for how I am, I’ve been better obviously. But I’m at least thankful to be alive, especially after… after everything that’s happened so far.”

It was at this moment that the white-haired girl found herself at a crossroads. A sudden upwell of anger threatened to cloud her judgement as she remembered everything that had happened to her, and just how much had been caused by these two, accidental or not. They’d made her life hell and she desperately wanted to give them a piece of her mind. But, even then they were still her friends, and she didn’t want to hurt them, not to mention risk angering them at her new tiny scale.
