With the bag now full Nora zipped it closed, and in a single movement lifted and swung it over her shoulder, causing the contents to roll around freely. Weiss found herself shifting deeper into the bag as the mass moved around her, losing both her sense of direction and her sense of hope as she quickly drowned in a smelly sea of sweat and grime. One moment she was being pressed flat beneath the cup of Pyrrha’s sports bra, the next she was ground against the seat of Nora’s discarded panties. Another second passed and she was wrapped up within one of Pyrrha’s ankle socks, only to then be released and rubbed down the entire length of Nora’s sweaty tank top until being forced into Pyrrha’s stinking booty shorts below. This contact and more repeated itself in a constant cycle that left Weiss a delirious broken mess by the time her tormentors reached the dorms, no longer even able to determine where her body ended and the mass of clothing began.

Arriving at the lower levels of the dorm, the two females of team JNPR entered the student laundry near the main entrance, wandering over to one of the machines and keying it up for use. Never one for subtlety, Nora simply flipped open the machine’s lid, unzipped her bag, and upended it over the open maw, allowing most of the clothes within to fall out in one wet mass that slapped wetly against the base of the machine. The few remaining items were stuck to the insides and the redhead reached in to retrieve them, peering within to make sure she got everything and seeing…
1313312313112232.title: In Team NP’s Gym Bag

choices: Weiss had been hardened into a wash cloth form. Forever...
Weiss is ingrained into one of the gym clothes!
13133123131122321.content:
After so much time being crumpled and crushed to almost every item of clothing in the sweaty gym bag, Weiss had almost not noticed when she had been dumped out of the bag. But as a tunnel of light came into her vision, she realized that she was staring up at the giant face of Nora at the end of a large dark tunnel. Nora absentmindedly picked clothes out of the bag that had been Weiss' prison, dropping them into the machine and on top of the heiress' rag body. A lead ball dropped in Weiss' stomach as she realized just where she was.

"Oh gods no!" Weiss tried to scream, but her cries went unheard and unacknowledged as Nora finished dropping the last of her and Pyrrha's clothes into the washing machine, shutting the door. In an instant, Weiss was left in the dark, as wiring and the running of water hit her ears.

Desperately trying to move, or even scream for help, the heiress felt dread rise within her as she felt the cold almost soapy water run over her form, soaking into her now very absorbent body. Weiss couldn't deny that at least the smell was better than the sweaty garments she had been forced to endure with. But soon the heiress' world started spinning as she was tossed and turned within the water and clothes, she'd have thrown up, but she had no discernible mouth for anything to exit.

By the time Weiss was put through all of the washing cycles and the washing machine had come to a close, she was absolutely soaked along with the rest of the clothes of Nora and Pyrrha, and could barely feel her own body, much less move an inch. She felt damp and miserable, the nicer smell barely accommodating for the misery she had endured.

But her misery and dread only increased as she heard the popping of the door above her, and she felt herself being lifted up with the ball of damp clothes. But just as soon as it had happened, she felt a drop, and was plopped somewhere else, but she knew exactly where she was.

Her fears were confirmed as she heard the clamp of a door shutting, and suddenly the heiress was tossed and turned once again, but this time, instead of water, she was bombarded with unimaginable heat, drying her soaked, rag shape out, if she was still a rag, and not melted into one of the gym clothes she had been stuck with.

Eventually, though it still felt like an eternity, the heat and turning eventually subsided, and Weiss was finally left in silent, feeling completely exhausted, unable to move, and miserable. After some more time in blissful silence, Weiss heard the popping of a door, and was greeted with the sight of Pyrrha's face. Her giant hand enclosing around the small girl's form as she was lifted out of the dryer along with other clothes, all nice and dry for use...
13133123131122321.title: Through the Wash

choices: An ominous shadow falls over Weiss once again
Sparring classes begin on the mat and Weiss is caught in the middle
Nothing happens, and Weiss is able to free herself
1313312313113.content:
As the partners departed Weiss was left behind, a smeared tan and white lump in their collective ass imprint. Utterly soaked in sweat and covered in grime she was barely distinguishable from the mat, even if someone had been specifically looking for her.

Weakly, the heiress watched her friends depart with mixed feelings. On the one hand she was closer to these two (and to Ruby) than she was to anyone else, other than maybe her sister. On the other, they had just obliviously annihilated her with their bodies, subjecting her to a torment that she didn’t want to experience ever again, so she was understandably somewhat happy to see them leave.

Weiss watched as Blake and Yang stepped of the mat and headed for the aerobic equipment on the other side of the gym but had her vision of them obscured as a small group of students moved across the mat between them. The sight of those students reminded the little fencer that her teammates were far from the only threat to her health and she desperately started to wriggle in an attempt to free herself, concerned that perhaps she had become permanently adhered to the mat.

Slowly but surely she felt her body begin to separate from the mat and start to form back into its original shape. There were a couple of near misses as one student or another stepped down threateningly close to her position but after several minutes she had managed to free her now mostly reformed upper body and was working on freeing her legs with an increasing sense of hope and desperation. She was still soaked in sweat and grime and she still smelled like a pile of day old socks but if she could just get her legs free then maybe she could finally escape this hell.

She’d made it all the way to the gym in the first place without being crushed. There was no reason she couldn’t make it out of here safely as well. But as she focused on freeing her legs with all her strength she was powerless to influence what fate would befall her next.
1313312313113.title: Abandoned on the Mats

choices: Stuck to Glynda’s nylons and plunged into her heels for the rest of the day
Freed from the nylons but now stuck in the toe section of the heels
Left behind somewhere in the gym, having somehow peeled off Glynda’s feet
13133123131131.content:
Glynda Goodwitch, the beleaguered second-in-command to the erratic Professor Ozpin, entered Beacon’s gym with a mission. Lately some of the equipment had been damaged by some overly-enthusiastic students and she was here to ensure that it didn’t happen again. In doing so, she tried not to dwell on the fact that the damage had only started when the visiting students had arrived, or more specifically when the rambunctious students from Vacuo had come.

It had been a long day on her feet for Glynda as she ran a seemingly endless stream of errands for Ozpin and the professor was more than happy to remove her heels as she approached the mat. She grimaced as her nylon-clad feet slipped from the heels with a wet slurp and had to turn her head away to avoid breathing in her own putrid foot stench. She determined against removing her thoroughly sweat-soaked nylons, neither wanting to touch the filthy fabric nor expose herself and others to the even worse smells that were invariably trapped within.

Taking her first couple of steps onto the mat, Glynda shuddered as she felt her nylons sticking slightly to the cushioned surface with each step, heedless to the sweaty footprints she was leaving in her wake. Any follower would be easily able to track her progress by following the footprints alone, each leaving a distinctly moist and discoloured impression in the mat.

Keeping her eyes out for any problematic students, the curvaceous woman didn’t even notice the shrunken heiress as her left nylon fell upon the unfortunate girl.

For Weiss all her hopes were crushed into a smelly oblivion as her progress towards safety was instantly undo by a single footfall. The horrendous nylons were the sweatiest surface the tiny girl had yet encountered and her own grime-encased form thoroughly adhered to them in seconds as they forced her down deep into the mat, grinding her beneath the ball of Glynda’s mature feet.

Somehow, impossibly the force of the step squeezed even more sweat from the already overflowing nylons, threatening to drown Weiss before her new capture could even take another step. When the foot lifted again the thoroughly squished heiress was brought along for the ride, only to be plunged into another sweaty smelly hell as the foot fell again, and again, and again.

Reduced to a sobbing broken mess, Weiss could do nothing to save herself as she was driven into the ground over and over again beneath the overwhelming mass of her professor. At first she had hoped that she would be scrapped off after a step or two, as she had before with other students, but the soaked fabric of the nylons had adhered to her like cement. She hadn’t even gotten the chance to see who it was that was crushing her, but whoever they were desperately needed to do something about the smell of their feet, preferably before she died from the stench alone.

Above, Glynda stopped for a moment to check on a few students, absently rubbing the balls of her feet around in the process, before returning to the edge of the mat and reluctantly reaching for her heels. Unable to face the smell that wafted from the shoes, the professor had to put them on by feel alone, shuddering at the feeling of the pool of sweat that flowed out from the insoles as her feet settled. It felt distinctly like she was standing in the middle of a swamp, like her nylons were sinking into a smelly pit of mud and other undesirable things. In that instant she resolved not to remove them again until she was safely back in her own room, where she could throw the shoes deep into her closet and stick the nylons at the bottom of her clothes hamper to be dealt with some other day.

As Glynda fully secured the heels and moved to exit the gym, Weiss was…
13133123131131.title: The Witch and the Snowflake

choices: Glynda sees the missing heiress smeared across her sole
Glynda sees a damaged humanoid sticker stuck to her sole
Glynda sees nothing, Weiss reduced to a mere discolouration
131331231311311.content:
Much to the heiress’s horror she had not been left behind as the professor headed towards her shoes, but rather taken along for the ride as the wet nylons claimed her for their own. Peeled from the mat like a wet band-aid, Weiss could barely muster the strength to whimper weakly before being slammed back into the mat once again, a fresh wave of sweat flowing out around her even as the heat and pressure felt like it was going to cook her alive. A few more steps brought them both to the waiting heels, and to a new hell for the tiny girl as she and the nylon vanished into the darkness.

Near-instantaneously, Weiss found herself surrounded with a scent a hundred times worse than what she’d previously experienced and was nearly drowned in the overflowing sweat that poured out from the soaked insole. The heat was incredible, the warmth of the sole above trapped within and amplified by the tight footwear, creating a sauna-like environment that left Weiss feeling like she was either going to melt away or become permanently ironed to the sweaty nylons. And all of it only became so much worse as the giantess above began to walk.

With a resolute expression, Glynda did her best to ignore the sickening feeling of her heels as she strode purposely out of the gym. She had a full schedule ahead of her, and not enough time to worry about any minor irritations. Certainly no time for the barely perceptible itch that was the flattened body of team RWBY’s fencer being smashed between her sweaty foot and the soaked insole below. On the way out she passed Blake and Yang heading for the exercise machines, sparing them only the briefest glance as she exited the gym and took her unknown prisoner far away from her friends.

The next several hours were a blur of activity for Glynda, and a seemingly endless blur of pain for Weiss, broken only by the occasional periods of blissful unconsciousness. After leaving the gym, the professor headed to the library to ensure that students were properly respecting the rules of the quiet place, and to return the books left scattered around to their appropriate spots, requiring more than a few instances of rising up on the balls of her feet to return heavy tomes to the higher shelves, pressing more and more weight down onto the defenceless girl in her left shoe. The patrol of the grounds and the training fields that followed was no less painful, as the heat of the day ensured that the amount of sweat in the heels only got worse as the day went on.

With her patrol work done, the professor had hoped to get a chance to sit down and rest her feet while getting some paperwork done but instead found herself summoned to Ozpin’s office, where she was not entirely pleased to find one of Ironwood’s specialists in attendance. Specifically she found herself met with the somewhat agitated gaze of one Winter Schnee, apparently displeased at having to wait for the older woman’s arrival. As it turned out it seemed the young Schnee heiress was missing, having been seen by neither her teammates nor her friends since earlier that morning, with her sister having spent the last couple of hours scouring the academy for her wayward sibling.

As much as her feet hurt, Glynda knew the safety of her students had to come first, so she headed out with Winter in tow to try and locate the missing teen. The already thoroughly annihilated heiress was smeared all the worse as the inevitably fruitless search unfolded, unknowingly subjected to hours of additional torment at the behest of her worried sister. Each time Glynda tried to suggest that Weiss may have just headed into Vale or something similar, her companion would argue that it wouldn’t hurt to check just a few more places, or double check the library, or the gym, or…

So it was that by the time Winter finally gave up on searching the academy, and the tired professor fell gratefully onto her bed, she’d spent nearly eight hours on her feet. She took a few moments just to enjoy having the weight off her sore soles before mustering the strength to reach down and slowly peel off the moist heels, shuddering slightly at the wet feeling of the insoles slowly separately from her atrociously sweaty nylons. The next thing to hit her was the smell, a thick miasma of her own foot stench assaulting her nostrils as she reflexively threw the heels as far away as she could. That made things slightly better but the smell from her nylon-clad feet alone was still attacking her.

A large part of Glynda didn’t even want to consider touching the truly toxic nylons, let alone expose herself to the undoubtedly horrific smell of her bare feet, but she knew that leaving them on would only make things worse in the long run. With clear reluctance she reached down to slide them off, briefly turning over her left foot to pick at the nylon and ensure it wouldn’t snag, her tired eyes focusing for a few scant seconds on the moist sole of the soiled footwear.
131331231311311.title: Weiss’s Day in Hell

choices: Glynda is annoyed with Weiss for the trouble and demands a foot massage
Glynda is turned on by Weiss’s vulnerability, pursues own pleasure
Glynda is embarrassed and apologetic, tries to help Weiss get better
1313312313113111.content:
Glynda blinked slowly as her eyes alighted on an odd smear spread across the sole of her left foot, a mixture of tan and white partially covered by the putrid black muck emerging from her soles. For several long seconds she tried to process what exactly she was seeing, the stretched out nature of the strange smear’s limbs and body slowly coming into focus, together with its thoroughly flattened head face-first against the ball of her nyloned foot. White-hair was the final clue as the blonde realised that she was looking at what appeared to be a tiny flattened form of the missing heiress, completely immobile and wholly adhered to the sole of her sweaty left nylon.

Thinking perhaps she might have been seeing things, Glynda quickly put her foot back down and moved to check the other sole, pressing Weiss back into the ground as she shifted more of her weight to her left foot. Only once she had checked every inch of her right sole for any similar discolouration did the professor finally raise her left foot again, raising an eyebrow when she once again spied the form of the tortured fencer. Her mind whirred as she tried to process what exactly was going on here. The heiress was missing, yes, but the idea that this could be her, smeared across her nylon, was patently ridiculous. Surely there was a more reasonable explanation here. A prank by some student perhaps. An illusion of some nature. A sticker. Or maybe someone had drawn it on.

The obvious solution would be to probe this… thing with her fingers, but frankly right now Glynda wanted to touch those nylons as little as possible, so instead she stomped the foot back onto the ground and began forcibly dragging it back and forth across the carpet. To Weiss, for whom the last few seconds had caused nothing but confusion, this was a return to the hell she had so recently escaped, the overflowing sweat smearing further into her body while her skin burned from the friction between herself and the carpet. Blinded by the foot, the unfortunate girl could do little but wonder what the hell this woman was doing now, lacking the energy to even groan in protest.

Unfortunately for them both the grip of Glynda’s nylons was just too tight, and Weiss remained stuck, only being smeared worse by the violent treatment. Unwilling to give up so easily however, the blonde decided on another approach, raising her foot from the ground and giving the student a few seconds of belief before bringing it down on the sharp edge of the nearby coffee table and starting all over again. The professor ignored the sweaty marks she was leaving on the piece of furniture and the slight discomfort of the edge digging into her foot as she focused all of her attention on peeling off this persistent little sticker. For Weiss, what had been painful before became a hundred times worse as the hard surface of the table scrapped across her skin, rubbing her raw as it slowly began to peel her away. This torment was at least successful in finally ripping her free, lifting her edges slightly before completely removing her, but there was little comfort to be had, as Glynda remained oblivious to her success, continuing to furiously move her foot back and forth for another minute before finally lifting it away to survey her handiwork.

Disoriented and in pain, Weiss had been left as a smear across the edge of the table, her previously barely recognisable human features all but obliterated by the shifting foot, which had spread her out to cover several times her original surface area. The one saving grace was that she was now face-up, and though it hurt just to open her eyes she was finally able to see who it was that had so injured her, gazing into the stern face of her professor looking down at her. There was a frown on Glynda’s face as she examined her handiwork, sighing loudly as she realised that it was in fact just some kind of sticker, either stuck there accidentally or some form of prank by one of the students. Though she could not read her mind, somehow the heiress knew that this was perhaps her one and only chance to be saved, and put all of her effort into wiggling, shifting, anything to show that she was alive.

Exhausted and ready for sleep, Glynda was just about to look away in dismissal when Weiss was finally able to peel just one hand away, its movement limp and frail but entirely inconsistent with what one would expect from a mere sticker. The blonde’s thoughts from earlier returned all at once with a vengeance as she realised that perhaps this was, in fact, the missing girl she had been searching for most of that afternoon. Gasping in shock, she reached down to peel the tiny student off properly, sharp nails digging under the flattened skin and peeling the heiress free.

With what was a small movement for her, and a colossal shift for the half-inch Weiss clutched in her hand, Glynda fell back onto the couch, looking down at her bizarre find as the white-haired girl slowly began to reform. As time passed limbs reasserted themselves and other features began to fill out, making it more and more apparent that this was in fact a human-being, albeit one at an unusually tiny scale. The only question was, what exactly should Glynda do with her now?
1313312313113111.title: Spotted by the Professor

choices: Glynda decides to make Weiss work off her debt as her foot servant
Glynda decides to make Weiss a permanent slave to her feet
Glynda decides to get someone else to torment Weiss instead
13133123131131111.content:
Air filling her lungs for what felt like the first time in forever, Weiss struggled to climb to her feet, clinging briefly to one of her professor’s fingers before finally getting her bearings. It was incredibly surreal to be standing on the vast landscape of the blonde’s palm, but infinitely preferable to the situations she had found herself in earlier. Tired eyes looked up, hoping to see salvation, only for the tentative smile on her face to slip at the hard look she was receiving, following soon after by a sudden rush of gravity as the hand she was on tilted and sent her crashing to the couch below.

Dropping the tiny heiress without a second thought, Glynda allowed her expression to shift into a frown. When she had first looked at the shrunken student she had felt some degree of concern and guilt, but that had quickly given way to a rising sense of annoyance as she reflected on the last several hours of her life. Her day had already been long enough before she’d been assigned to search for Weiss with that bothersome sister of hers, and now she discovered that all those long hours of searching had been utterly pointless as the lost fencer had been in her shoe the whole time. Couldn’t she have done something to get her attention and save them all a lot of hassle?

And for that matter, how had the heiress ended up in her shoe in the first place? Had she been in there all day? Did she crawl in there herself? And why was she so small? All of those questions and more swirled in Glynda’s head and made her existing headache all the worse, only souring her mood further. Really, regardless of the specifics it was clear that Weiss had somehow managed to shrink herself and then get herself, deliberately or otherwise, ironed to the professor’s sweaty nylons. Most likely it was some short of foolish dust experiment gone wrong and an ill-though out attempt to seek help. That, or a deliberate attempt to sully the blonde’s reputation by branding her a kidnapper.

With that last thought flashing across her mind, any hope Weiss may have had of sympathy was lost as Glynda lifted her feet and planted them before the tiny girl, uncaring of the awful fumes that wafted from her flexing toes to pour over the defenceless heiress. Her soles had been sore even before that pointless search, and now they ached all over. As far as the larger woman was concerned this was entirely the wayward student’s fault, and there was only one way for her to make it up to her. “Ms Schnee. I don’t know how you did this to yourself, and frankly right now I don’t care. You’ve wasted valuable time today, and it’s only proper that I be the one to administer your punishment.” Moving her feet a bit closer, she flexed her toes once more. “Now, give me a foot massage.”

As the feet had closed in Weiss had stumbled back in fear, falling to her rear as the massive extremities hung above her, the dark spectres of her previous experience coming back to haunt her. Her shock and fear were enough that she almost missed the words that boomed from above, and even when they did register she couldn’t believe them at first. Punishment? She was going to be punished? She’d suffered under those horrendous nylons, in those horrendous sweat-filled heels for hours, wondering if she was ever going to escape that hell, and she was the one to be punished? The smell of them alone was already driving her mind back into the darkness, slowly breaking her inside as she remembered those long hours crying out for someone, anyone to save her from that pit.

If the circumstances were different, perhaps the heiress would have reacted differently. Been more composed in the face of such unfair expectations. But as it was, she had no energy left for diplomacy, no strength to put forward a composed argument. All she had was rage against an unfair world and the uncaring professor who sat so primly above her. “You… you bitch!! You goddamn bitch! Do you have any idea how much I’ve suffered beneath your feet already!? You’ve been crushing me for hours you stupid blonde bimbo!! Do you know how much you weigh!? All that fat in your breasts and butt must be making you slow if you think it makes any sense for you to punish me you cow!! You fu-ah.” Weiss’s anger and breath left her all at once as she finally registered the shift in her captor’s expression, the eyes that had been annoyed before shifting to a murderous glare in response to her ill-thought words. Suddenly realising what she had said, the tiny student scrambled to save face, backing away as she flung her arms up in defence. “Oh Oum, I’m sorry, I didn’t me-gah!”

The shrunken girl’s retreat was quickly halted as Glynda’s sweaty nylons slammed into her from both sides, coming together with a wet slap as they squelched Weiss’s vulnerable form between their overwhelming mass. All light instantly faded away, and the heiress’s senses were quickly overwhelmed with the horrendous smell and the foul feeling of the professor’s sweat and foot grime soaking into her body once more. Above, Glynda’s face was now fixed into a deep scowl that few had ever survived seeing, and all thoughts of mercy had well and truly fled her mind.
13133123131131111.title: Angering a Goddess

choices: Weiss does an inadequate job and Glynda starts to stomp her in retaliation
Weiss meets Glynda’s expectations and is given a chance to relax
Part way through the massage Glynda gets more actively involved
131331231311311111.content:
Glynda couldn’t believe the nerve of this girl. After all of the time and effort the academy had put into her training and education, to think that she would speak to a professor in such an appalling fashion. And such heinous words at that. After what had been said, the vindictive part of her wanted desperately to make this stuck-up little bitch pay in the worst way possible, to enslave her forever, or better yet, maybe to just dispose of her now. But even in the depths of intense anger, she was still a teacher, and she still held on to enough rationality to know that would be taking it too far. Still… she couldn’t just let Weiss get away with such conduct, not without meting out a severe punishment.

With the heiress firmly trapped between her nylons, Glynda started to rub her feet back and forth, now taking pleasure in the feeling of Weiss’s defenceless body being scrubbed between them. “Now listen up you bug. I was going to help you after just a short foot rub, but now I don’t think you deserve that sort of kindness. In fact, I don’t think you deserve any kindness at all.” The blonde emphasised her point by pressing her feet together harder, a smirk temporarily displacing her glare as she felt the fencer’s squishy body start to compact under the force. “So here’s how it’s going to work now. You’re going to serve my feet, serve me, in any way I desire, until I decide you’ve worked off your debt.” With one last squeeze, she separated her soles, allowing Weiss’s partially crushed body to peel off and fall listlessly to the couch below. “Do I make myself understood?”

Gasping for breath and struggling to her knees, the shrunken student looked up at her teacher with despairing eyes, ignoring the sweat that clung to her form. Her time between the feet had been mercifully brief, but the ease with which she had been crushed and dominated drove home how truly helpless she was before this massive being. More than anything Weiss wished she could take back the words she had said, but the hard edges of the gaze that met her chilled her to the bones, and she found herself nodding without a word, not yet willing to risk retaliation or further dispute.

Though she was pleasantly surprised at the acquiescence, Glynda didn’t allow her stern expression to slip, reaching down to slowly peel off her nylons, allowing her little servant to really drink in the sight as her incredibly sweaty soles were revealed to the world, bringing with them a wave of odour that would have repulsed the blonde if she wasn’t focused on Weiss’s torment. “Good. Then you can start by giving me the massage you should have before, except this time you can attend to my bare feet.” Lowering one foot, she pressed the toes into the couch, causing deep depressions and nearly sucking the tiny heiress in. “And you better do a good job too. If you do, this might all be over in a week. If you don’t…” The other foot came forward now, hovering menacingly over the stricken Weiss. “You might end up serving me for months or even longer. If you’re lucky that is.”

Weeks? Months!? When the professor had said she could work off her debt the fencer had assumed that meant hours, or a day at most. Now she was told that the bare minimum she could hope for was a week. It was too much, and tears started to stream down her pale cheeks as she looked up with pleading eyes between the outstretched toes of Glynda’s foot. “Professor please. I’m sorry! I swear I’ll do a good job, just please don’t punish me for s-gah!” Without hesitation the sole above her came down, and Weiss quickly found herself being rubbed between the couch and the sweaty appendage, a torment that continued for several long seconds before she was released.

Looking down between her toes at the soaked girl, Glynda sneered at the pathetic bug that had once been human, more than ready to just stomp her into oblivion if she tried to defy her again. “That was your last warning servant. Next time I’ll be adding a week to your punishment.”

With no more words to resist, and barely enough strength to stand, Weiss reluctantly nodded and stepped up to the nearest sole, pressing her hands into Glynda’s moist flesh and struggling not to vomit at the sweat that immediately coated her hands. She’d been crushed today more times than she could count, and most of that had been under the foot of this woman, but somehow the act of actively starting to rub her hands across the sole felt like it was the start of something new. Like the first step on a path from which she would never be able to escape. Like giving in. But her will to resist was well and truly broken, and above her revulsion and the tattered remains of her dignity, the thought that most dominated the heiress’s mind was a desire to do well and avoid punishment.

Though the fumes from the feet were already starting to mess with Weiss’s sense of balance she persevered, moving her hands up and down and left to right. The flesh of the blonde’s feet was firm yet giving, and the lubricant provided by her sweat made the process easier, but it was hard to tell whether she was making any appreciable impact. In the brief moments that the heiress glanced up the expression on Glynda’s face didn’t change, still glaring down at the tiny girl at her feet. The shrunken student’s fate now depended on whether or not she could satisfy her newfound master.
131331231311311111.title: From Bad to Worse

choices: Glynda is tired and forces Weiss to sleep in her nylons for the night
Glynda gives Weiss a second chance to redeem herself
Gynda punishes Weiss for her failure
1313312313113111111.content:
Unfortunately for the Schnee heiress, her efforts to please her new master were doomed to failure. At her normal height giving a foot massage would be no issue at all, but she wasn't normal sized anymore. She was a bug in a world of giants, and that meant she didn't have the capability to give Glynda the proper service she so desired. And that would spell disaster for ant-like girl.

No matter how hard she tried to get any sort of reaction from the giant above her, her face remained unchanged. Weiss would be the first to admit she wasn't the most physically imposing member of her team. The honor went to Yang. If she were in the shrunken girl's position right now she may be able to give the giant professor what she wanted, but Weiss wasn't Yang. That meant she just didn't have the strength for the job.

"Pathetic." Glynda whispered under her breath. Weiss still heard her clear as day however and when she did her eyes widen. Looking back at the giant's face, the Schnee heiress began tremble. Her usual scowl had deepened and her frigid eyes only seemed to grow colder. The look on the giant blonde's face said it all...Weiss had failed.

The shrunken Schnee started to back away in fear at the realization. She was too small to get the job done. It was then that Glynda's words from earlier came back to her. If she didn't do an adequate enough job then she would extend her punishment. Punishment that would stretch on for months or even longer. Again the snow-haired girl felt the tears streaming down her cheeks.

"I'm very disappointed in you Ms. Schnee." Glynda started. "I gave you a very simple command and yet you couldn't even do it properly." Her bare foot began to hover ominously over the shrunken girl who was now frozen in place by fear. "Between your disrespectful attitude and inability to complete a simple task, it's become quite clear to me that you need to be taught a lesson."

Weiss's trembling intensified.

"Your service to me will be extended." Glynda said firmly, her cold eyes glaring daggers into the miniscule girl.

"P-professor please--!" Weiss cried before she again found herself flattened under Goodwitch's sweat sole. Weiss was sure she was living in a nightmare, a nightmare she wanted so desperately to wake up from. The torture she had endure this day alone from Glynda's feet was astronomical. To think this kind of punishment would continue. She could do nothing was she was pressed firmly between the cushion and flesh, ground all about by the uncaring giantess.

"Why?" The heiress thought. "Why is this happening to me?"
1313312313113111111.title: Failure

choices: In she goes for the foreseeable future
Glynda is interrupted by a call, but maybe not enough to save Weiss
Glynda has actually made Weiss to share with a 'friend'
13133123131131111113.content:
The next time the foot was lifted off of Weiss she peeled off on the Cushion and simply lay there only to see Glynda with her crop in hand. She felt the force of it rip her away from the chair as the semblance took hold of her and she floated up to eye level with the glaring goddess. "Since you seem so insistent on being a pain in my ass perhaps I should get something out of it." She said and the Heiress started spinning in the air as she felt herself getting pulled out and expanding. She was so dizzy from it she couldn't even tell she had become a sphere nearly four times the size that her minuscule body had been. She racked her brain trying to figure out what Glynda meant by her statement when she saw she was drifting closer to a short cord with several balls attached there were several more of the balls slowly rotating around it and as they made their rotations the next biggest of them seemingly melded onto the cord due to Glynda's semblance. When she joined the balls rotating around the cord she realized what was happening and Glynda must have seen the look on her face.

"That's right Ms. Schnee, as you can see my semblance allows me to repair broken things provided I have the component parts. I've been missing a bead for ages but it seems you're just the right size now." She flicked her wrist and Weiss felt her body make contact with to cord and simply bond to it in the same way the other beads had she was about fourth from the end of the cord on either end. Glynda licked her lips in anticipation as the beads floated closer to her and she caught them with her hand. "This should be a sufficient job for you until I determine your behavior has gotten better, and you can hardly fail to act as one of my Anal beads unless you somehow break off." She explained while dripping some lube down from the top bead, and Weiss finally got to know what exactly it was she had been attached to and immediately started freaking out. The light movement that she did manage made Glynda giggle. "Save it for when you're on duty Ms. Schnee or hmm perhaps I should Just call you toy for now."

the words punctuated another bout of floating in the air for the poor beads while Glynda wiggled out of her cloths fully.
13133123131131111113.title: Glynda punishes Weiss for her failure

choices: Glynda removes Weiss from her toes and gives her a different task
Glynda falls asleep and Weiss somehow manages to wriggle free
Glynda falls asleep and her toes start to play with Weiss’s body
1313312313113111113.content:
If she was being honest then Glynda would say that she was enjoying the massage. It wasn’t a particularly strong feeling, but it was still enough to be appreciated, like a small animal creeping across her sole. But, after everything that Weiss had said, it didn’t seem like punishment enough. The heiress deserved to suffer for her arrogance and rudeness. She wasn’t in any particular hurry, so she let the girl struggle on for several minutes while she contemplated her fate, but eventually allowed an even crueller smirk to cross her face as she decided what her next actions would be.

From Weiss’s perspective there was no warning. One moment she was diligently attending to Glynda’s right sole, and the next she was being snatched up by the toes of the blonde’s left foot, her vision suddenly cut off as the powerful digits closed around her and she was instantly plunged into the sweaty crevice between the second and third toe. The smell here was far more intense than what had wafted off the sole, and the overflowing sweat now mixed with a thick coating of grime. Worse still, the voice that boomed from above confirmed that this had been no accident. “I think it’s time you really put your back into pleasing me bug. If you couldn’t make enough of an impact on my sole, perhaps you’ll do better work on my toes.” A slight tightening of the embrace ensured absolute attention. “Now be a good pet and lick up all my sweat and toejam. I want those toes spotless.”

If she had been repulsed before then Weiss was absolutely sickened now by the thought of so much as opening her mouth in this place. She’d barely been here a few seconds and already a thick layer of grime was beginning to soak into her body, not to mention the waves of sweat stinging her eyes and the absolutely dreadful odour assaulting her nostrils. Even her friends’ butts hadn’t been this bad. The idea of adding to that torment by exposing her delicate sense of taste to this monstrosity was just too much, and while the rational part of her brain knew the consequences, the heiress couldn’t overcome her instinct to escape and started to desperately wiggle in a doomed attempt to escape.

Predictably, Glynda did not take kindly to the tiny student’s attempt to break free, her toes instantly clamping down on the struggling fencer and compacting her into the sweaty folds of the crevice. It was like a vice had closed over every part of Weiss’s body as she found herself forced face-first into the deepest recesses of the blonde’s toes. A short-lived unclenching was following by another squeeze even more violent than the first, as her trailing limbs were flattened against the sweaty flesh of the toes to either side, forming a tight seal to keep the tortured heiress tightly in place. A dozen more ferocious clenches followed, smearing copious quantities of toejam across Weiss’s face and leaving her with no option but to swallow the lump forced into her throat and breathe in this stench directly from its source. The urge to vomit rose again, stronger than ever, but there was nothing the unfortunate girl could do when her body was in such a devastated state.

Of course, glaring down at her shifting toes with an icy face, Glynda cared not for the suffering she was inflicting on her student, absolutely convinced that she deserved every second of it. First she had wasted her time on a fruitless search and tried to pin the blame on her, then she had said such horrendous things, and now she was continuing to resist her rightful punishment. The professor only relented so that she would be heard, as she spread her toes and fixed her eyes on Weiss’s crushed remains. “I warned you. Your disobedience has now earned you another week of torment. At this rate you’ll be lucky if you manage to get free by the end of the month. Now. Lick. My. Toes.”

It took several long seconds for Weiss’s body to pull itself back together, though thankfully Glynda was at least reasonable enough to wait for the process to complete. She was still a bit flattened, and pretty sure some parts of her were still adhered to the toes, but as they came back together and the light disappeared, the shrunken student reluctantly extended her tongue and started to lick. It was… horrible, to say the least. She’d gotten a small taste before, but even that couldn’t compare to actually running her tongue across the moist and filthy flesh. As the seemingly endless supply of toejam started to fill her mouth, it felt like the taste of it was going to become permanently ingrained on her tongue, and no matter how quickly she tried to swallow, the feeling would linger in her mouth until the next mouthful made itself known. In no time at all she felt her stomach fill with the putrid detritus of her professor’s toes, but the moment her licking slowed a slight tightening of the walls around her spurred her into a renewed vigour. She’d just have to find more room.

Pleased that she was finally starting to get her way, Glynda lent back to relax, propping her feet up on the arm of the couch as she spread herself out, keeping her head just elevated enough that she could still keep an eye on her toes and their tiny servant. The massage had been good, but this was quite possible one of the best things that she had ever felt, and the massive blonde sighed in contentment as she enjoyed the suffering of the shrunken Schnee. If she had known that this was what it would feel like she would have found some way to shrink the students herself. In fact, she rather fancied the idea of doing that now. Maybe adding a few of the less worthwhile students to her little collection. Later though, for now she just wanted to enjoy this. “Hmmm… good. You better get used to this my servant. You’ll be spending a lot of time with my toes, and my sweat and toejam will be your only food from now on, so if you want to survive you better eat up.”

Hearing those words, hot tears ran down Weiss’s smeared cheeks, mixing with the abundant sweat of her captor’s feet that had by now soaked into every bit of her body from head to toes. It was now clear that Glynda had no intention of ever relenting in this torment unless she was given absolute obedience, and the shrunken heiress doubted she would ever be able to fully meet the vindictive woman’s expectations. If things kept going like this, she would spend the rest of her life servicing the blonde’s whims, never again being able to see her friends and loved ones. Her only real hopes were either to find a way to escape or to do a good enough job to earn some small degree of lenience.
1313312313113111113.title: Between the Toes

choices: No, but she has at least reformed (to an extent)
Yes, but may have sacrificed some height as she pulled herself from the nylons
1313312313113113.content:
If Weiss could cry right now, she most likely would have done. Unfortunately, the sheer amount of force and punishment put on her by Goodwitch had left her to the point where the heiress became barely more than a slight discolourment on the professor's garments. The girl was now only physically able to use her five basic senses, and anything else could only be shown within her own mind, though even that was difficult with the onslaught of smell and pain from the past few hours.

         Even with Glynda's eyes passing her by, ignoring her, was not a surprise to the poor Schnee. At this point the chances of her reforming into to anything remotely human shaped seemed astronomically slim, even if Goodwitch left her tights alone for the night. "What would I even do if I did reform?", the Schnee thought to herself. It wasn't hard to see where she was coming from, after all her experiences up to this point. Not a single moment has been pleasant since she became like... this. A lot of it involved her becoming the prey of some oblivious, heavy footsteps, and the heiress' interactions with Goodwitch sealed it. She hated everything about it. People who she would hold a pleasant conversation with normally were not unyielding giants that ignored the tiny heiress' pleas at every turn.

         Weiss didn't even flinch as she saw Glynda remove her focus from the nylons, confirming for herself that she was simply unrecognisable, though at least it seemed as if the heiress was going to finally be seperated from those monsterous soles. After some slight struggles, the nylons are thrown to the floor non-chalantly, leaving Weiss at the bottom of the heap, almost like a last little remnant of punishment to finish off for the day. For the heiress, it was hell again, but at least this gave her a few hours to try and give one more push to try and reform once again.

Question is, will Weiss be able to remove herself from the witch's nylons?
1313312313113113.title: Spread too Thin

choices: As tall as the nail of her big toe (about 1-2cm)
13133123131131132.content:
After what seemed like a near eternity of effort, Weiss had finally started to wriggle loose from her stinky dwellings. After only a few minutes longer, she finally breaks out of her containment, dropping the short distance to the floor. Immediately, she starts to make her way out of the nylon prison, her mind going wild at the chance that this might be her chance to finally get some help, even if it was only slight.

         Upon leaving, the Schnee laughs to herself in pure joy for finally having control of herself after so long. Her smile fades a little, however, as she feels like there is something different about the world around her now. It all seemed, a little bit more... dominating. It clicks for her, that she may have gotten smaller after she removed herself from the nylons. Perhaps small parts of her had broken off in the struggle? The heiress hoped that this wouldn't have a lasting effect on her full height, though she quickly returned her attention to now, as movement seemed to be coming from the bed that Goodwitch had been sleeping upon.


As the professor got up to her full height and walked towards the heiress and the nylons, the Schnee realised that she was now...
13133123131131132.title: A Whole New Digusting World

choices: ...braves the outdoor world, come what may
...stays behind, hoping for some possible help from the professor
131331231311311322.content:
The heiress almost screamed on the spot as the titanic professor lumbered towards the tiny girl, stopping just before her in order to grab the nylons she had left on the floor, her toes dominating Weiss in height several times over. The haunting scene was over rather quickly, as Goodwitch rose back up to leave the room quickly, probably to get it cleaned as soon as possible to stop the smell from getting worse. It did not however, protect the Schnee from getting one last helping of foot stench from the collossal older woman as she passed over her.

         Weiss took this brief period of calm to think of how to do things from here. Does she leave on her own? If she remembers correctly, Goodwitch sleeps on campus, though that makes for a dangerous if. Even if it was still at Beacon, everyone would be huge now, even the shorter students, like Ruby or Nora, would probably mess her up completely without a second thought.

         On the other hand, she could stay with Goodwitch and try to either get her attention, or hitch a ride to somewhere in Beacon, at least. But then there's the risk of re-entering her shoe again, which is not something Weiss was completely comfortable with putting up with again, especially at this new stature.

With all of that in mind, Weiss...
131331231311311322.title: Dominated by her toes (about 0.5-1mm)

choices: Weiss is tossed out of the window
1313312313113113221.content:
Weiss shuddered, the idea of being under someone like Goodwitch again kept flooding into her mind. Giving a defeated huff, Weiss gathered her courage as she looked towards the door. At this size, it appeared to be miles away- a distant objective. Shaking her self, she decided to begin the trek.

Adventuring alone at this size prooved to be more difficult then poor Weiss thought. Slight gusts of wind threatened to blow her away, distant footfalls from Glenda would either toss her closer to her objective or further away. The frustration at not being able to make progress on her own slowly made poor Weiss more and more frustrated. After a while, Glenda's footfalls fell too close to comfort.
"I- just want to leave-" Weiss complained, looking up.

BANG

The giant teacher slammed something near the tiny snowflake. Weiss's stomach dropped as she saw a large fan placed in-front of her.
"N-no! Wait!" She cried out, running as hard as she could to get out of the way while Goodwitch simply plugged the device in and turned the power on.

The blades quickly began to spin, giving the professor a nice cool breeze. She watched it oscillate for a moment before heading off to make lunch- unaware of the tiny Weiss screaming for help as she was ripped from the carpet and blasted into the air like a spec of dust.
1313312313113113221.title: Insane dreams- Weiss is too small

choices: Weiss lands directly onto Coco's boot.
Coco catches Weiss at the height of her stride, and she goes flying.
13133123131131132211.content:
For the mini heiress, the roaring power of Goodwitch's household fan had forced her straight out of the window. It was at this moment where Weiss truly understood how much trouble she was in. She had already dealt with one change in perspective just yesterday, but now everything had changed once more, and now everyone around her was a looming monolith with enough weight and strength to squish the heiress into nothing in the space of a second. On top of this, the people speaking around her were unbearable as their voices boomed with a heavy bass-like tone, and the sounds of their feet moving around weren't any more bearable, with every footfall shaking the heiress to her core.

         After having a few seconds to recover from her fall from the window, Weiss believes she has recognised someone from Beacon. It takes the vaguely familiar figure a couple more terrifying steps before Weiss recognises the giantess as... Coco! The heiress was about to start running up to her, until she remembered that this gigantic woman was part of the torment she had endured yesterday and was none the wiser. Thus the chances of the older student noticing the micro-sized snowflake were far lower now that she was even smaller than before.

         However, Weiss refused to let the opportunity go to waste despite how horrifyingly imposing Coco was to her now. With all her strength, she uses her glyphs to create a quicker, and slightly higher route to the older girl's boots. The ice princess had ascended by a couple of centimeters before...
13133123131131132211.title: The Great Outdoors

choices: Weiss attempts to shout out to Glynda again.
Weiss attempts to jump off the piece of food.
13133123131131132213.content:
Weiss groaned as she slowly got up, the pain from the impact lingered as she slowly stood up, surveying her surroundings, she couldn’t exactly tell where she was. Looking up, however, she saw Glynda, casually putting a fork, with a bit of skewered steak, straight into her mouth, chewing and swallowing and then leaning towards Weiss with the fork. Seeing the giant eat made Weiss’ surroundings immediately click in her mind, she was on top of a piece of the steak Glynda was eating, and this was also confirmed by the fork stabbing almost directly next to Weiss, before being cut around with a knife and slowly being lifted.

Weiss screamed her lungs out in terror as she slowly was lifted towards the mouth of Glynda, her lips slightly parting, allowing Weiss to see the dark cavern of her throat, strands of saliva hanging from the top of her mouth, her massive tongue licking her lips as the fork, and Weiss, made their way to the mouth. Weiss was petrified, just the thought alone of being eaten, digested as if she was nothing more than a meal, terrified her greatly, however before she could be chowed down, her instinct kicked in, she couldn’t just sit here and be eaten, so she began to scream at the top of her lungs for Glynda's aid, hoping she’d be heard and saved. however Weiss’ pleas went unnoticed, and she was more than halfway towards the maw of her teacher now, in barely a few seconds she’d be nothing more than a topping for this giantess' meal; she had to do something…
13133123131131132213.title: Weiss lands on Goodwitch's food

131331231311313.content:
Weiss slowly slipped away from the disgusting feet, sprawling onto the ground with a wet slap before weakly watching her giantess teacher slip on the heels and storm away.
"Oh- thank god-" The tiny sighed, collapsing into a heap without the power to move before the sound of foot steps approached once more as Weiss slowly remembered where she was. The usually agile dust user struggled to role out of the way, only managing to role onto her back as the foot of Cinder entered her vision, the normally immaculate foot caked in dirt after a session of exercise. Too weak to move, the white haired tiny gazed at the foot for a moment before it smashed down upon her, grinding down into the mat sadistically before twisting off, leaving the dirty mark of the unsurprised hero splattered near the edge of the mat.

Groaning softly and in sore need of a shower, Weiss gazed blankly upwards as she saw a girl she barely recognized. Hope flooded the tiny stains mind as the green eyes of the girl locked onto her with a slightly perplexed expression, the girls twin tales bounced merrily as she hopped down on one knee, reaching a slender hand down towards the tiny creature. Weiss smiled, not noticing the flash of brown and light violate in the girls eyes as she gripped the gummy mess.

Neo stood back up, not fazed my the squelchy of her toy as she recognized her foes features moving. Snickering with a feeling of superiority of finally being bigger then someone she casually pinched her toys cheek sadistically.
"Are you coming...?" Cinders voice chirped out, snapping Neo out of her trance before nodding to the smoldering girl awaiting by the doorway. With one final sneer downwards to her competitor the disguised Neo quickly slipped off her shoe, preferring the gym equipment to the mats she hadn't bothered to take it off. Weiss could only weakly shake her head as Neo tipped her hand towards the entrance of her shoe, giving a not so friendly wave before the tiny girl fell in with a wet slap. Weiss only got a brief break before the shredded sock wound around Neo's foot crammed into her, the sweat and stench rivaling even Glynda as she wriggled her foot into the well worn sock.

Cinder didn't bother questioning her quiet ally as she watched her wander back towards the base. The leader of the plan shrugged before heading into the showers with her wash cloth, not giving the girl a second thought.

Weiss was in hell as the foot continued to pump her into the worn insole, if she ever managed to get into a better position the dexterous toes would simply clamp down on her, threatening to drag the poor girl into one of the frayed holes in the worn down socks. Not able to take it anymore, the ice girl desperately groped the foot, giving a tiny lick in hope of being relieved of her duty.

Neo on the other hand enjoyed her walk home, taking the scenic route and actually enjoying nature. She even considered trying to strike up a conversation with one of Weiss's old team mates- but what would she say? The girl smirked before forcibly changing it to a friendly smile as Ruby passed by. Her toes clenched around her toys tongue with confidence as she reached her room. The only question was- what to do now?

Her shoes dropped to the ground, soon followed by the limp flat mess Weiss had become. Neo's eyebrows raised as she watched the tiny girl panting for breath, poking her flattened toy with a tiny smile before considering her options. Perhaps she should make this girl her slave? How much does the girl stretch? Could I make her obey my commands with just a point of a finger? Perhaps she could get the others to use her with Cinders manipulative help? Or even disguise the tiny girl as something others could use... Neo's brain conducted idea after idea before eventually grabbing onto one-

Weiss could only watch as the girls face got more and more Sinister before finally uttering a small laugh from her otherwise quiet mouth. Her hand reached down happily for her flattened toy as she decided to-
131331231311313.title: Neo finds Weiss

choices: Neo has turned Weiss into Adam and gives her to Blake
Neo has turned Weiss into Neo herself and gives her to Yang
Other options for Weiss and Neo
1313312313113132.content:
Neo smirked maliciously as she snatched up the partially reformed Weiss, enjoying the squishy texture of the girl’s skin as her fingers wrapped around the heiress’s puny body. However, as much as the prospect of torturing the tiny girl herself, with or without the assistance of her team, excited her, she knew she would take even more pleasure in watching the girl be tormented by her own friends and teammates. After all, there was nothing the short girl liked better than watching friends come to blows, whether they were aware of the conflict or not.

Pinching her toy’s feet between the thumb and pointer of one hand and crushing her head between the thumb and pointer of the other, Neo pulled her hands apart, and watched with glee as the little girl was stretched out to a good few inches. It seemed she was quite malleable, good.

The thing about Neo’s illusion powers is that they were absolute. They didn’t just affect what people saw, but what they heard and felt as well. Even what the smelled and tasted was affected. Her illusions were strong enough that even the sharp senses of a Faunus could be fooled into thinking there was a living breathing person standing in front of them when in fact there was nothing but air, and the illusions only became stronger when they were anchored to a physical form. Once complete, anyone affected by the illusion would see what she wanted them to see, hear what she wanted them to hear, smell what she wanted them to smell and feel what she wanted them to feel.

So, as Neo happily started to squish and stretch Weiss between her hands like a tiny little stress toy she began to work her magic on the tortured girl, even her own senses losing track of pale white hair, torn clothes and porcelain skin as the shape and the feel of the girl altered before her very eyes. Finally dropping the girl onto her bed she smirked even wider as the illusion took full effect, and she found herself looking down at a tiny and thoroughly squished copy of […].

Taking a moment to admire her work as the disguised Weiss struggled to reform, Neo put a stop to any hope of escape by slamming her hand down on top of her newfound toy and ground the palm around until the fencer was reduced to a flat disk. Peeling the flat form from the bed she slid her captive into her shirt pocket and set out in search of the heiress’s next tormentor.

But who has Neo turned Weiss into, and who does she intend to give her to?
1313312313113132.title: Neo’s Fun and Games

13133123131131321.content:
Neo smiled, booping the little bump in her pocket with a grin before setting out. Her breasts slowly shrank a little as the dress tightened, as soon as Neo left the room she looked and sounded like Weiss herself.

At some point, the real Weiss had been knocked unconcious. Her body struggled to stand as she slowly took in her surroundings.
"Neo..? Wait- isn't this-" Weiss tried to speak, but found her voice had gone missing. Covering her mouth momentarily, she had thought she heard Neo mention turning her into Adam, however her body looked the same to her. "What the..." Weiss tried to mutter as she looked towards a conveniently placed mirror ({ossibly positioned by Neo herself). Weiss internally screamed as she saw Adam looking back at her, followed by a gasp from someone entering the room.

Too distracted about the strange circumstances, Weiss didn't notice the door open. There stood a shocked Blake, looking confused followed by a mix of concern and anger. A sigh of relief flooded over the tiny girl as she attempted to shout and wave, before the colour left her face. She looked exactly like Adam. Panicing, she turned and ran towards the edge, planning to escape and find a way of communicating later. The tiny girl knew she didn't stand much chance though as after just a few steps a hand slammed down on the desk infront of her.

"Adam...?" Blake growled, her head tilted upwards to try and intimidate the tiny being. "What are you doing here? Here to hurt my friends again?" The cat faunus paused, waiting for an answer from the stunned 'boy' that gazed up paralized in fear. "Further more- why are you shrunk?"

Weiss eventually snapped out of her stupor, trying desperately to say something as her legs wobbled around the desk. Blake frowned, glancing around the room for something to tie her prisoner up. Jumping to her feet, Weiss attempted to scrabble away while she had the chance. She knew Neo wasn't far and that that devious girl wouldn't let her communicate with Blake. Even if she did manage to say something right now, what's to say that Blake will be safe from the evil doer

Sadly, she only managed to crawl a few steps before getting crushed by a large weight.

In Blakes rage and split second judgement, she had grabbed the closest thing to her and slammed it down on the tiny 'Adam'. Rubies worn down slipper had meant to be a warning shot, something to stop 'Adam' in his tracks. However, the surprising situation and the unplanned action had caused the giant girl to misjudge her attack. Anger flooded out of Blake to be replaced with remorse and fear. She wasn't a killer like Adam.

Slowly lifting the slipper up, fully expecting a bloodstain, she was happily surprised to see an Adam shaped sticker slowly trying to reform.

Watching for a few moments while trying to understand the situation, Blake slowly smiled.
"Talk Adam-" She frowned, slapping the slipper into her other hand.
13133123131131321.title: Neo has turned Weiss into Adam and gives her to...

131331231311313211.content:
Before Weiss could do anything, Blake picked her up. The much larger girls grip squeezed her like a stress toy as the faunus tried to restrain herself.
"Why are you here...?" Blake frowned, glancing the tiny over, "I swear- I'll crush you into paste if you did anything to my friends-" The growl in her voice never subsided. Weiss tried to say something, surprised to find a voice finally coming out. However, it was not her own.

"What if I did? I'm immortal you bitch- chew me out, swallow me hole- I'll just come back better then ever" Weiss heard herself yell in Adams voice, in panic Weiss began to struggle, hoping to free her arms so that she could at least cover her mouth. "Hell, you even stood on me once on my way down. Almost broke... it" Weiss internally screamed as Blakes face darkened.

Neo was loving life, standing just outside the window while checking her nails. Her mouth moved yet the words she spoke were coming in through the open window. She rolled her head with a giant smile on her face- rolling her tongue in joy as she finished off with, "You biiiiiiiiiiiiitch". Opening her compact, she slyly used the mirror out of curiosity. Watching the angered girl and the tiny Adam doll.

"Invincible?" Blake's face reddened, "Fine- great- then I don't need to worry about killing you-". Weiss could only weakly kick her legs before Blakes fingers curled over her, squeezing the poor girl like an actual stress toy. Unable to do anything, the tiny Weiss could only wait for it to be over as she was compacted into a ball. Using both hands, the giant Blake attempted to make good on her promise of turning 'Adam' into paste.

Crushed, mashed and dashed between her friends angered grip, she felt her stomach soon drop as she was suddenly slammed into the floor.

The battered ball weakly looked upwards, her eyes travelling up the black and white outfit Blake always wore.
"Wait- Blake-" Weiss tried to speak, gazing into the annoyed eyes of her giant friend before being cast into shadows by the giant girls boot. Small pieces of debris fell from the chunky thing before it slammed down.

It was by far the worst pressure she had experienced so far, where as the girls on the mats were just walking, Blake was currently shifting all of her weight into destroying the ball. Twisting the boot into the crushed ball for a few seconds before lifting her foot off.

Weiss twitched, her flattened form struggling to get off the ball of the boot. Blake gave a helpful shake, tossing the disk to the ground before aiming her chunky heel. Weiss gazed, wide eyed, at the rubber heel for a moment before trying again the shout out. "BLAKE!"

Neo bit her bottom lip as she watched the harsh stomping session. This was turning out way better then expected! The flattened toy slowly lost all features as it was twisted into the dirt on Blakes shoe.
"Geez- she has some issues" Neo smiled, watching the faunus peel the Adam off. Awaiting a response.

However, none came.

"I can seriously do worse-" Blake spoke, "Did you do" the cat girl took a breath, "Anything to my friends?"

Time ticked by, no answer. Thinking about tossing him on the floor and stepping on him again crossed Blakes mind, the ass deserved it. It didn't seem to be working though, she might need to try something... else.
131331231311313211.title: Blake interrogates

choices: Place Adam in the back of her panties
1313312313113132112.content:
Adam remained silent, tormenting the giantess Blake as her head ran wild with what could be his plan.
"I saw Ruby and Yang at the gym earlier" Blake frowned, "But... Weiss was no where to be found". Her stomach dropped as she saw the slowly reforming Adam noticeably react.

"I'm Weiss!" Weiss tried to say, trying desperately to communicate as Blakes toes curled within her boots. It was no use however as Blake picked the tiny girl up.
"I swear- if you've done anything I will flush you down the toilet" the flustered Blake moved to look for her friend, but not before placing the tiny in a 'safe place' "I was coming back from the gym for a shower, but I think I'll skip it-" She spoke, approaching the door. Her stomach growled.
1313312313113132112.title: Try to gross him out
