Neo turns Weiss into Cardin and gives her to Pyrrha, Nora or both
Neo has other intentions for Weiss (Writer’s Choice)
13133123131131323.content:
When she had first made her decision to let the little heiress be tortured by someone else, Neo had immediately thought of the girl’s two older teammates. Both were bigger and more curvaceous than Weiss even when they were all at full size, and she would take great pleasure in watching them annihilate the little toy of a girl beneath their curves and/or trampling feet.

But maybe there were other alternatives to the obvious. Though younger and smaller their team leader was still much much bigger than the shrunken student and Neo would take great pleasure in watching the naïve girl torture her best friend, provided she could successfully trick her into doing so.

Or maybe she could go beyond their team and let someone else have a turn. Pyrrha from Team JNPR was a solid option, taller than any of Weiss’s teammates and a match for Blake and Yang in curves. The girl was also a hard-worker who would undoubtedly have plenty of opportunities to torture the tiny girl. Alternatively, the shorter but highly energetic Nora would also be a solid choice, and likely a very enthusiastic one, provided she was given a suitable motivation. Or maybe both at once?

But why stop there. Those who knew Weiss well would have the best chance of figuring out the illusion, if for no other reason than they might notice that the girl had disappeared around the same time that their toy had appeared. There were plenty of other students at the school to choose from, and she could also target one of the professors or another staff member.

She could even crush her into an envelope and mail her to someone outside of the school.

Who did Neo ultimately choose to change Weiss into and who is she delivered to?
13133123131131323.title: Who Has Weiss Become?

131331231311313231.content:
Neo arrived at Team RWBY's room and went to open the door, stopping before she did. Neo thought for a second, wouldn't they eventually notice their teammates disappearance though? Suddenly a spark of genius hit her as she slyly grinned down at the tiny 'Torchwick'.

Weiss was on the verge of tears, she had been crushed, flattened and now she was in the hands of this criminal. Well, that wouldn't matter, eventually her team would notice her being gone, and with that though a spark of hope filled Weiss' heart. That spark was abruptly stamped out as she suddenly realized she wasn't in Neo's palm anymore, she was in... her own palm.

Neo couldn't believe what a smart idea she had, who better to trick Ruby into torturing Weiss, than Weiss herself? She prepared an illusion voice and practiced some lines, she wasn't use to this talking thing after all. Weiss' couldn't believe it, there was no hope for her now, she fell to her knees as tears started to form in her eyes when suddenly Neo pushed the door open.

"WEISS!" cried Ruby as she threw herself at Neo hugging her tightly "We were looking everywhere for you!". Neo staggered back before getting into character "w-Well you mustn't of looked very hard then" she muttered condescendingly. Ruby sighed "You never change do you?" "Nope!" Neo chirped back. "So... where were you then?" Ruby asked quizzically.

Does Neo Show Ruby the tiny Weiss and trick her into torturing her?
Or does she offer Ruby a foot massage, massaging Weiss into her leader's foot?
131331231311313231.title: Neo turns Weiss into Roman and gives her to Ruby

choices: Let Ruby use Weiss as her insole!
Peel her off for some more ideas!
1313312313113132312.content:
"Oh, just down at the library" Neo lied "Are you kidding me?" cried Ruby "I looked there twice!" Ruby sat down on Weiss' bed falling backwards to lay down "Aw man, I was looking for you for hours and you were there the whole time?" "yup" Neo casually responded "I even went down to the city! Aw, and my feet are killing me now..." Ruby moaned. This gave Neo an idea. And it would be fun.

Neo knelt down in front of Ruby and picked up her right booted foot. Ruby raised her head "Weiss? What are you doing?" "Well..." Neo started, untying Ruby's boot laces "Since you went to so much trouble for me, the least I can do is repay you." She slid the boot off and now held Ruby's bare nylon covered foot in her hands. The smell hit Neo and it was bad, Ruby had really worked up a sweat looking for Weiss and her foot was quite warm and uncomfortably moist. Weiss would not enjoy what Neo had planned. "What do you mean Wei-" Neo cut her off by pushing her thumbs into Ruby's sole.

"Ah!" Ruby cried in surprise ecstasy falling back down again as Neo worked her sole with her fingers "W-Weiss, you don't have to-" "Do you want me to stop?" Neo cut in, Ruby blushed "N-no" "Well then..." Neo continued to massage Ruby's foot into a state of bliss for a good ten minutes before removing her left boot and giving that foot the same treatment, ten minutes. Neo didn't particularly like this girl, but her moans of pleasure were quite cute.

'But now comes the real fun part' Neo thought to herself. She started to pull Ruby's Nylons off "W-WEISS!" Ruby cried, sitting up and grabbing her nylons "W-What are you doing?" Neo rolled her eyes and, one hand still on the nylons, started to work Ruby's toes. It was to much for the girl as she fell back down biting her lip. Neo pulled Ruby's nylons off and held the feet in front of her with one hand, while the other reached into her pocket and pulled out Weiss. She had heard everything and so when she was pulled out she could guess Neo's plan. She looked up at the grinning face. "p-please don't" she whimpered.

Neo held Ruby's now bare right foot and casually pushed Weiss' tiny form face first right into the center of Ruby's sole causing Ruby to moan in pleasure. She worked and mushed the girl until she was flattened to the sole and stuck to it. Weiss received a face-full of flesh as she was pushed into Ruby's warm sweaty sole. She tried to struggle and scream but she was powerless to stop Neo's fingers as they pushed her into Ruby's foot flesh and all her screaming did was let some of Ruby's foot sweat slip into her mouth. She started to cry as Ruby's foot sweat started to burn her eyes. Weiss began to beg "Ruby... please" and almost on queue to really rub it in Ruby started to moan "Mmm, t-thank you Weiss..."

Neo watched as Ruby bit her lip and stretched her toes with bliss, she loved how much pleasure Ruby was getting out of her friends pain without even knowing it. But what to do next?

Leave Weiss there for Ruby to squish her unaware?
Or peel her off for some more fun?
1313312313113132312.title: Give Ruby a foot massage!

choices: Neo turns Weiss into Pyrrha and gives her to Penny
131331231311313233.content:
Neo thought about what other students she could give Weiss over to. There was that girl Penny who was close to Team RWBY, when they thought no one was watching them, but was closer to Ruby than the other members. Close enough to crush Weiss' spirit but not close enough to really take too much notice of her absence. What made it all the better was knowing how heavy Penny really was. She looked like an average girl, but no one in combat class was able to come close to lifting her. No one knew the real reason. That she was an android built by Atlas. All that weight coming down on the Schnee heiress made Neo laugh to herself.

But who to make her look like? Most of the RWBY and JNPR girls had enemies, but outside that there were mostly rivals and opponents.

That was when a thought came to her. A devious and evil one. It didn't have to be a flat-out enemy to make Penny unknowingly toy with Weiss, just simply someone who angered her.

She had the perfect person in mind. Pyrrha Nikos. The only person who could beat Penny in a combat match (who wasn't holding back). Penny tried to hide it, but she always seemed upset whenever the Mistral champion used her Semblance, probably messing with her programming. It wouldn't take too much convincing to get Penny to toy with a miniature version of Pyrrha. It even worked in her favour; when Penny would see Pyrrha at Beacon, she'd think there were no consequences for messing with the toy.

Neo could even do an illusion on herself. Make herself look like Ruby and give away this toy to her friend-when it was really Neo giving Weiss away to an eternity of being a toy.

Did she decide to give Weiss-made to look like Pyrrha-to Penny?
131331231311313233.title: Neo has other intentions for Weiss (Writer’s ...

choices: Neo keeps Weiss for Beacon girls.
Neo sends Weiss to someone else
1313312313113132332.content:
Neo bit her lip and shook her head. No. Too much of a risk. Atlas specialists could be checking up on Penny regularly and discover the toy, not to mention that Penny might let a secret slip to Ruby. She'd go with something else.

There were two choices ahead of her. The first was to go for one of the girls in Beacon-whether students or staff-or go with someone outside of Beacon. Someone Weiss' age or someone older, she didn't know, but either she'd have Weiss at Beacon-to be a toy of CFVY or Goodwitch-and hope that the illusion would keep suspicions away from the toy being seen as Weiss, and see the torture up close, or play it safe and send her to one of the students at the other schools (like the girls from Team NDGO, ABRN, Neon and Ciel from Atlas, or even Cinder or Emerald) or someone from the outside like Raven Branwen, Winter Schnee, maybe Belladonna's mother overseas, or even Salem herself. It'd keep Weiss' friends from finding her, but then Neo would have to either go with her to see the torture, or rely on whoever she sent Weiss to for details on her torture.

She had to decide quick. Weiss was going back to her original shape in the shirt pocket and Neo had better things to do than to shape her again and again while thinking of a plan.

What did she do?
1313312313113132332.title: Neo has other plans

choices: Neo turns Weiss into a Cinder-look-alike (not perfect) and gives her to Glynda
Neo decides to give Weiss to either Coco or Velvet
13133123131131323321.content:
It was obvious. What would be the point in having someone else abuse Weiss if Neo wouldn't be able to watch as much of it as possible? Nope. Weiss was going to stay right here at Beacon and get toyed with by one of her friends. Just not someone who knows her as well as her teammates or Pyrrha or Nora. Someone who'd be busy with their own stuff to get as involved in finding Weiss as the others.

So who would it be? Neo had two thoughts in mind; the first was Glynda Goodwitch and the second was either Coco or Velvet.

Goodwitch definitely appealed to Neo's inner (and outer) sadist. Weiss looked up to Goodwitch as a role model and the teacher was always moving around, fixing up the damage left by students and training for the next big threat, so there were plenty of ways to torture Weiss. Neo already had the perfect identity for Weiss in mind. Goodwitch had a few fights with Cinder-although the former didn't know that her enemy was in fact Cinder-and probably wanted some payback for all the trouble she caused.

It'd need Cinder's help, the woman knew how to manipulate, but Neo was tempted by the thought of Goodwitch looking at this toy who had once been a threat to Remnant and punishing her in every way possible. The illusion would need to make her look similar to Cinder, but Goodwitch never saw the face. Only the hair and eyes. The rest could be made to look different enough from Cinder.

But would Cinder help? She had a big ego and might not even like the idea of even an illusion of a look-alike being made to submit and be tortured. It might be safer to go with either Coco or Velvet.

So would Neo go with Goodwitch?
13133123131131323321.title: Neo keeps Weiss for Beacon girls.

choices: Neo gives Weiss to someone at Beacon for the Vytal Festival.
Neo sends Weiss away in a letter immediately. Who does she arrive to?
13133123131131323322.content:
Okay, she had to play it safe. It meant she'd not get to see Weiss break into nothing, unless it happened quick, but Neo was going to make sure that Weiss never got to see her friends again. She'd spend the rest of her days being a toy for someone else, who wouldn't even see her as Weiss. Or maybe Neo wouldn't even disguise Weiss in an illusion-depending on who she sent her to-and simply send her to be a toy for her new owner to toy and play with as they wished.

The last question-over than who she'd actually give Weiss to-was whether to give Weiss away to someone around Weiss' age and here for the Vytal Festival, or to send her off immediately to someone outside of Beacon, or outside Vale itself.

She'd at least see some of Weiss' torture if she gave Weiss to someone who only went to another combat school, but that kept the risk of being discovered or Weiss finding a way back to her friends. But then she'd be relying on someone else for details on the toy itself if she sent Weiss away immediately-illusion or not, whoever she decided to send her away to.

Team ARBN or Neon might be bitter about their losses, the former knew that RWBY were close to SSSN who embarrassed them and the latter could have a dark playful side. There was May from Team BRNZ who could be bitter over what Nora did-maybe have Weiss look like her and let the sniper play with her. Maybe she could make Weiss look like Ruby and have Ciel play with her, or have her look like herself or Ruby and give her to Cinder and/or Emerald as a gift. She could get a close look at Weiss being broken and play a part too.

If she gave Weiss away abroad, there were options. Or she could make Weiss look like the youngest Schnee sibling Whitley and give her to Winter. The older sister she looked up to so much would treat her like scum, all the better to break her. Or give her to the Belladonna matriarch in Menagerie; the Schnee heiress might get tortured, or a new shape could be given if Neo felt like it. Raven Branwen and Salem were cruel mistresses, whatever Weiss looked like, which would only be fun to imagine, even if Neo wouldn't know too much. Or maybe she'd send her wherever and let the lucky person decide the toy's fate.

Neo only needed a few seconds to make up her mind and decide Weiss' fate.
13133123131131323322.title: Neo sends Weiss to someone else

choices: Neo turns Weiss into Penny or Ruby and gives her to Ciel (Writer's Choice)
Neo decides to go with a different girl.
131331231311313233221.content:
Come on. Neo had to have some fun while at Beacon and she might as well use the toy in her pocket. Sending her away would mean Neo wouldn't be able to watch the breaking and torture.

So it was going to be someone here for the Vytal Festival. Not Penny, since she was too close to Team RWBY, and was watched too often, but maybe her partner instead.

Ciel Soleil did a bad job of hiding her irritation at Penny always sneaking off and Neo could exploit that. The girl was on-schedule and took everything seriously, meaning she'd put her mind towards the best way to torture a toy like Weiss. Who to make her look like? She could make Weiss look like Penny and let Ciel take her frustrations out on a mimic of her ward. A seemingly consequence-free way to vent. Or maybe make Weiss look like Ruby-the girl Penny was always trying to ditch Ciel to hang out with. Play on some jealousy on the person who encouraged Penny's habit.

Or not. Ciel may be too duty-bound to not report the toy-whoever she looked like. Maybe someone with less focus on rules like Neon Katt; who may even be up for toying with a tiny Weiss herself, or whoever Neo chose to make her look like. Or a team like NDGO with a grudge against Team SSSN for Neo to play on. Team ABRN had Arlsan and Reese who hid it well, but still resented Yang and Blake respectively for how they eliminated them from the first round. Neo could cast an illusion to make Weiss look like one of her team-mates. The best part would be that those girls would think there were no consequences for torturing their toy either.

The same went for May Zedong of Team BRNZ, who got crushed by JNPR even with a mid-match argument in the latter, and all at once by Nora Valkyrie. Neo could make Weiss look like the hammer-wielder and let the girl from Vacuo do the rest.

Or maybe she could play it especially safe and go with Cinder and/or Emerald. Neither of the two would have a flash of conscience and decide to help Weiss, whoever she looked like. On the other hand, she could have no illusion on Weiss, or make her look like Ruby just for the fun of it, and Cinder and/or Emerald could do the rest. Neo could even be able to toy with her whenever she liked. The only problem was that Cinder and Emerald rarely shared with Neo. It'd be fun to imagine the torture, but they'd lord their prize over her.

Would Neo decide to go with Ciel, or one of the other girls?
131331231311313233221.title: Neo considers who to give Weiss to.

choices: "Ruby Rose. The girl makes keeping an eye on Penny impossible."
1313312313113132332211.content:
"...which is why we have decided to reward your service to Atlas with this latest project." Neo said, reciting the script she memorised to herself. "This toy is designed to be malleable, withstand high pressures, and be used however you wish."

Neo didn't look like Neo right now. She didn't even look like her official disguise at the moment. What Neo looked like was a bespectacled Atlesian scientist explaining to Ciel Soleil just what she was giving to the student for her having to baby-sit Penny this whole time. Explaining to Ciel about the toy that would belong to her now.

"Keep in mind that the toy may disobey commands. You can respond to that however you wish, but forcing your will using your size and mind would be best." Neo had to fight the smile off her face at that.

Weiss was still in her shirt pocket and could just hear every word that Neo was saying to Ciel. She could hear of how she was going to be seen as a personal therapeutic toy for Ciel to do whatever she wished. Whether it was putting her under-foot, or on any part of her body, Weiss would be forced to do it because Ciel wanted it that way.

"The look of the toy will be determined by your own preference, but keep in mind that the first appearance you choose will be the final one. So think carefully about it. Go with someone who causes constant stress or discontent with you so you don't regret it later." Neo tilted her head sideways, pretending to be quizzical. "Is there anyone who you have a grudge against? Someone who you'd like to get revenge on? This makes for a great proxy."

Ciel was considering it. She may have been confused about the concept but would follow orders, even the one strictly keeping her from mentioning the toy to anyone unless they approached her about the toy specifically. That way, there was a way for Neo to include herself in the torturing if she felt like it.

This was perfect. Weiss was going to be nothing but a stress-toy for Ciel to do with as she wished with the Schnee; and she wouldn't even be seen as human, let alone the Schnee heiress. Neo had to fight the urge to giggle to herself at the very thought. Weiss would be broken in no time.

"There is one girl who's been constantly on my nerves. One girl who just," Ciel groaned at the very thought and stomped a foot on the ground. A rare show of open emotion that put a large smile on Neo's face. "I'd enjoy the chance to use her as a toy, even if it's not her herself."

"Excellent, would you mind giving me the name?" Neo asked, slipping a hand into the shirt pocket and gripping Weiss tightly. She'd cast the illusion the second that Ciel said the name.

"Her name is..."
1313312313113132332211.title: Neo gives Weiss to Ciel

choices: "Penny. I want a version that'll do what she's told."
"Weiss Schnee. She won't control her partner; so I'll control her."
13133123131131323322112.content:
"Ruby Rose?"

Weiss' heart skipped a beat and Neo cursed herself for being too forward when Ciel looked at her in confusion.

"I didn't think that'd be noticed," Ciel muttered, blushing to herself, while Neo sighed in relief. "No. She's made my job difficult, but I don't blame her specifically. She's like a small child. Undisciplined, but ultimately the fault of her monitors."

Weiss boiled at the insult to her partner, her friend, and her team itself, but could do nothing as Neo twisted her form with her fingers alone. All Ciel saw was the scientist standing and waiting for her answer, but what was truly there was Neo shaking in anticipation and using Weiss as a way to distract herself.

"The girl I want the toy to look like is the one truly at fault for my stress. Now, you say I can make the toy look like whoever I want. No matter who it is, you won't hold it against me?" Ciel nervously asked.

"Not at all. You've more than earned this."

"Thank you, ma'am." Ciel said. A strangely cruel smile came to her face. "I want the toy to look like..."
13133123131131323322112.title: Someone else.

choices: She slips the mini Penny into her shoe
She slips the mini Penny into the back of her underware
131331231311313233221121.content:
"Penny-" Ciel spoke, checking her watch, "It's her own fault for talking with that Ruby Rose- she's getting quite disobedient" the strict time keeper frowned, adjusting her blue beret as Neo made the changes to Weiss- silencing her screams before swinging the 'stress toy' from behind her back.

Weiss tried to explain, but found her voice to be lost as she resorted to trying to pry away from Neo's fingers in desperation. A shudder went through the tiny Weiss as the light blue eyes of Ciel scanned her, noticing the obvious fear. The tiny Weiss shuddered as she saw her own reflection in the giant girls eye, the face of Penny looking glumly back.

"It can't feel emotions, correct?" Ciel queried, her arms entwining behind her back as she examined the mini Penny.
"Correct- it's just a toy to relieve stress upon, don't worry, we haven't shrunken the real Penny down. I'm afraid you'll still have to deal with the larger version of her" Neo told the truth, squeezing the Penny look alike in her hand. "It's also very durable- observe-"

Weiss couldn't put up much of a fight as Neo's two hands enclosed around her, flattening her out before pinching her sides.
"It's practical and water proof to use the 'source of your stress' as a rag of some sort-" Neo smiled, pulling Weiss outwards so as to resemble a rag, her features looking quite unhappy with her situation as her 'tormentor to be' nodded with a level head. "Or- perhaps gum- it's made to always taste minty fresh" Neo chuckled to herself, before dropping the rag to the ground. "Anything that you think will help you relieve some stress-"

From the ground, the tiny rag struggled to reform while Neo listed some features, her tiny body struggling as she thought back on her terrible day. She didn't manage to get very far with her recovery however as the light from the sky dimmed with the shadow of someones foot. She tried to yell a complaint, yet nothing came out as the polished black shoe of Ciel stomped down upon her, grinding down like it was putting out a cigarette.
"Thank you-" Weiss heard from above, feeling the foot lift.

Neo was walking away, giving a friendly wave before vanishing from the tiny girls sight. Left only with the strict time keeper, the giant girl simply unstuck her from the ground, examining her crumpled form.
"Penny" She sighed, glancing at her watch as she timed her next move. "I should get going, you will be a great help" The giant girl glanced down without care at what she thought was a stress toy, her fingerless gloves quickly crushing down the toy with a content sigh before preparing to leave. "I should probably hide you..." She mumbled-
131331231311313233221121.title: Ciel and Penny

choices: Penny is difficult. Worship and torture.
1313312313113132332211211.content:
"Here!" Ciel glared down at Weiss, or rather the miniature Penny, in her her hand, "I will only say this once. You will remain in my right shoe until half-way before bedtime. In that moment, I will then place you in the left shoe and you will repeat your duties which will be to massage, kiss, and generally worship the assigned foot. I will add pressure when I want you to switch it up and will apply further pressure if you fail to follow my desires. Is that understood?"

Weiss said nothing in reply. She couldn't speak through the misery and torment she was going through. This morning, she had left to go and train for the Vytal Festival Tournament and now she was here. Nothing more than a toy to be used for Ciel's relaxation and stress-relief because Penny was refusing to do what this control-freak said.

There was a chance she'd never see her friends or know freedom again. An eternity of slavery under Ciel's foot, while she thought she was tormenting a smaller version of Penny.

She had to try and appeal to her better nature, if she even had one!

"Ciel, you have to-" Weiss didn't know if it was her voice Ciel heard, or if Neo's illusion worked at a range. She was crushed in Ciel's hand regardless.

"I will presume the defiance is meant to act as a motivator." Ciel said, opening her hand let Weiss reform her body. "Handling the real Penny has proven more of a nuisance than I first thought. You'll make a suitable stress-relief. Ideally, she'll be compliant and you'll only have to commit to minor service. If she is remaining difficult to control...."

Ciel's grip tightened again and Weiss realised how powerless she was. Her Aura was the only thing keeping her intact and that was being stretched to its very limit.

"I presume you understand your role?" Ciel asked, the shadow of a smile on her face.

"Yes." Weiss replied, her spirit broken.

"Yes?" Ciel raised an eyebrow.

"Yes... Mistress?" Weiss waited to see if that was the right response.

"Suitable. For now." Ciel then slipped Weiss- or the mini-Penny- into her boot.

It was a quick slide down a white thigh-high foot and Weiss stumbled into the centre of the sole. She barely managed to flip onto her back before feeling herself get crushed down by Ciel's right foot. There was no chance of her escaping. Ciel would feel her climbing up the leg and would punish her harder than ever, if she tried defying her.

The climate was warm and only getting hotting. There was only enough room for Weiss, if she breathed in and used all her strength, to move around the bottom of the sole and maybe climb up the side to reach the top of Ciel's foot. It was obvious why these conditions were chosen. She'd be too woozy to do anything but move around and worship.

Unless she felt like being tortured.

Weiss had no time to ponder further. She felt Ciel's foot push down on her, the command for her to start serving, and Weiss saw no other option than to move her hands against Ciel's sole and start rubbing. It took everything she had to add enough force and she shuffled up and down in place to get more of the sole.

Ciel had already started walking as Weiss could feel her surrounding go up and then come crashing down on her. Ciel was soft enough that she didn't instantly crush Weiss, but she could still feel her body being squashed by the force. By the fifth step, Ciel pressed down harder and Weiss took that as the signal to start kissing.

The hygiene was good. Ciel regularly cleaned herself and there was no sign of sweat or dirt anywhere. It was just the humiliation that made Weiss hate every minute of it.

She prayed that the real Penny wouldn't be a handful. If she was compliant with Ciel, it would mean she wouldn't feel the need to vent her aggression on what she thought was a smaller version of her partner. If she was trouble...Weiss would be in for a long day.

Ciel herself was walking down the corridor feeling more relaxed than ever. The stress-toy Penny was following instructions as commanded and gave her a sense of authority and leadership when she saw Penny waiting just ahead. A part of her even hoped that the android would be her usual troublesome self, if only to make further use of the toy.

Would Penny be a problem for Ciel?
1313312313113132332211211.title: She slips the mini Penny into her shoe

choices: Ciel thinks little of it. She has to keep to the schedule and train
Ciel decides to find the scientist tomorrow. Just for a question or two.
13133123131131323322112111.content:
"Hello Ciel," Penny greeted, waving her hand and being too loud as always.

"Hello Penny. Do you understand our schedule for today?" Ciel asked expectantly. She already frowned when she saw Penny uneasily avoid looking at her.

"About that..." She paused, not noticing Ciel put pressure on her right foot. The stress-toy was massaging harder, but this was a bigger issue. "Ruby told me that she couldn't find Weiss and she was starting to get worried. I was wondering if we could help her-"

"Penny, you were ordered not to fraternise with her. Furthermore, we have a schedule and must keep to it." Ciel's voice was calm as ever. The stress-toy Penny, however, was likely being crushed as she spoke. She frowned at Penny and put more force in her words. "Is that understood?"

For once, Penny actually listened, looking down miserably and nodded. "Yes Ciel."

"Good." Ciel lessened the pressure and was relieved that something was going right today.

The stress-toy was already serving its purpose. She didn't feel a migraine at all and she could feel the tension seeping away. The stress-toy was learning on the job, a useful skill to have.

She'd wait a bit more before having it start really worshipping her.

---

It wasn't the worst thing in the world.

Weiss was managing to worship Ciel fine. It wasn't like Neo where she was at the whims of a monster but there was a clear pattern. Moment of tension from each step, maybe further pressure if something upset Ciel, and cues for Weiss to change tactics. It was structured and orderly so that Ciel could be comforted best, not for a killer's sick fantasies.

Weiss simply had to move around and worship. Ciel would press down to make Weiss move away and towards where she wanted the massage next, Weiss laid kisses down the path she took to cover every part with affection, and then Weiss would rub the tension away. She could feel her prison relax and loosen as she improved.

The only moment of far had been early on when something had upset Ciel and she started squashing Weiss. The pain was expected but horrifying all the same. Weiss tried to rub and kiss as hard as she could, but it must have been something above that made Ciel stop.

She didn't know why but she had an idea. Penny must have been more obedient than usual and so Ciel had little reason to torment Weiss.

An hour must have passed before Ciel began pressing harder. Not enough to flatten Weiss but enough to send a message. Weiss was around the lower sole when she began licking. The taste was bad as Ciel was beginning to sweat, although that was the only cause. Her body was clean and pristine, even with practice earlier, and the sweat managed to actually hydrate her.

Weiss went from the ball of the foot, up the soles, covered the arches, and even managed to get through and between the toes without a problem. Weiss managed to avoid getting dehydrated or crushed by each step that Ciel took. Slowly but surely, Weiss managed to reach the top of Ciel's foot and covered it with kisses and licks.

Ciel placed her in the left boot shortly after that with a commanding look. Weiss knew better than to defy or delay so she immediately went to worship the left foot the second the foot re-entered the boot.

She had more experience now. It was almost interesting how much tension there was in the left foot compared to the right. Weiss almost took a perverse pride in the way she kept Ciel's right foot relaxed. That her worship could make a difference.

It was the only way Weiss could take what was happening. She had to play along and be the perfect stress-toy and relaxation tool so that Ciel would eventually let her guard down and she could escape. She had to find her team and pray the illusion wouldn't work on them. Or maybe they'd see a tiny Penny and listen to her.

Either way, she kept her immediate thoughts on the worship. Massaging the foot, guided by Ciel's presses, while kissing and licking it in between.

It was night when she was finally let out of the boot. She was in Ciel's grip in what was probably the bathroom and could see the sharp, but also nearly relaxed, look on Ciel's face as she looked down on the toy.

Weiss was the opposite, even in her Penny-like form. Her body was soaked in sweat and her clothes had been torn from her, down to her bra and panties, and the illusion probably looked similar. Going by the look on Ciel's face, that is.

"I'll have to arrange for more suitable clothing later." She sighed, before staring down at Weiss. "You did adequately, if inconsistently, Penny. Tomorrow, you'll perform the same duties- and will likely do so in the future henceforth- but I expect a performance closer to the second try than the first. As for sleeping arrangements, your flexibility means it won't be hard to tie you to my foot. Tonight will be the right and tomorrow the left and that'll be the pattern. You will thank me for your servitude both past and future each time I decide you have finished the current task. Is that understood?"

"Thank you, Mistress." She said, doing whatever it took to please Ciel. "Your relaxation is my purpose."

It was meant to pander to Ciel's ego and lower her guard. Weiss probably didn't even know about the tiny part of her that truly felt it.

Somewhere, waiting by the window of Ciel's room with equipment used to bug the bedroom and the bathroom, Neo was silently cackling to herself after hearing those words.

Ciel's expression didn't change, except for the way the corners of her mouth flickered up for an instant. Almost like a smirk.

---

Ciel herself was happy that this Penny was being obedient as well. Today had been a fine schedule, if Penny was morose throughout, but better she be gloomy and obedient than excited and uncontrollable.

Tomorrow was a training session, ideally, so she could use the sleeping arrangements tonight to test how much she could tie Penny to her foot. Failing that, she'd have to crush this version against her foot and simply swap between exercises. She already had ways to ensure that she wouldn't fall off her foot by accident.

As she prepared to stretch out the stress-toy's limbs and wrap it around her right foot, Ciel briefly hesitated with a thought.

Weiss Schnee hadn't been found and people were beginning to ask where she had gone. Another day or so and she'd be declared missing. Ruby Rose had been distraught and it affected Penny's emotional state. Right now, she was being obedient, but this could serve as a complication.

Then again, that was what the stress toy was for.

It was none of Ciel's concern what Commander Schnee's sister did. Knowing the girl, she was probably off somewhere doing what she liked. It was why she couldn't control her partner, who was making it hard for Ciel to control her own. Ciel, meanwhile, was focused on duty.

But the timing was strange, that she'd get this toy at the same time. Or it was just coincidence. Maybe she should try and ask the scientist who gave her toy about it tomorrow, and skip training.

Ciel had finally tied the stress-toy to her right foot, head pushed against the arches and hands against the soles to massage, when she made up her decision. Whispering it to herself, as Neo could hear it from the outside.
13133123131131323322112111.title: Penny is compliant. Worship only.

choices: Neo would send Weiss to the Malachite Sisters
Neo wouldn't send Weiss to the Malachite Sisters
131331231311313233222.content:
Send her away immediately. Weiss would never get to see her friends again and would spend the rest of her life as nothing more than a toy to be tortured and used by the whims of her owner. Neo could make the small sacrifice of not seeing the Schnee break in person, if it meant keeping her cover. What did she have to lose, other than personal enjoyment? The women that Neo had in mind wouldn't care if she looked like herself, or like one of their grudges.

She had forgotten about the Malachite Sisters until now. Those twins may not be the best fighters, but they were definitely effective at their job, and knew how to hold a grudge. Yang Xiao Long made them look like idiots in front of their boss, Junior, and they'd probably go for revenge if given the opportunity.

Neo could send them a letter and say that she captured and shrank Yang into a toy. That the one in the news was just a decoy of hers and that no one would ever know that the real one was now property of the Malachite Sisters. Or just send her as herself and offer them the chance at revenge by proxy.

The only problem was that they were pretty small-time. They'd torture Weiss, true, but she might have wanted something more for her fantasies. Someone older or stronger outside Beacon, like Winter, Raven, Kali, or even Salem herself. That was just from the top of her head alone.

She was already starting to search for an envelope, and a hammer to squish Weiss into a flat enough shape for the letter, when she made up her mind on the Malachite Sisters.
131331231311313233222.title: Neo sends Weiss away in a letter immediately.

choices: "Weiss Schnee? You're gonna pay for what your team-mate did."
1313312313113132332221.content:
Neo pulled the envelope from the drawer and placed Weiss down on the palm of her left hand, with a hammer on the right. Her Aura would more than be enough to keep the hammer blows from actually hurting her hand. Weiss, on the other hand...

Weiss felt the hammer come down on her before she could even start running. Pain electrified her whole body and she felt bones and muscles turn to nothing within an instant. She wanted to scream and howl, but her lungs were too flat to do anything and the best she could do was make a noise so quiet that not even Neo could hear her. The hammer came down again and again as Weiss became flat enough that she'd be placed in the envelope.

She was in complete despair as Neo smiled and waved at her, before giving one last wink, and dropping her into the envelope. Weiss felt paper slide next to her form and couldn't read the writing as her face was squashed against the envelope's paper, completely blocking out her vision.

This was it. Her only chance was that her team would notice that she was missing and somehow track down her shrunken form to Neo. If she was lucky, they'd question her and be able to find out wherever she was being sent to, or whoever she was sent to would send the Schnee heiress back.

What Weiss didn't know was that Neo might have cast an illusion on her so that she'd look like Yang, for the Malachite Sisters to play with. Team RWBY would be searching for someone who didn't have her appearance to the outside world, and the Malachite Sisters would think they were toying with their tormentor from so long ago.

She didn't know how much time had passed. All she could see was differing light and the feeling of air. The sounds of her team greeting someone would have normally made her feel joy, but there was none as she knew that they were probably greeting the woman who was going to ruin her life utterly. From there, it was feeling her prison get dropped into the Beacon mail-room and then what must have been hours of being shifted and moved around as she fought to try and reform her body completely.

In the end, she just managed to get her body back to its original shape when she felt the envelope she was trapped in get thrown onto some kind of surface. Her legs turned to jelly and she could do nothing as the envelope was picked up and taken somewhere else now. Another painful drop and she felt light and air rush in when the envelope was torn open.

A brief moment of joy at being released from the stuffy prison was replaced with by fear. Just who were these people and what would they do with her?

"A toy? Something we can use for whatever we want?" Militia turned to her sister, Melanie. "I didn't think Neo, like, gave that kind of stuff away."

"Whatever. She doesn't lie about torturing people. If she really caught and shrunk her," Melanie's voice went from airy to something more joyful, and a lot more sinister. "Then I'm not letting this opportunity pass me up. I'm going to have some fun."

Militia shared her sisters smile and grabbed the end of the envelope and shook it up and down. Weiss could do nothing as she fell down from the envelope and crashed onto the ground. Her Aura was the only thing that kept her from becoming a completely flat shape again.

When she looked at those cruel grins, however, Weiss soon wished that she could have been in the envelope for a little longer.

Militia and Melanie Malachite had to stop themselves from laughing at the pathetic creature before them. Most of her spirit had already been knocked out of her and now they had the perfect chance to have fun with this toy.

"I hope you enjoyed being a toy for Neo, because it's our turn. Enough about her, what's up..."
1313312313113132332221.title: Neo would send Weiss to the Malachite Sisters

choices: Neo does send Weiss to Winter
Neo doesn't send Weiss to Winter
1313312313113132332222.content:
Nah. The twins were mean, but Neo wanted Weiss to be tortured by either someone far below her level, or far above it. Let the power difference really crush her spirit as she became a mere plaything.

What better way to play with it than to have Neo send Weiss over to her beloved big sister; Winter Schnee, and then make her experience being tortured and broken by her idol? The Atlesian military woman probably had a lot of stress and had to work hard and now she'd have a toy to do with as she wished.

When she would leave for Atlas, she'd be taking what she thought was a toy with her, and Weiss would be in the worst position in her life. Nothing more than a slave to the person she admired and far away from her teammates who cared so much about her.

Weiss would be given over to Winter as some toy that Altesian labs cooked up to help people with stress and/or therapy and that Winter was chosen to try out the prototype. Perfectly elastic, unbreakable, and could take any kind of pressure. All Winter had to do was show a bit of aggression every now and then and the toy would work fine.

But what form to disguise Weiss as? It'd probably either be as the youngest Schnee sibling, Whitley, who Winter apparently had a grudge against, or it could be as Qrow Branwen, the Huntsman who annoyed her so often, or it could be Weiss Schnee herself. Winter may have loved her sister, but apparently she could get exasperated by her little sister's antics.

Neo would just have to make her illusion up the brattiness of her remarks and pleas and Winter would think it was just a toy designed to push her buttons. A way to get rid of any negative feelings about her little sister without consequence.

There was one problem. Winter cared for her sister and might notice any news that Weiss had gone missing. Neo could disguise herself as Weiss and play along an act, but that wouldn't last forever, It was unlikely that Winter would ever make the connections, but even the slightest chance would ruin Neo's fun. What was the point of sending Weiss away, if she couldn't see the torture?

Though if it meant Winter was the one torturing Weiss, it could be worth it. Neo took out the envelope and squeezed Weiss in her hand again, buying herself time to think, as she then started looking for a pen and paper to write an explanation on.

Would Neo send Weiss to Winter?
1313312313113132332222.title: Neo sends Weiss to someone else outside Beacon

choices: Neo would send Weiss to Raven
Neo wouldn't send Weiss to Raven
13133123131131323322222.content:
Nah. Winter couldn't be trusted. Too much of a moral compass to be trusted, from a distance. Even with Whitley or Qrow, there was a chance she'd put clarifying facts and/or 'the right thing' first before revenge. Especially so if it was Weiss.

Just gag Neo with a spoon.

But she knew someone who didn't have those kind of moral constraints. A woman who had no mercy or sympathy for the weak, even if they were family, and who'd happily take the chance to torture a toy like Weiss without a shred of guilt. The very same warrior who could strike fear into even Neo's heart, with her reputation for battle and death.

Raven Branwen.

The tribal-leader was always on the move and rarely spoke to Huntsmen or Huntresses, and she kept secrets from them as well. She wouldn't bother to find out more about Atlesian experiments. Or maybe Neo could simply send Weiss as an 'apology' to Raven and win back some favour. Either way, it wasn't like Raven would pass up the chance to assert her supremacy.

Neo could send over Weiss as herself-spinning a story about an heiress who knew nothing of struggle, or simply a prize for Raven-or she could send Weiss as Yang or Ruby. Raven had no care for her daughter, and may have an interest in breaking Summer's daughter. Or Neo could send Weiss and make her look like a member of Team SRTQ. Give Raven the chance to torment old teammates of hers.

She'd need to think about it, but Raven had her benefits. Weiss would be far away from her teammates and she'd be spending her life under-foot to a woman with no morals beyond survival of the fittest. She'd make Weiss know her place quickly and use the new features of the tiny heiress to her advantage.

But what if Raven decided she didn't trust Neo? Or she decided to use Weiss as a trade with Beacon? Or even got upset over whatever form Neo chose for Weiss? She'd probably sell Neo out or let Weiss go. Neo didn't know. Branwen was deadly, but also unpredictable and not in the good way.

Maybe someone else would be a safer bet. Could Neo trust Raven enough to send Weiss?

She placed Weiss onto the desk and pressed down on her with the palm of her hand, crushing Weiss against the desk, as she tapped a pen on the desk and made up her mind....
13133123131131323322222.title: Neo doesn't send Weiss to Winter

choices: Neo doesn't send Weiss to Kali
131331231311313233222222.content:
Neo just couldn't trust Raven Branwen to not turn Weiss in, as a favour or leverage, or try and turn it back on her.

Maybe she should be thinking about a Faunus. The Schnee heiress' father was hated by most and Menagerie was the home of the White Fang itself. What better place to make Weiss spend the rest of her days? A toy for someone who would probably think it was harmless fun, or even just desserts, to torment a toy that looked so much like Weiss.

Kali Belladonna, the wife of the head of Menagerie, was a good option.

Menagerie was far-away from Vale and there was the bonus of her being Blake's mother. Maybe Weiss' teammate would visit one day and the little Schnee would have to watch as her teammate was so close, yet would never hear or see Weiss' pleas for help. It could even be enough to break the little heiress.

What form? Neo could easily up the brattiness (and maybe anti-Faunus words) of Weiss enough that Kali would be fine with breaking the toy in. Or she could choose one of the other Schnee children like Winter or Whitley and go off from there. Maybe she could even choose Adam Taurus' form and write of his threat towards her daughter, driving her away from the White Fang.

The possibilities were endless! All she'd need to do was write a letter- maybe pretending to be a Faunus sympathising with the old White Fang- talking about a new invention they wanted to test out. Or cut out the excuse and just say she had shrunk a Schnee-or Taurus-and that their attitudes needed adjusted. A toy that could never break and would be moulded into whatever Kali wanted.

Weiss' money came from exploiting Faunus, and now she'd be spending the rest of her life serving a Faunus.

Or would she? Kali had a strong moral code. It was likely that she'd be like Raven, but for different reasons. Maybe she was against torture, or would see through the lie if Neo claimed it as a toy, and would help Weiss. She could even use Weiss as a way to contact her lost daughter. Neo wasn't going to lose the chance to see Weiss break, all so that Weiss could be helped out of her situation.

But that was only a possibility, and Neo was running out of names. She needed to write something down on this letter and squishing Weiss was only so much fun.

So would she send Weiss to Kali Belladonna?
131331231311313233222222.title: Neo wouldn't send Weiss to Raven

choices: Neo disguises Weiss as a stress ball for Kali
Neo sells Weiss as an advanced figure for stress
Neo can't remove Weiss from her sock
1313312313113132332222221.content:
Plucking up the tiny Weiss, Neo shone a happy smile.
"W-what are you doing?" Weiss spoke, cautiously looking into the eyes of the sly girl. Neo simply smiled back, cat ears suddenly flicking out of her head as she started to shift into that of a faunas disguise. Weiss shuddered, not wanting to find out the larger girls plan, but unable to do anything as she was suddenly dropped.

Weiss's stomach sank as she caught a glympse of Neo's battered boots down below before slamming into the moist, battered insole. Her body uselessly bouncing into the confines of her rank prison.
"WAIT!" She screamed out, unable to prevent the giant girl from doing the unthinkable. Neo's frayed sock casually slid over the tiny, cramming the small girl into her flexing toes as she inserted her foot. Weiss's disgusted body soon rolled past the battered socked toes only to be pinned by the thin mesh protecting the hard ball of the foot. Weiss winced as she felt the all too familiar feeling of being stepped on, only this time there was no break or chance to escape. Her world was Neo's foot.

Neo stepped down, surprised that she didn't feel anything. Her foot ground down on the ground as she attempted to feel the little sticker but after getting flattened to the ball of her foot she felt like a stickly patch through her sock. Neo shrugged, simply enjoying the idea that there was a tiny there before making the long trip to Kali's place.
1313312313113132332222221.title: Neo sends Weiss to Kali

choices: Neo doesn't send Weiss to Salem
1313312313113132332222222.content:
Okay, fine! Kali was out too. Neo was starting to get frustrated with all these names. All these risks coming from a little bit of fun! There had to be someone out there who Neo could send Weiss to. Someone who wasn't in Vale and would do nothing to help Weiss Schnee one bit. Was there no one on her side certain to be cruel and mali-

Wait.

There was one person.

Neo only knew her from the fact that Cinder Fall herself feared this woman. The dark force who was behind all of these dark schemes and plotted the downfall of her enemies without hesitation. A person who lacked kindness or mercy for her enemies.

Salem.

There weren't many ways to contact Salem. A letter in paper-form was harder to track than a Scroll message, but even those had a slight chance of reaching the dark mistress of Grimm. Neo would be sending Weiss either to an eternity lost, or to a life spent serving Salem.

It'd be as tribute. A way to curry favour. She'd never get away with an illusion of Ozpin. It'd have to be Weiss herself, or another girl in this school like Ruby, Cinder, or a foe long-since dead like Summer Rose. A brand-new toy that wouldn't die, no matter what Salem did, and could be moulded into any shape. Weiss would do whatever Salem commanded without question. Or she would, if she didn't want to know what real pain felt like.

Neo was both terrified and excited at the same time. Weiss would be far-away from Vale and in the one place that no one would ever suspect. No rescue mission would ever come close to Salem's lair and there was no reason for Salem to do anything to help her enemies. Weiss would be forever gone from her friends and stuck worshipping Salem without mercy.

She giggled to herself as she imagined Weiss forced under-foot, kissing at the soles of a woman who planned the destruction of everything she held dear. Her spirit broken and her body a mere shell as she dedicated her life to minimising the pain she felt. Her existence depending on the whims and pleasures of someone like Salem.

The down-side was that Neo may never see the results herself. Or that Salem would simply kill Neo, when she out-lived her usefulness, upon realising that Neo had discovered a way to contact her. Neo was fine with torturing Weiss, but there was some information she wanted to keep to herself.

This was it. She couldn't think of anybody else.

Would Neo send Weiss to Salem?
1313312313113132332222222.title: Neo doesn't send Weiss to Kali

choices: Weiss is lost and someone else finds her
13133123131131323322222221.content:
Neo pounded down harshly on Weiss flattening her down till she was thick as a sheet of paper and sided her into the letter as she sent it off to Salem.

Does Weiss make it to Salem or does someone else find her?
13133123131131323322222221.title: Neo sends Weiss to Salem

131331231311313233222222211.content:
Weiss wasn't sure how long she was in the letter, it seemed like she was in there forever as she waited, worried what was going to happen to her. On the outside Salem had been looking at the letter she had gotten wondering how someone had found away to get a letter to her territory.

A note had been attached to the outside of the letter though no name was given the note mentioned how the thing in this letter was some person who had been shrunken and captured had sent to her as a stress toy that she could torture all she wanted to.

Salem then opened the letter looking down at the being before, an intrigued smile on her face as she said the human like blob on her table. Weiss had looked up at the being staring down on her, terrified at what she saw. From the Red eyes to the white skin with creepy black veins going across her face,this truly was a terrifying being that Weiss was looking at.

Weiss is with Salem but who had she been transformed into...
