Let's Emerald in on the tiny Phyrra
1352312.content:
Holding Phyrra in her hand Salem had now decided what she was going to do to her new slave first as she brought her hands together, grinding the poor putty girl into mush before she threw Phyrra's form onto her throne, forcefully slamming her ass down on Phyrra as she took a seat on her new cushion.

"Ah perfect, Y'know your not the first tiny person to suffer such a horrible curse, their were plenty of more tinies that I tortured throughout my life that happened to find themselves unluckily in my castle, intentionally or unintentionally" Salem said in a devious tone as she grinded her bottom on the 'seat cushion' to torment it.

Though quite satisfied with the torture she was currently inflicting on the tiny girl, Salem felt it wasn't enough, knowing that their was plenty more them at she could do to make her toy suffer, though before Salem could decide on what to do next one of her subordinates came in to ask her a question.

"Ah Emerald, what reason have you come to bother me" Salem said in an annoyed tone wanting to get started with her next course of action in torturing her slave as Emerald explained her reasonings for bothering Salem.

Meanwhile, Phyrra was suffering below from the force of Salem's ass, her body was being crushed between the hard surface of throne and Salem's bottom which was repeatedly being slammed onto her as she talked from up above to what Phyrra didn't as she was stuck their trapped, hoping that this was just a horrible nightmare that she'd wake up from.

With her conversation with Emerald nearly being over, Salem understood the girls question, it seemed that she was mearly just asking about her place, wondering if their were any other tasks that Salem had needed her to do, which of course Salem simply shrugged off saying that she had no needs for Emeralds services and that she should stay with Cinder while she was recovering.

During this Salem had gotten 3 main ideas for what to do with her salve next, one was just to keep Phyrra with her and torture Phyrra herself, the other was to get help from her Grimm that resided amongst her Castle feeling that they'd surely make the tiny suffer horribly.

Another idea she had was to ask of Emerald for some assistance in torturing her tiny slave, though wanting to keep it between them, not wanting to get any of her other subordinates involved especially Cinder knowing of the girls anger issues and how this wouldn't help Cinder recover in the slightest, only supporting her malicious intentions for immediate revenge instead of trying to subside them.

Looking at her options Salem decided she would...
1352312.title: Have Phyrra become her new seat cushion

1353.content: Do you like these characters?
1353.title: More

13531.content:
The slightly busy ticket office struggled with the onslaught of students queuing to get in, the sound of laughter and splashing tantalizing the ears of everyone waiting to swim as people impatiently waited to pay their way. Ruby, hopped happily on the spot as her turn in the que came up, her beaten flip flops were slowly worn away as she became more and more hyper. Yangs half hearted attempt at calming her down did nothing to damper the hyper leaders excitement.
"It's us next!" Ruby jittered, causing Blake to rock forward to check the queue- her bag bumping slightly against Weiss who was trying desperately hard to maintain her composure.

The holidays were here and everyone seemed to want to visit the latest leisure center, equipped with a sauna, gym, pool with one of the biggest slides in Vale, Jacuzzi, tanning beds and spa for everyone's relaxing needs. All of the essentials that every female hunter seemed to want-

Every female hunter and Sun.

Pushing off Blakes worn out workout shoes once more with an exaggerated gag, he quickly squirmed over the pile of clothes towards the overhanging zip. Listening happily to the splashes of the water slide- "Ohh- I'm totally going for that first-" He shuddered, wrapping a golden tail around the zip- tugging it slightly open before taking a peek out from Blakes bag. "The queue is going so slow though- still- standing on a cute girls swimwear still beats remedial lessons-" The monkey boy nodded to himself- slipping back in.

"Failing his exams and mocking the evil teachers had seemed to of stopped our mighty hero from checking out the new leisure center's opening. However- the monkey boy genius concocted a devious plan, mixing dust in order to create the world first shrinking explosion! Gone in a blaze of smoke, our dashing hero snuck off into the... uh... day... hitching a ride within the buxom Blakes bag" Sun boasted, dashing his head left and right, on the lookout for Glynda who would certainly be hot on his tail. His story was mostly right, his tail knocking over random vials shrank him. His- silent sneak away in a cloud of smoke was more him yelling something along the lines of 'So long suckers! I'm getting a tan!' mid shrink- not going unnoticed by the surprised Glynda who had agreed to look after him as he shrunk under the door. "Almost- foolproof-" He mumbled, slinking back down as he hoped Glynda went to the beach or something.

It took a few more minutes before the girls made it to the counter- buying their tickets with happy chatter before moving onto the changing rooms. As soon as the zip undid, the tiny monkey boy slipped into Blakes clothes, ready to jump out. He wasn't prepared for the speed of the ninja like girls hand however- his tiny body quickly flying into the air from the force of her taking out her swim wear.
"What the- h-HEY! Bla-" He started as he fell, his words cut off as he splatted against a surface. Unnoticed-
13531.title: Sun Wukong

135311.content:
Quickly reforming, Sun slowly sat up. Rubbing his head with confusion, he gave a quick test pinch to his skin- noticing how malleable he now is,
"That- seems worrying-" He stated, glancing upwards towards Yangs naked rear, her ass wiggled briefly in the air as she reached down to pull her bikini up her legs. Sun didn't stand a chance as the titan suddenly fell down, smothering his yells beneath her jiggling rear.

Sun could do nothing as Yangs full weight plastered him down, he couldn't even push against it. His mouth opened to yell or bite but the heavy monster ontop of him simply filled the space with slightly damp ass flesh. His tiny body, reduced to a smear, was quickly ground into paste as Yang got comfortable, her giant globes wriggling down upon him as she absentmindedly made a joke about how cold the benches were before yanking her golden swim wear up.

Her ass lifted briefly to tug them a little higher before crashing back down, each time she did it the complaints were quieter and quieter.
"Yang-" Sun whimpered- before being silenced,
"Pleas-"
"Sto-"
"N-no"

Eventually Yang stood up, snapping her swimwear in place with a happy mew. Her little seat cushion left as an almost invisable stain on the bench as she finished up getting dressed. The agile Sun, slowly healed himself in record time, his body weak and battered as he tumbled down,
"Ok- did not... expect to go through... THAT-" He gasped. He glanced around at the changing girls briefly before noticing that Yang was actually one of the fastest getting changed. His face went pale as Weiss opened the locker behind him, the wind pushing his body elsewhere-
135311.title: Fell onto the bench

1353111.content:
Sun gave a little role as he hit the floor, his body exhausted.
"Did I gain super unlucky powers or something-" He whined, cracking his back as he quickly hopped under a group of lockers. He slowly made his way towards the exit, shuddering as he watched his small huddle of friends stomp past them, their sandals made sickening squelching noises while Yangs bare feet merrily slapped on the ground- barefooted. Sun slowly came to terms with how dangerous the new world was, although it was slowly getting replaced with excitement as he heard cheers, splashes and fun. "Just- got to be careful- that's all-"

Taking one step out, he wasn't prepared for the blue sandal clad foot of Nora crashing next to him- knocking him over as she ran past, calling out to Pyrrha. Slinking back into the shadows, he watched Pyrrha's bare feet slap against the tiles- stepping exactly where Nora was. Just a few more steps forward and he could of been plastered to that tile- or worse. "Yup- careful-"
1353111.title: Landing on the floor

choices: Sun decides to head towards the lounge area and his original targets
Sun decides to head towards the pool and its bathing beauties
Before he can make a decision Sun is interrupted by a passing girl
13531111.content:
Having no idea which direction the RWBY girls had gone in, Sun figured his best bet was to head to the pools. Not only would it be a comfortable place to hang out, and maybe even tan a little, but it would also give him an excellent opportunity to ‘appreciate the scenery’ as it were. Or, more accurately, to spy on Blake and the other girls in their revealing swimsuits.

Not wanting to waste any time, the swift Faunus shot a quick glance up to make sure his path was indeed clear before dashing out the door, narrowly outrunning yet another girl following him out the exit, her bare feet slapping audibly on the tiles as she passed overhead. Pulling an immediate right turn and making a dash for the other side of the path, Sun just barely managed to skid to a stop in time to avoid being crush underfoot by a group of thoroughly soaked women heading back towards the change rooms. With no time to identify the giants above, the next few minutes were a blur of dodged footsteps and near misses before the shrunken teen finally made it to the other side.

Breathing a sigh of relief as he hugged the base of the nearest railing, Sun rolled his eyes at his own stupidity. “Why did the monkey cross the path? Because he didn’t think it through.” He chuckled at his own joke, before shaking it off and heading back towards the pool, or at least following the girls who looked the most like they were heading for a pool. Hugging the wall this time, he managed to avoid any more near misses for a while, and took a moment to note just how full of girls this place really was. He honestly wasn’t sure if the centre was open to guys at all, but it was evident that today at least it was women only, as everywhere he looked was girls, girls and more girls.

And while he couldn’t see the place too well at his current stature, it looked like it was a veritable maze of pools and spas, interspersed with lounging areas, water slides, and other amenities. Taking a moment to look over the edge of the path he currently stood on, Sun realised that the whole facility was multilayered as well, with some of the pools being at a notably higher level than others. There were signs warning guests not to jump into the lower pools from the upper levels, but with huntresses-in-training like Yang and Nora in attendance, it was really only a matter of time.

By coincidence more than intent, Sun had taken the path to the central pool, sitting around mid-height and covering an impressive area. As the protection of his railing ended and the path opened up before him, the monkey Faunus looked around and realised with a grin that he had in fact managed to track down his original targets, the Team RWBY girls chatting animatedly with Pyrrha and Nora in the lounge area directly across from his current position. Reaching them would mean crossing the open ground between, and risking getting trampled, but he’d made it last time.

Although, there were other options available to him. Closer than RWBY, the pool itself was occupied by a bevy of girls. Closest to his current position were a couple girls he recognised from Haven, Arslan and Reese, who were bobbing in the water while chatting with that sniper girl from Shade (May, if he recalled correctly) and that crazy cat Faunus from Atlas (definitely Neon). Team ARBN hadn’t necessarily been close with Team SSSN at the academy but they got along well enough and he’d be lying if he said he wasn’t interested in checking the girls out at his current scale.

There were plenty of other girls around of course, but right now Sun figured his best options were either the lounge area or the pool, and he casually stepped forward as he considered his options.
13531111.title: Dangerous Paths

choices: Emerald’s chest – resting on the edge of the pool
Melanie’s foot – climbing out of the pool
Cinder’s rear – sitting on the edge of the pool
135311113.content:
So focused was Sun on solving his current quandary that he completely forgot to check that his path was clear before stepping out into the open. He paid for that decision before he even had a chance to process what was happening, a sudden and painful impact catching him in the side and propelling him into the air so quickly that he was well on his way before he even realised what had happened.

Tumbling uncontrollably through the air, Sun got a brief view of the rabbit girl Velvet rushing by below him and dimly realised that the object that had hit him had in fact been the older girl’s foot. His tiny body had been an unseen and unintentional casualty as the brunette headed to join Coco at the other side of the pool, the impact not even registering to the much larger Faunus.

The fast moving foot had impacted the shrunken blonde with enough force to send him flying straight over the water and the lounging area, his previous targets passing by below as he travelled over both them and the boundary separating the central pool from the smaller ones below. As he cleared the railing his tumbling finally subsided to the point where he could actually see where he was going, blue eyes looking down as one of the smaller pools rushed up to meet him.

This pool was much cosier than the larger one above, and was currently occupied by a group of five girls that Sun only dimly recognised. Leaning against one side of the pool, Cinder Fall was a woman he vaguely recalled as another Haven student, albeit one that barely ever seemed to actually be at the academy. Her green-haired teammate Emerald was floating closer to the middle of the pool and appeared to be engaged in conversation with her leader, while that small gothic girl floated on her back nearby (Sun wasn’t sure if he’d ever actually caught that one’s name). The other two girls were paddling around on the other side of the pool, and the Faunus was pretty sure they were the twins from that club that Yang liked, though why they were handing out with Cinder was beyond him.

Sun noticed all of this in the few seconds it took for his accelerating body to reach the ground, using the last of his strength to flip over and protect his face as he slammed down on the tiles at the very edge of the pool, narrowly avoiding a direct impact with the water. Though he supposed it was a good thing he didn’t have to worry about drowning, the impact with the tiles almost instantly reduced him to a flattened disk of flesh and torn cloth, groaning in pain as his tiny eyes blinked up dimly at the glaring sun above. He’d wanted a chance to tan but definitely not like this.

Still dazed, the blonde frowned as he felt more than saw a movement in the water behind him and a sudden burst of noise accompanied the form of one of the bathing females rising from the pool, casting a deep shadow over his stricken body as [Blank] descended towards him.
135311113.title: Interrupted Voyeur

choices: Sun manages to peel himself off, but is stepped on by the next girl in line
Sun manages to peel himself off and escapes from the queue
Sun fails to peel himself off and remains attached to Melanie’s foot
1353111132.content:
“Tch, empty.” With a frown, Melanie tossed her empty drink can out of the pool, neither noticing nor caring where it landed as she started making her way towards the water’s edge. “I’m going to get another one Miltia, do you need anything?” The younger twin shook her head, and the brunette didn’t even bother to enquire as to the needs of her other companions. They were colleagues in a venture, of which only the barest logistics had been explained to her. They were not friends.

Reaching the edge Melanie took no notice of the tan smear that had once been Sun, simply planting her hands to either side of him and hoisting herself up in one fluid movement. Raising her right leg from the water, she swung it forward over the lip and planted it on the very edge of the pool, before leveraging all her weight onto the appendage as she pulled the rest of her body out. It was a testament to her well-trained leg strength that the young enforcer was able to pull off such an exit, balancing on that single foot for several long seconds before finally bringing her other foot down.

For a short moment the brunette felt that the texture of the tiles beneath her right foot was strange, but she dismissed that thought soon after as a trick of the water and nothing more. For the unfortunate Sun, however, that strange texture translated into crushing torment as Melanie’s sole bore down on him, compacting his already flat form even further as her full weight pressed down. The last thing he had seen was the ball of this girl’s foot zeroing in on his head before she had destroyed any chance he had of reinflating himself and getting help from the bathing beauties. Being sat on by Yang before had hurt, but back then her weight had both been distributed over a larger surface, and lessened by the way she was sitting, with her feet still taking weight. This time, all of Melanie’s mass had been focused on him for a few agonising seconds, not to mention that the well-used sole of the kick-focused girl’s foot was much firmer than Yang’s jiggly booty.

The force did lessen somewhat as the other foot was planted but by then the damage had already been well and truly done. The wet flesh of Melanie’s foot adhered to Sun’s skin and clothing as the force of the impact ironed him onto her sole, smearing his legs and torso along the underside while his face was flattened against the ball, and crushed all the more as she went to step off, her heel lifting first before the rest of the foot followed. To the monkey Faunus’ utter dismay he was taken with it, lifted high into the air before being slammed down again. Utterly flat, he could do nothing to defend himself as the brunette’s full weight bore down on him with her next step, only to be lifted up once more to repeat the process over and over in a seemingly endless cavalcade of torture.

Uncaring of the hell she was inflicting, Melanie bid a casual farewell to her compatriots before heading for the stairs to the upper levels. For her it took only a dozen or so steps to reach the stairs, a cycle of movement not even worth the briefest conscious thought. It took only a fraction more of her attention to safely ascend the stairs, which she took at a languid pace, flattening Sun all the more as she pulled herself up and scrapped him across the smooth wooden panels. By the time the two of them had reached the top and travelled the remaining distance to the drinks area, the unfortunate Faunus had been alternatively nearly drowned in puddles and rubbed raw against the floors, his clothes mostly shredded and ripped away, while his body was more adhered than ever.

Disoriented and in pain, Sun couldn’t even groan as he was continuously crushed beneath the foot of the oblivious enforcer, wondering if she was ever going to reach her destination. From Melanie’s perspective the trip to the line took only a couple of minutes, whereas to her passenger it felt like an eternity. Having just emerged from the pool, the brunette’s feet were at least relatively clean and fresh smelling, but that wasn’t much of a comfort when they were busy squishing him into oblivion.

Fortunately for Sun the stomping did eventually stop when Melanie joined the drinks queue, sighing to herself as she crossed her arms and tapped her right foot in frustration for a while before transitioning to absentmindedly rubbing it back and forth across the tiles. For the first time since exiting the pool, the kick-specialist was leaning most of her weight onto her left foot, her right ghosting across the tiles as it moved. Crushed as he was, the captured Faunus saw a possible opportunity to escape and began to struggle with what little strength he had left.
1353111132.title: Club Girl’s Insole

choices: Glynda Goodwitch, still searching for the missing student
Winter Schnee, in Vale as part of the Atlas military forces
Kali Belladonna, visiting Vale in order to see her daughter
13531111321.content:
With a supreme amount of effort, Sun managed to separate one flattened arm from his captor’s sole, and grabbed a gap in the tiles as tightly as he could as her foot swung by. Had it been down to his strength alone, he would certainly have failed, but for once luck appeared to be on his side, as his squished hand caught under a loose edge of one of the flagstones. It stung like nothing else as his hand was pulled tight against the coarse tile and his arm stretched to several times its normal length, but the move was successful in pulling his shoulder and part of his torso free before the foot swung back. With the next pass his body was folded over itself but both his head and his other arm were peeled from the offending sole, allowing him to grab another handhold as the line in front shifted.

Sun hadn’t quite been prepared for Melanie to step off completely, but he held on as best he could as the brunette shifted forward, his torso momentarily stretched like a piece of gum as his hips and legs were carried off while his arms remained attached to the floor, and for a few terrifying fractions of a second he was worried he was going to break in two. Seemingly at the last moment, however, the water adhering him to the sole gave way, and his lower half snapped back to join the rest of him on the floor. His body was mashed all over the place, all of his nerves were screaming at him in agony, and his limbs were stretched and twisted in odd directions, but he was finally free.

High above, the entire queue had shifted, and Melanie had stepped forward to fill the resulting gap, frowning slightly as she felt something like a bandage peeling from her foot. She glanced back over her shoulder to see what it was and glowered as she saw a stretched out tan lump where she had just been standing. It was probably someone’s gum, and she had a half a mind to give it a good stomping in retaliation for touching her, but held back given that she was well aware that would be a fairly self-defeating and pointless action. So instead she just glared and moved on, comforting herself with the thought that if she left it there it would inevitably get stomped on by someone else.

Heedless of Melanie’s sour thoughts, Sun relished in his first chance to breath in what felt like forever. He was still mangled and had difficulty perceiving his surroundings through the squished features of his face, but already he could feel his body starting to pull itself back together, his stretched out limbs slowly retracting back in towards his gradually reinflating body. That said, now given a proper chance to reflect, the monkey Faunus conceded that maybe hitching a ride in an unknowing Blake’s bag after accidentally shrinking himself while fleeing Glynda had, just maybe, not been one of his brightest ideas. Even getting the chance to see his not-so-secret crush in her swimsuit, not to mention her teammates and a ton of other girls, probably wasn’t worth what he had been through so far, and certainly wouldn’t have been worth it if he’d remained stuck.

Speaking of swimsuits, the squished boy was at least given a good view as he struggled to reform, a very impressive set of curves coming into view as the line shifted. From the angle his eyes, or at least one of them, were facing, he couldn’t make out the face of this new arrival, but from what he could see she was certainly very well developed, suggesting perhaps a fully-grown woman rather than a teenager. While he’d deny it if he was asked directly, Sun was admittedly a bit of a perv. After all Blake’s ‘bow’ was only the third of her features he’d noticed, coming after her large booty and nice bosom. On that note, this woman surpassed the cat Faunus in every way, her bottoms clearly struggling to contain the sheer girth of her rear, while her top strained to hold her chest. It was a rather nice view all things considered, and almost made him rethink his earlier concerns. That was, until the line shifted again and those lovely curves were obscured by a rapidly descending foot.

Sun was able to muster just enough strength for a feeble scream before the smooth sole slammed down upon him, instantly undoing what progress his body had made towards reforming. His body’s attempts to pull back together had done nothing but ensure that the whole of him was in the path of this unknown woman’s step. His mangled form spread beneath her sole while his head and shoulders ended up beneath her toes, the biggest one in particular pressing down on his face while his arms were plunged into the sweaty crevice beneath. The weight of the step was intense, and the crushed Faunus was instantly aware that this woman was heavier than his previous tormentor. Worse, whereas Melanie’s foot had been cool, the sole that was now pressing down on him was warm, bombarding him with heat, and adhering him worse than ever as its sweaty moistness pulled him in, the open pores hungrily sucking him up as he was plunged into every available gap.

An instant later and the weight doubled as the woman’s other foot lifted and her toes clenched down, reducing what was left of Sun’s arms to a feeble smear of flesh to be toyed with within the crevice, and removing any chance of grabbing onto something to free himself. At this point he wasn’t even surprised when the foot lifted again and brought him with it, his crushed body trapped worse than it had ever been with Melanie as his unknown captor moved towards the front of the line. Face-first against her toe, he could do little but wonder absently who it was that had claimed him, only to have that thought crushed out of him as the foot slammed down once again.

So who is it that has claimed Sun as their new squishy foot accessory?
13531111321.title: From One Foot to Another

choices: Test how flat she could make him
Test how far he would stretch
135311113211.content:
Glynda Goodwitch had been searching for Sun so that she could punish him for the mess he left in dust class, during her search she deiced to take a break at the drink stand in the leisure center to get a drink,maybe go for a little swim or relax a bit in the sauna while thinking about were the boy could of ran off to.

Unknowingly squishing the boy who she had been looking for. As she sat on a chair at the stand,Sun was meanwhile below squished against her foot in immense pain a the teacher tapped her foot while waiting for her drink squishing sun repeatedly. as she moved her foot up and down,putting sun back in the torture he had been receiving moments ago.

What made it worse for Sun is that in her search to find him she had picked up a good bit of sweat ,which unfortunately for Sun soaked into him body making him have to feel the downpour of sweat and smell that was all to familiar.

To make things worse when Sun had let out a yell before Ms. Goodwitch had stepped him it caused his mouth to be stuck open when he got re-flattened causing some off the sweat to go right in his mouth filling it with the horrible taste.

As Sun suffered Glynda had just gotten her drink taking a sip off it as she thought off were he could have been, "He was'nt in any off the classrooms I checked or the gymnasium maybe he could be in the courtyard" Glynda said to herself.

While Sun had been under Gylnda foot she slowly start to feel the squishy and soft substance under her left foot,She ignored it at first presuming it wasn't anything important but as she sat there she couldn't help but want to see what it was that had happened to get stuck to her foot.

Finally she had decided to see what it was. Holding her left foot up to get a good look at it, when she had seen what it was she had at first been a bit confused as she looked at the tan blob, but as she looked a bit closer she had started to figure out what it was making out a blue pair of eyes and a face.

"MR WUKONG" Glynda said to herself in shock. Though she got some weird looks from other people there she told people to ignore her saying that it was nothing It couldn't be possible, could this blob really be the boy she was looking for, she double checked to make sure she wasn't seeing anything but to her surprise the evidence had been there as the more she sat there the more human shaped the blob started to look.

For Sun not being stepped on anymore was a blessing however when he was brought up to the face off this woman to say the least he wasn't to happy. Seeing that Glynda had found him he sort off hoped that she wouldn't realize that it was him and would just peel him off her foot and toss him away, potentially to a place were he could reform. that hope was dashed as she yelled out the his last name, Thought not being happy about being found out and was likely to be punished he was at least happy that he wouldn't have to be squashed again, likely that having found him Ms. Goodwitch would take him to a place to be turned back to normal size.

....
Unaware of what Glynda had planned for him.

As Glynda looked at that reforming blob of Sun a smile started to form on her face, the dust that had affected Sun not only made him shrink down but also made his body squishy and durable. Glynda decided she would take advantage off this by using Sun's body as a stress toy for her to play with as punishment.

She grabbed Sun's body peeling it off her foot as she closed her hand around Sun's body squeezing to prevent it from reforming. She than walked off Sun's blob like form in hand with her drink being left at the counter as she left the leisure center going to the wash room to take her swim clothes off and put her school uniform back on.

She than walked through the halls to the teacher's lounge to play with her new toy, no one was in the teachers lounge today luckily for Glynda as she sat down at a table dropping Sun blobby body on it as she waited for it to reform, after Sun had reformed Glynda looked at him with devious eyes.

Intimidated by the huge face off the teacher Sun saw before him he deiced to play it cool to potentially move around the subject off his punishment.

"So how has your day been..." Sun said awkwardly. "Well Mr Wukong I've have been spending an hour looking for your only to find you have some how been shrunk down and squashed against my foot" Glynda said intensely. Sun sighed "I'm getting punished right...".

"Yep" Glynda replied "And to make up for all the running around looking for you that you made me do, I'm going to use your body as a squishy stress toy" Gylnda said with a smirk.

Sun was shocked to say the least he had just escaped being squashed on, and now he was being told that he was going to be punished by being squashed on more. Before Sun could reply he saw Glynda hand coming down on him he could only let a small scream before it squashed him.

After she squashed Sun, Gylnda grabbed him and started stretching and squashing him with her hands enjoying his soft dough like form between her hands.As she did this she started to think off other ways to play with her new toy.

Suddenly she got an idea.

"Well before I start doing other things with your body I should test out how far you can stretch or how flat you can become" Glynda said.

Glynda was going to...
135311113211.title: Glynda Goodwitch's new stress toy

choices: She takes Sun home with her

"Well alright girls, I think we should get our bug used to her new role" Ruby said as she picked Cinder up laying her on a table while signaling her teammates to follow her as she sat down on a couch with her team,putting her bare feet on the table in front of the blobby mass as her teammates did the same.

"Alright bug, you better listen to our demands or else we'll make your hell much much worse for you" Ruby said as Cinders body reformed, this caused the small maiden to try and run away only to be met with Ruby's sole plummeting down on her as Ruby brought her feet together and rubbed the squashed Cinder flat.

"Ah ah ah, no running away buggy, this is what you get for trying to escape your goddesses" Ruby said in a exhilarated tone as her red nails scrapped against Cinder form harshly, this got the rest of the team RWBY quite excited for what their leader had planned, especially with her referring to them as goddesses when talking to there new bug toy.

"Now lick you pathetic bug!" Ruby demanded as the flattened Cinder desperately tried to reform only to be squashed by Ruby again and again until she obeyed, frantically licking the girls feet in desperation to try and stop this torture.

After a few minutes of playing with her foot bug, Ruby was satisfied and decided to pass Cinder to Yang, who had a giddy expression on her face. Once Cinder was dropped into Yang's robotic fist, she got instantly crushed in her palm as Yang squashed stretched and mashed Cinder in an attempt to crush the squashed mass into nothingness.

Cinder was basically ran through a hydraulic press under the force of the blonde's hands, being crushed many times worse then she was under Ruby's feet, both because of how Yang was stronger and more forceful when it came to tormenting Cinder, wanting to make sure she felt the impact of each of her palm crushes.

Yang them started to stretch Cinder almost like she wanted to rip Cinder in two, stretching the torturing Villain dozen of times her normal size, stretching to over 3 ft in length as Yang brought her back together before passing Cinder to the next girl in line which was...
135332111.title: They keep Cinder to themselves

choices: Neo peels Cinder off the boot for closer examination
Neo peels Cinder off the boot and throws her out the window
Neo leaves Cinder under her sole and puts the boots away
135332121.content:
Cinder had no idea how this had happened. One moment she was confidently striding across the courtyard on her way to do some more snooping, and the next she was standing on the flagstones at no more than 3 inches tall, with the rest of the world now towering above her. There had been next to no warning, just a sudden headache and a feeling of falling as the ground rushed up to meet her. In an instant the semi-Maiden had been reduced from one of the most powerful and threatening people on the planet to a tiny creature barely even worth taking notice of.

As a rule Cinder did not experience fear. She didn’t allow herself to. But right now, as the ground beneath her feet began to vibrate with the approach of heavy footfalls, she began to think that maybe there was a time for fear after all. When she’d entered the courtyard there had been no one else around, but now the temporary lull in activity had passed and students were starting to enter the area once again, their thunderous footsteps echoing in the tiny criminal’s ears. Eyes darting, the fire-wielder scanned each approaching face and foot, seeking out the quickest path to relative safety.

A flash of black at the corner of the mastermind’s eye caught her attention, and she adjusted her view to see the disguised Neo approaching in the distance, bedecked in the Gothic Lolita-like outfit she’d chosen for combat, complete with heavy black boots. Though far away at first, the steady stride of the short girl was bringing her forward at what seemed a dizzying pace to Cinder and the shrunken girl quickly began to wave her arms back and forth and yell up towards her ally, moving to intercept the illusionist’s path in the hope of being rescued from this potential death trap.

In the end it proved a poor decision. As the disguised girl moved closer it became increasingly apparent that her eyes were not focused on the ground, but rather looking vacantly ahead as she wandered aimlessly. Realising her folly, Cinder attempted to correct her course, but acted far too late to avoid the sole of the boot that rose above her and crashed down with seemingly lethal force.

Cinder had fully expected to die when the massive boot had fallen, but the reality was somehow even worse. Her body was instantly squished into putty by Neo’s footfall, crushed into the treads of the boot like a piece of discarded gum, and stretched painfully over the sole. While most of her body had been mangled and contorted into an unrecognisable mass, her head, crammed deep between the treads, retained enough of its form to allow one eye to stare fearfully down at the ground as the foot lifted, carrying her helpless body along with it as it sailed through the air and came crashing down once again, plunging the tiny criminal back into a world of darkness and pain.

For Neo, she was just taking her usual stroll across the courtyard while pondering what to do with her day. She hadn’t been assigned any information gathering duties, so she was just wandering around for now, not paying much attention to anything, least of all to any stray creatures foolish enough to cross her path. As such, she hadn’t taken any notice of her tiny leader as the girl vanished beneath her boot, nor was she at all concerned with the fact that she was now bringing said leader along with her, mercilessly driving Cinder into the ground over and over again.

It had rained earlier that day but now the sun was starting to bear down, and Neo dutifully corrected her course to head back inside where she wouldn’t be at risk of melting. This took her across one of the academy’s lawns, still heavy with dew and spotted with puddles of mud, but it was of no difference to her. The soles of the illusionist’s boots were thick so even as she stepped down into the muddy grass she didn’t have any concern that it would reach her feet. Indeed, today she had a bit of extra protection under her right boot to help absorb all that dirt in her place.

After a few short minutes for Neo, and an agonising eternity for her little prisoner, she finally stepped off the grass and back into the dorm building, not bothering to wipe off her boots as she made her way back to her own dorm and sat casually on the edge of the bed. Pulling off her boots, and doing her best to ignore the foul stench that was released as she did so, the disguised girl flipped them over briefly to examine the soles. She couldn’t help but make a face at the sheer quantity of mud and torn pieces of grass stuck to the sole, pretty much completely obscuring the original sole and filling up the treads.

Considering whether she should put the boots outside or just wipe them off and stick them under the bed, Neo’s eyes fell briefly on an oddly familiar piece of twisted mud-encrusted gunk near the toe of the right sole, momentarily entertaining the thought of a closer inspection.
135332121.title: Silent Antagonist

choices: Introduce the tiny Cinder to her feet
Find out what Cinder tasted like
Convince Emerald to help, or trick her into doing so
1353321211.content:
Neo was a curious person by nature, and though that curiosity usually followed a more sadistic path she was capable of taking interest in the small things as well. That piece of gunk, whatever it was, had gotten her attention and she quickly ripped it from her sole with minimal effort, noting that whatever it was it was now covered in a healthy layer of mud and wet grass clippings… and it was twitching. Before the surprised illusionist’s very eyes the previously unrecognisable piece of gunk began to stretch and contort into a more familiar shape, the distinct outline of a human body starting to form as some of the larger chunks of mud flaked off and feel to the floor.

After nearly two full minutes of reforming a nearly fully formed body hung from Neo’s fingertips, the only part still missing being the head, which would appear to correlate to the bit of putty that the disguised girl still had crushed between her fingertips. Still curious, she dropped the now clearly feminine body into her other hand, watching as the head slowly took shape and the figure struggled to rise to its feet. It took a moment longer for her to realise just who it was she was looking at, bits of a torn Haven uniform and pale skin becoming visible through the muck.

Disoriented and in pain, Cinder slowly raised her vision to the looming face of her teammate high above, swallowing her fear as she wiped away as much of the mud from her face as she could manage. Her entire body still ached from her experiences under Neo’s boot, but she did her best to force a stern expression on her face, annoyed at the other girl’s lack of immediate action. “Well? Don’t just look at me you fool! Get help!”

Neo of course didn’t respond verbally, not that Cinder had expected her to, but the tiny girl was annoyed to note that her expression didn’t change either. She was about to raise her voice again when she suddenly found herself in motion, falling to her ass as her temporary transport turned around and headed into their adjoined bathroom, barely even bothering to keep her hand flat before unceremoniously dumping Cinder in the basin from a not inconsiderable height.

The tiny criminal didn’t even have a chance to respond to the rough treatment before she was nearly drowned in a torrent of water, knocked flat on her back by the sheer force of the downpour before being picked up in uncaring hands and scrubbed vigorously in an attempt to remove the remaining dirt obscuring her form. Cinder wanted to scream up at Neo to stop, to let her know that she was hurting her, but she was at least glad to feel her body return to a relatively clean, if partially squished, state. When the water finally stopped, she glanced up to see her teammate again, hoping that now that she was clean she’d get some real help, but as her eyes settled on the illusionist’s face the menacing smirk she was met with filled her with nothing but dread.

Dumped just beside the basin, the shrunken mastermind did her best to scramble back to her feet and turn a demanding gaze on Neo as the other girl wiped her hands. “Listen to me girl! I don’t know what you’re thinking, but if you know what’s good for y…”

Cinder had intended to chew Neo out, to remind her that even in this state she still held power over her. To remind her of the deal that Roman had struck on behalf of the both of them. But her words were silenced with a crushing finality as her former subordinate’s hand came down on her with astonishing force, instantly reducing her to a two dimensional smear before the fingers curled back around her and yanked the tiny girl up to hang before the same menacing smirk as before.

From Neo’s perspective she had never particularly disliked Cinder or anything. The older girl’s plans after all had given her plenty of opportunities to exercise her sadism. But this was an opportunity she just couldn’t pass up. She now held in her hands what was essentially a bit of sentient putty, seemingly able to feel pain but unable to be squashed, and completely and utterly subject to her non-existent mercy. It didn’t matter who it was. It could have been anyone as far as she was concerned. What mattered was that as she stretched out her former employer she could see the girl’s face contorting in pain and witness the brief look of horror that came over those eyes as she smashed her hands back together, rubbing them vigorously just so she could feel the defenceless girl’s squishy body oozing between her fingers. It was like a dream come true.

The only question now was, what should she do with Cinder next. Playing with her like this was a lot of fun, and she was enjoying seeing just how much she could stretch her former boss before her body’s resistance would become too much, but even as she continued to stretch and squish and mash and crush the other girl she knew that she wanted to do something more.

Stepping back into the room proper, Neo’s spared a glance down to her own feet, noting how soaked through with sweat her socks had become after being stuck inside her boots for so long, and entertained the thought of introducing Cinder to her undoubtedly rank feet. Then again, she had just gone to the trouble of cleaning the girl so maybe now would be a better opportunity to try something she couldn’t do when her new toy was dirty, like see how she tasted. Another alternative would be to go find Emerald and see if she could convince her to help torture the fire-wielder. That would be fun, though she’d probably have to disguise Cinder first.

After careful consideration, during which time she continued to casually play with the putty in her hands, Neo eventually decided to…
1353321211.title: From Bad to Worse

choices: Cinder refuses to comply and is punished by Neo
Cinder submits and licks Neo’s soles
Someone else enters the room before Cinder can decide
13533212111.content:
Dropping back on her bed and temporarily dumping the thoroughly mashed Cinder beside her, Neo brought her feet up into her lap and peeled off her torn and sweaty socks, casually tossing them in the general direction of her boots. Noting that her soles were dripping with perspiration, the disguised girl took a moment to stretch out her sweaty toes and properly appreciate just how rank her feet had really become before reaching back down for her new toy.

If she’d had any choice in the matter Cinder would have run, but she was still far too squished from her experiences with the giant girl’s hands to move as she was snatched up once again and brought around to face the feet of her capture. Even before contact was made she could tell this was going to be a terrible experience, the dripping sweat filling her vision as she was plunged towards the sole of Neo’s right foot. Actual contact, however, exceeded even her worse fears as she was instantly bathed in sweat and surrounded with an indescribably rank odor. It only got worse as the other girl started to rub her against the foot, one finger placed on the back of her head to ensure that her face was smeared directly into the largest pools of sweat. Cinder couldn’t even close her mouth as she was forced to swallow mouthfuls of the foul liquid, the salty liquid pouring down her throat.

Above, Neo was having the time of her life as she continued to torture her defenceless prisoner. While she enjoyed watching the rest of the tiny girl’s body sponging up her sweat, she took particular pleasure in making sure to drive the mastermind’s head into every sweaty fold, using it to clean the ball of her foot before moving to the crevice of her toes. Smirking, the illusionist then forced the partially flattened head between her toes one by one, smearing Cinder’s face into the accumulated sweat, grime and toejam that had accumulated between the digits, unaware and uncaring that she was forcing her former boss to swallow some of the foul detritus.

At this point Cinder wasn’t sure if she could take anymore, nor could she wrap her head around how things had ended up like this. She was soaked with sweat and covered in grime, feeling like the sickening mixture was literally beneath her skin at this point. To make matters worse her stomach and throat were coated in a mix of substances she’d rather not think about, and all she could taste and smell was her teammate’s feet. She couldn’t even fight back or complain, since Neo’s harsh treatment ensured she was constantly caught between being squished and reforming.

It took several long minutes of constant torment for the illusionist to satisfy herself that her right foot was clean, and several more for her to repeat the process on her left. But by the time she had finished with both soles her rising excitement over the process had caused her entire body to heat up and her feet to perspire further, presenting Cinder with a never-ending cycle of torment.

Eventually, however, Neo grew tired of being the one doing all the work and dumped her new toy on the bed, waiting for the shrunken criminal to reform enough to shoot a withering glare at her before motioning to her feet and wiggling her toes in a silent demand to be massaged. Cinder responded with a string of curses and some unflattering commentary on the nature of the other girl’s parentage, because there was no way she was ever going to willingly approach those monstrosities.

Or at least that was what she thought.

Neo didn’t even blink an eye at the abuse that was being hurled at her, simply unfolding her legs and, with a movement too fast for Cinder to even follow, let alone avoid, brought her feet together around the tiny girl, enjoying the audible wet squish as the sweaty soles flattened her team leader into a perfect foot rag. Not wasting any time on such pointless concepts as mercy, the illusionist violently rubbed her feet back and forth, making sure to squeeze as much sweat as possible into the abused girl as she twisted and mashed her between the shifting soles. All to deliver a clear message. That she was to be obeyed without question or even worse punishments would follow.

After several more minutes of torture Neo finally relented, separating her feet and leaning down to peel the totally flat Cinder from her sole before dumping her on the bed again. Returning her feet to their previous position she waited for the shrunken student to reform enough to watch as she pointed to her feet again, this time sticking out her tongue to indicate that she wanted her toy to lick the soles and narrowing her eyes to remind her captive of the consequences of non-compliance.
13533212111.title: Neo Dominates Cinder

choices: Neo hides Cinder somewhere on her own body
Neo disguises Cinder as someone else and presents her to Emerald
135332121112.content:
At this point Cinder wanted nothing more than to tell Neo exactly what she could do with herself in excruciating detail, and to remind her exactly what happened to people who defied her. But as much as her arrogance screamed at her to give voice to those thoughts, the rational part of her knew that it would be the wrong decision. There was nothing she could do against this kind of overwhelming force. Far better to do as she was told for now and wait for an opportunity to escape or alert someone else to her predicament, regardless of what horrors she may have to endure in the interim.

Swallowing her pride, and not giving the illusionist the satisfaction of looking her in the eye, Cinder reluctantly approached the nearest sole. Legs still only partially reformed, she stumbled slightly as she looked up at the rank and sweaty foot, hesitating as she distantly wondered how it had gotten this bad again when she’d just ‘cleaned’ it a few minutes ago.

This shouldn’t have been so difficult for her. Just a few moments ago she’d been forced face first against this very sole. She’d swallowed sweat and toejam and faced utter humiliation as she was grinded into the folds. And yet there was something distinctly different about willingly licking it. It would mean admitting defeat and accepting her position as nothing more than a foot slave for Neo, even if only temporarily. It would mean accepting that she was little more than a bug.

But, she had no choice. So, reluctantly, she extended her tongue and began to lick.

Even though she’d tasted this already, the feeling of the thick sweat sliding down Cinder’s throat remained overwhelming, her body instantly screaming at her not to swallow, and to regurgitate what she had already consumed. It tasted like eating someone’s dirty gym socks and smelled like something had crawled into her nose and died. And that wasn’t even mentioning the grit and grime that continued to slide down her sadistic captor’s feet together with the sweat, inexorably finding its way into the tiny criminal’s mouth as she reluctantly continued to lick.

Above, Neo watched with glee as the tiny Cinder tended to her sole. For the most part she just liked watching the prideful girl utterly humiliate herself, though she had to admit that a part of her was also enjoying the sensation of the tiny tongue running over her foot. She lowered the toes of her other foot down to the fire-wielder’s level and wiggled them slightly, inciting her new toy to start licking between the toes as well, and nearly making her shudder with the pleasant sensation.

Shifting the digits, Neo pulled the shrunken student’s head in deeper and then clenched down, watching gleefully as the rest of Cinder’s body shook in pain as her head was instantly squashed into mush between her toes. She spent a few more moments playing like this before peeling the girl off once again and allowing her to return to her endless licking duties.

The only question now was what to do next? Inevitably her other teammates would eventually return, and Emerald and Mercury would most likely not be on board with the outright torture of their leader. Cinder had manipulated both of them for sure but they had various reasons to remain loyal, and were not particularly close to Neo.

She could simply hide Cinder from the others, preferably somewhere on her own body. It would be fun to have the little mastermind trapped in her boots all day long, or maybe stuck to her body somewhere else, somewhere suitably humiliating and fun for her. But she could also use her semblance to disguise Cinder as someone else and convince Emerald to help her torture the girl instead. Or maybe she could go one step further and not only disguise her toy as someone else but also disguise herself as Cinder and take over the other girl’s plans as her own.
135332121112.title: Cinder Submits

choices: Use Cinder like a stress toy squashing and stretching her with her hands.
Stomp down on Cinder with her bare feet.
13533212112.content:
Having decided to see what her former boss had tasted like, Neo tossed the tiny blob Cinder had been reduced to into her mouth. Cinder had been left in much pain after being squashed by Neo, but it became worse a she saw Neo open her mouth and toss her in.

Confused of what the hell Neo was doing she felt her squashed body being moved by Neo's tongue against the the walls off her mouth as Neo tasted the squashed being currently trapped in her mouth. To Neo's surprise Cinder actually tasted quite good as she licked her squashed form with her tongue. Though this was only the beginning of Neo's plan for the tiny Cinder.

Neo brought the squashed Cinder up to her molars, As she brought them down on the on the shrunken woman chewing her body up like gum. This put Cinder through and agonizing experience as her body was stretched up and down be Neo teeth, reducing Cinders body into a gooey blob. The best(or worst for Cinder) was just about to come.

As Neo brought Cinders demolished form up to her tongue once again, she started to stretch Cinder body out with her tongue until it covered Neo whole tongue. Neo then brought her tongue out her mouth slightly and started to blow causing gum like body to expand out of Neo's mouth.Neo started blowing more and more as the tortured tiny could only wait till body popped, with the small hope for the release of death so that this torture would end.

*POP*

Was all that was heard as Cinder body was splattered on Neo's face. Neo had smiled having enjoyed the experience, Cinder on the other hand was put through the most pain she had ever felt in her body felt like it had been torn to pieces, yet by some sort of being who seemed to have a immense hatred for Cinder she was some how still alive.

Having quite liked the first time she had used Cinder like gum Neo peeled the broken mess Cinder had been reduced to off her face as she balled her body up and tossed her back into her mouth. Neo repeated this process of chewing Cinder up and blowing bubbles with her over and over again eventually Neo decided to try out a difference way off torture Cinder.

Neo had blew Cinder into a bubble once more only this time instead of throwing her back in her mouth and chewing her up again,Neo decided to...
13533212112.title: Cinder gum

choices: Take turns sitting on the tiny 'Ruby'
Drop the girl on the floor and stomp down on her with their feet.
13533212113.content:
Neo decided to get Emerald to help her torture the tiny Cinder, but not before using her semblance to turn Cinder into a form that Emerald would be much more up to torturing.Holding Cinders flattened form in her hand she started to use her semblance to disguise the tiny being she also disguised her look before go out through the halls her own appearance in to her look she had been moments before,after transforming herself and Cinder, Neo then squeezed her hand tightly on the smushed Cinder to stop her from reforming as she walked through the halls to find Emerald.

The walk through the halls had been an unpleasant experience for Cinder, feeling her body being crushed under the hand of her former subordinate. Neo hand had been like a hydraulic press coming down on the splattered Cinder, As Cinder silently cursed about what she was going to do to Neo once she got out of this and back to normal size.

Eventually Neo had got a signal sent to Emerald as she met up with her outside of their dorm having sent her a message to her scroll."So what is it"Emerald said in an annoyed tone questioning what Neo had dragged her here for, being quite vague about why she needed her here, her scroll message literally being "Come to the hallway outside our dorm I need some help with something".

Upon hearing these words, Neo used her hand with wasn't squeezing Cinder to open the door to the dorm they had been staying in, then shaking her closed hand that she held Cinder in to signal Emerald that she had something she wanted to show her. Emerald entered the dorm still not sure why Neo had sent her here as Neo followed Emerald into the dorm. After closing the door Neo opened her hand to show the squashed being that had laid in it.

Being free from Neo hands was a blessing, as Cinder started to reform seeing Emerald looking down at her in a strange way."Oh Emerald it's you, if you would please get me out of Neo's hand and tell the others about this betrayal" Cinder told Emerald.
