From Emerald perspective she had seen a tiny Ruby talking to her."Oh thank goodness it's you Emerald,Please help me I've somehow been shrunken and have been captured by this person I don't even know, please take me away from her" was the words that Emerald heard from the shrunken Cinder disguised as Ruby. Emerald smirked upon seeing the small Ruby,"Wait so you captured and shrunk Ruby" Emerald asked. Neo nodded,"And you called me to help you torture her" Emerald asked, assuming from Neo sadistic behavior, Neo nodded again.

Upon hearing this shocked Cinder as she realized that Neo had disguised her to look like Ruby just so she could get Emerald to help torture her,"YOU BITTT--...!" Was all Cinder could get before Neo squashed her again stretching her body out to show Emerald that the shrunken 'Ruby' was also squishy and stretchy to.

After playing with Cinder for a bit Neo then gave the disguised girl to Emerald to let her have a chance to play with the human putty."Hah this feels great Neo it's nice get some revenge on this girl who has given us so much trouble during our plans" Emerald said enjoying squeezing and stretching the tiny 'Ruby' between her hands.

Cinder had been through much pain as Emerald had forcefully slammed her hand together on her body, Cinder tried her best to retaliate to her oblivious underling but wasn't able to do so because of the relentless squashing Emerald had unleashed on her body making her more and more smushed by the second, As Emerald tortured her shrunken leader.Neo watched from a distance finding much amusement out of the torment being caused to her former leader.

After a few minutes of Emerald demolishing the tiny Cinder, she had laid the squashed girl on her bed, as Neo signaled her to come over to show her ideas she had typed on her scroll of other ways they could torture the tiny girl.Upon showing Emerald the choices on her scroll the two had agreed that they would...
13533212113.title: Getting help from Emerald

choices: Keep her on her butt for the rest of the fay
135332122.content:
It was a shining day at Beacon Academy, the Vital Festival Tournament was drawing closer everyday. The students all were prepping for the tournament and enjoying peacefully life at Beacon. But, hidden inside Beacon, Cinder Falls was at work on her master plan to bring down Beacon. She was working with her semblance to create a new power to help enact her evil plan.

"With a few more changes, my new power will tear this place to the ground." Cinder plotted and finished her new power. When she began to test it, a strange feeling overwhelmed her body and she blacked out. When she woke up later, something felt different, the room seemed to have grown in size. "Great, a spell that made everything else larger, just what I need."

Cinder began to figure out how she was going to reverse her spell when the ground began to shake. It got more fierce as Cinder watched the doorhandle turn. Staring in awe, Cinder watched her loyal servant Emerald walk into the room.

Emerald walked into her dorm looking for Cinder, who wanted to meet and discuss the plan for the tournament. But when she arrived, Cinder wasn't anywhere. "That's odd, Cinder isn't usually late. Maybe I'm in the wrong place?" She walked towards the bed and heard a light squish under her foot as she crossed the room. "Huh?" Emerald puzzled. She lifted up her boot to see what she stepped in, and was shocked to see Cinder flattened to her foot. "Oh my god! Cinder?! What happens?! Oh god, I killed her. I killed Cinder, I am in so much trouble."

Cinder realized that her power had shrunk her, and somehow being shrunk had made her body malleable. After being stepped on by Emerald, she knew she had to reclaim her power before she ended up a smear under her boot. Prying herself off, Cinder fell onto the bed and regained her shape. For the first time she saw how small she was compared to Emerald. She had been small enough to be stuck completely under her foot, which left her at about 2 inches. She calmed her anger and began to try and gain control over Emerald.

"Sweet child, I'm fine. You just need to be more aware of your surroundings so I don't end up stuck to you for the day. Now, about the plan for..." Cinder started before her head was flattened between two of Emeralds fingers. "Wait...you used your powers to make yourself small and squishy? I don't know why you would ever do that, but if you can't be hurt, then it won't matter what I do to you." Emerald shook Cinder by her flattened head and watched her body struggle back and forth as she tried to break free. She let go and watched Cinders head pop back into shape. "You still will listen to me child, just because of a miscalculation, doesn't mean you can steal control from me."

"I beg to differ, you've been harsh and in control of me for so long. Now it's my turn to have the power and get back at you." Emerald quickly flattened Cinder between her hands, watching her paper body float down to the bed. She then stood up and pulled her pants and underwear down, showing her butt to cinders paper form. "I'll show you how powerful I can be without even having to try." Emerald said as she jumped and landed straight ontop of Cinder. Steamrolling her back and forth to make sure she stuck. She quickly hopped up and walked over to the mirror in the room, turning around to see her leader now stuck firmly to her ass. "Hope you enjoy yourself down there, maybe now you'll respect me alittle more." She said with a slap, causing her flesh and Cinder to jiggle in a wave.

Emerald pulled her pants back up, putting more pressure on her tight butt and crushing Cinder Into it more. Emerald walked out of the room and continued to enjoy her day, now even more exciting because of her passenger. Cinder shook side to side as Emerald walked down the hall, jiggling from each step. Emerald had plans for her boss, and decided to..... .
135332122.title: How the Tables Have Turned

1353321221.content:
Cinder slowly woke up to darkness, her head felt groggy as her brain slowly remembered what was going on.
"Emerald-" She hissed, slowly scrabbling to her feet, her fingers brushing against the strange cardboard floor. Her frown grew as she heard familiar voices.

Ruby sat happily on Blakes bed, casually poking the box forward with her nylon covered toe, threatening to knock the odd box off the table while Weiss read the note,
"Weiiiiiss- come on! Open it-!" Ruby begged, watching with growing boredom as Weiss finished the letter,
"It's from Emerald- apparently she's moving on with her life, and in this box is the mastermind behind everything... or... a toy for relieving stress- she used some odd wording" The ice queen shook her head as Blake wandered over sheeishly with a knife, quickly tearing through the top of the package.
"The mastermind?" Yang frowned, looking over Blakes shoulder as they opened up the box.

Cinder shielded her eyes from the onslaught of light coming from the opening of the box, her tiny figure shuddered as she saw the surprised look of the four members of RWBY. Her hands weakly tried to bat away the invasive hand of Yang who quickly decided to reach in and snatch her up.
"Let me down-" Cinder growled, "I- command you to put me down- or else-" She stutted at the giantesses grin-
"Or else what?" Yang chided, dangling the tiny infront of her giant face with a grin.
"She's apparently very durable- and stretchy-" Weiss commented, picking up the note again. Ruby stood up, pondering for a second,
"As leader- I sayyyy-"
1353321221.title: Team RWBYs revenge

13533212211.content:
Cinder shuddered as she was put down on the floor, the giant girls around her suddenly put her size in perspective from her new point of view.

Weiss raised her eyebrows at her hyperactive leader,
"A- what...?" She questioned, examining Ruby's blush as the girl hopped down from the table, her nylon covered foot almost smashing the tiny Cinder into the unclean floor. The tiny ignored girl stumbled forward, hoping against hope to escape through the open door, only to have her route blocked off by Blakes damp foot,
"It's still a human, an evil one but-" Blake paused, the ball of her foot lifted slightly, she winced at the sound of it sticking to the floor briefly then the look of horror on the tiny girls face.

Cinder stumbled away from Blakes foot- her hand over her nose-
"Disgusting-" She cried out, coughing slightly- before Yangs foot crashed down close to her. The mastermind behind the scenes gagged slightly, almost running under Blakes foot for cover as the horrendous mass wriggled around on the floor.

Yang casually nudged her feet closer to the fleeing girl, clearly on board with the plan.
"Some times you have to STEP up to the occasion- but if she disobeys I guess I'll have to put my FOOT down!" Yang smirked, looking for approval from the shaking heads of her friends.

"I... actually agree with this plan- if this letter is true, then she's caused us a lot of pain and possibly ruined many peoples lives-" Weiss announced, surprising the room. Her blue nail polished toes curled subconsciously in embarrassment at the new found attention-
"Fine..." Blake mewed, Weiss's odd stance swaying the quiet one in the group.

Ruby cried out-
13533212211.title: Tiny Cinders first day-

choices: Weiss gets grossed out, another day with Blake
135332122112.content:
"Go for it Blake-! You have her for the day!" Ruby hopped forward, her nose crinkling as she felt Cinder splat onto her foot,
"But- what am I supposed to do?" Blake spoke, frowning slightly as she watched Ruby attempt to scrape the tiny prisoner off her well worn thin nylons. The team simply shrugged with vague answers and suggestions before finally scrapping the tiny girl into the cats lap.

Cinder cringed as she splatted down onto the soft lap, recalling her tormenting time on the floor as the giants around her gave some tips. Her face turned pale as the black haired beauty shrugged them all off- before picking up the tiny girl from her lap.
"I think I'm just going to read a book-" Blake sighed, looking at Ruby's pouting face, "With her under foot...?" Blake questioned, getting a gleaming smile and a thumbs up in return. The cat girl sighed, quickly leaning across and grabbing her favorite book, knocking Cinder to the floor in the process.

Cinder yelled profanities as she slapped into the floor, her body quickly rolling onto her back to stare down her enemies defiantly only to see Blakes giant foot slamming down towards her. She gave a tiny scream before the plump foot slammed down ontop of her. The powerful squishy toes quickly wiggled and wormed her head into their tight embrace, using her hair to mop up the extreme amount of sweat she had built up. Her tiny voice was met with deaf ears as the expert reader quickly got lost in her own world, grinding her feet down excitedly as she continued her hobby.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------

Cinder felt like she was melting away, she had been trapped underfoot for just under two hours but it felt like years, the damp mass casually moved back and forth over her, steam rolling the evil girl into the 'disgusting skin', Blakes wandering toes often forced open her pets jaw to wipe her foot clean on the stained tongue. Cinder gagged down whatever was crammed down and even attempted licking to appease the cruel cat girl.

Blake honestly didn't think she was being cruel, she barely even registered the girl below her as she got into the story of her book. After two hours of reading she was finally taken out of her dream like state by the growling of her stomach. Quietly she put away her book and stood up, after a few steps her brain suddenly kicked into action, remembering her foot toy by the vibrations from the girls constant swearing, The cat girl shrugged before walking over, grabbing some food, then worming back to her room.

By the time she made it back, Cinder was practically glued onto the object she most despised, her body was completely plastered to the heavy girls foot, her mouth forced open from the pressure as she was pumped into the floor. She was glad when she felt Blake finally attempt to peel her off.

Blake put the flattened 'toy' onto her bed as she rubbed her foot, noticing less sweat then her other foot.
"Wow- did you actually lick my foot?" She chided, glancing over to Cinder with raised eyebrows. Cinder struggled to reform and talk, but her body was still too weak. "That.. kinda feels nice- alright, I won't step on you again, but you've got to finish the job" Blake blushed, scooting over before planting her bear feet.

Not wanting to end up underfoot again, Cinder weakly crawled forward, her body shuddered as she slowly licked the girls heel.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------

Both girls lost track of time, Blake switched feet on the tiny girl, forcing her to lick her foot from scratch while she read, a slight yawn escaped her mouth as she felt her tiny pet stop licking. With a hidden happy mew she wiggled her toes, feeling a bit more comfortable with the sweat gone, replaced instead by the thin layer of saliva.

"This has been... surprisingly enjoyable" Blake spoke to no one in particular as she plucked the tired girl from the foot of her bed. Feeling tired, Blake casually gazed around for something to hold the prisoner in before remembering when the girl was stuck to her foot. Thinking about the cold saliva, she quickly grabbed tiny Cinder, using her to wipe her foot down before placing her on the ground. Cinder looked up weakly, ready to spew out another insult before the slightly cleaner then before foot slammed down upon her.

Blake stiffled a yawn-
"Sorry- I was told to keep you underfoot at all times, and I don't like wearing socks to bed-" The large girl apologised insincerely as she steam rolled the girl into her sole once more.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------

Ruby yawned as she filled the kettle up, enjoying her hot chocolate before bed. Her butt quickly found it's way to the counter as Blake wandered in, her bare feet slapping against the tiles-
"Hey Blake, how was Cinder?" She asked casually, while Blake touch tested the kettle before bringing out her hot water bottle to fill,
"Oddly- pretty good" Blake yawned, scrunching her toes as she filled the bottle- "Going to head to sleep- night-" Ruby gave a small nod, knowing her friend to be not very talkative, especially before bed
"Night Blake- " Ruby smiled.

It wasn't long before Blake slipped under the covers once more, falling back into her old routine as she put the hot water bottle at the foot of her bed. She quickly drifted off to sleep with her playful feet sliding around the length of the heated bottle.

Cinder whined quitely, unable to make much noise as her work was undone under the sudden change of temperature. The heat was overwhelming, opening up the girls pours to make the foot slick once more, this time however, Cinder was under the gunk. her quiet whining was soon silenced my her ichy other foot as Blake slammed the two monsters together.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------

Morning slowly dragged into the picture as Blake slowly woke up. Cinder was still smothered by the damp foot and lukewarm water bottle. Her tiny body melted and smeared into the grime surrounding her soppy foot.
"I need- a shower-" Blake spoke, not hearing the angry yells under her foot as she slid out of bed, only to be met with an impatient looking Weiss waited for her turn.
"Ah- I believe it's my turn miscreant" She frowned, watching Blake sit back down with an affirmative nod.
135332122112.title: At Blakes feet

choices: Follow Weiss on her trip around Vale
Skip to Weiss’s return to the dorms
Weiss is interrupted before she can reach the docks
1353321221121.content:
Blake frowned slightly as she lifted her foot. Partially at the stale smell of her own foot sweat but mostly at the wet smear that Cinder had been reduced to. Though she’d stopped thinking of the tiny thing as a human sometime around when she had last plastered her to her foot, it was still disconcerting to see the girl’s crushed form reduced to little more than a tattoo on her moist sole. The fire-user had been flattened so badly that it took several moments for the Faunus to get sufficient purchase with her fingernails to rip her off, the tortured body coming off with a disturbingly wet sound, like removing a sodden bandage from an equally sodden body.

Weiss was also disturbed as she watched her friend struggle to remove their new foot pet from her clearly over-heated feet. There was no way she was touching that thing with her hands. It would be tantamount to touching Blake’s sole directly, something she had no intention of doing at this time. Instead she reached into her pocket and pooled out a delicate lace handkerchief, momentarily regretting the need to soil such a thing before holding it out towards her teammate.

The Faunus girl wasted no time dropping the crumbled Cinder into the heiress’s handkerchief, though it took her a moment to shake the girl loose, the sweat having already begun to adhere to her fingers. The moment the mastermind landed in the lace it was instantly crumbled around her, Weiss squeezing it around her toy before rubbing it vigorously between her palms, intent on removing as much of Blake’s foot sweat as possible before playing with the little girl.

Cinder herself had had no time to appreciate her temporary freedom. She’d been happy of course to be freed from Blake’s hellish foot, but the experience was no better within the confines of Weiss’s handkerchief. The palms on either side of the cloth were relentless as they twisted her body in every direction, burning her with the friction of the fabric even as the foot sweat that still covered her was being smeared across her skin. The excess sweat was being absorbed by the lace but that sodden lace was in turn being rubbed back over the tiny criminal, ensuring she had no escape from the smell of the Faunus’s feet, which had long since embedded itself in her tortured nostrils.

Finally satisfied that she had removed a sufficient quantity of the grime, Weiss unfolded the handkerchief and allowed Cinder’s mangled form to slide out, slipping over the edge and into the opening of the tights she held out below. The broken girl slid helplessly into the left sock of the sheer white tights, thankful at least to find that they had obviously been cleaned recently. Though she knew it was only a matter of time before she would be introduced to this girl’s foot as well.

Peering down into the tights, Weiss could barely see the little criminal squirming uselessly in the left sock. “You better get used to it down there, because that’s where you’re staying all day.” She smirked knowingly. “Unlike Blake I have no intentions of just sitting around all day either. I’m going to go do some shopping in Vale, and it’s your job to keep my left foot comfortable.”

Weiss wasn’t sure if Cinder could even understand her words like that, and she didn’t care either. As much as she tried to suppress it her upbringing had engendered a sense of entitlement in her that constantly sought opportunities to control others. She’d never do something like that to her friends of course, but now that this opportunity had presented itself she wasn’t going to let it go. After all it wasn’t like this thing deserved any better. If everything that letter said was true than she’d done terrible things, and intended to do worse. She deserved to be a slave to their feet, to be reduced to nothing more than a piece of grime on their soles or a bug between their toes. And Weiss would take great pleasure in making sure that she experienced everything that was coming to her.

There was no time for Cinder to even contemplate escape as the heiress plunged her foot into the tights and skilfully wrap her toes around the criminal’s shrunken form, making sure to wedge the entire body into the gap between her toes and her sole. The small girl’s head was instantly crushed beneath Weiss’s big toe, while she squeezed the rest of the body like a piece of putty, enjoying the feeling as the other girl’s squishy body was forced into the gaps between each digit.

Deliberately grabbing her highest heels, Weiss slipped them on, knowing that the pressure on her toes would only be increased by the high angle, and relishing the opportunity to increase the torment she was inflicting. Below, Cinder could do nothing to defend herself as she was mercilessly crushed under a far greater pressure than she had ever experienced under Blake, the sweat of the heiress’s toes already beginning to leak into her as the heat began to rise.

Taking only a moment to wish her teammates a good day, Weiss stepped out of the dorm, deliberately favouring her left foot as she strode down Beacon’s hallways towards the docks that would take her into Vale, and savouring the delightful feeling of the mush between her toes.
1353321221121.title: Cinder’s Next Mistress

choices: Cinder is still visible and detachable and Weiss is forced to hand her over
Cinder has become indistinguishable from Weiss’s foot
Cinder is still visible but has been completely ironed on to Weiss’s foot
13533212211212.content:
The sun had long since descended below the horizon when a tired and sweaty Weiss stepped off the last airship into Beacon, gathering up her bags of purchases and heading straight for the dorms.

The heiress had made the most of her day in the city, hitting up every major store she could think of, as she purchased dust, clothes, school supplies and any number of other things. Usually, she was far more reserved with her purchases and careful with her time, but today there had been a spring in her step and a determined glint in her eye as she set out to ensure she spent as much time on her feet as humanly possible. All day she had continued to favour her left foot, allowing her increasingly sweaty toes to play with the utterly mangled body of the tiny criminal trapped within their embrace. Even when she purchased shoes she would try on the right one only to make sure the fit was good, ensuring there was no chance for Cinder to escape the ever expanding pool of sweat in her left heel.

Over time the feeling of the girl beneath Weiss’s toes had become indistinguishable from the usual feeling of grime and sweat, the shrunken girl’s existence ground down to such an extent that she practically became an extension of the foot that held her prisoner. Yet the fencer made sure to never forget what it was that she had beneath her feet, using her moist toes to play with the tiny student every chance she got and driving her ever further into the toe crevice. Whenever she was standing still she would twist her left foot around, ensuring there was absolutely no reprieve. If she ever even thought the girl was trying to squirm or escape she’d stomp down with all the force she could muster and wouldn’t stop until she was sure that all movement had ceased. It had been absolutely exhilarating to know just how much power she had over that tiny piece of human trash.

Now that she was back a part of her wanted to see just what sort of state she’d reduced Cinder to, hoping that she’d at least managed to do more damage than Blake. If she was lucky she may have smeared the tiny thing so badly that no-one would ever be able to recognise she was even there, then she’d be able to keep her forever without anyone knowing where she was.

No, it wasn’t enough yet, not nearly enough. If she checked now and her toy was still visible then her teammates would know and she’d have no choice come the next morning but to turn her over to either Yang or Ruby. But if she kept her there and continued the torment then, when she finally pulled off the tights the next morning she could claim ignorance if the tiny bug had disappeared, suggest that she had escaped somehow when she was distracted.

It was with that mindset that she slipped out of her heels and turned to face her partner, the girl having been watching her curiously from the top bunk ever since she came stomping into the room. “Ruby, I need to borrow your boots.” She sighed irritably at the raised eyebrow she received in response. “Just for the night, my feet are cold.” It was a stupid lie, but she didn’t want to remind the girl of their little prisoner just yet and it seemed to work as the younger girl just shrugged and nodded, motioning to the boots sitting at the foot of Weiss’s bed.

Reaching down to grab the boots, Weiss next headed to the small adjacent bathroom, and in particular to the used clothes basket. After a small amount of rummaging, she located what she was looking for, the pair of nylons Blake had worn today, together with Yang’s used socks. Fortunately the other girls’ legs were more toned than her own and she had little difficulty pulling one of Blake’s nylons over the left half of her own tights, and then one of Yang’s socks after that. Repeating the process with the other nylon and sock on the same foot was more difficult, but after a bit of working her left foot was encased in five layers of fabric, saturated in the combined sweat and horrid foot stench of the three older members of Team RWBY. Once that was done she shoved the whole thing into the cushy interior of Ruby’s left combat boot, just barely squeezing it in, and smiling with satisfaction as she felt her foot sinking deeply into the moist insole of her leader’s footwear.

It looked ridiculous of course, and immensely lopsided, but Weiss didn’t care. She had a plan. While sleeping there was little she could do to make Cinder anymore indistinguishable from her sole other than to keep the pressure up, but that didn’t mean she couldn’t aim for a plan B. Simply put, if she couldn’t make the girl invisible than she’d simply make sure she was adhered so badly to her foot that no-one would ever be able to free her. Already she could feel the heat on her foot rising and the sweat beginning to poor down into the boot, undoubtedly drowning her little captive in a world of heat and stench and, with any luck, slowly ironing her into the warm and sweaty flesh.

Secure in her victory, the heiress climbed into bed, shoving Ruby’s right boot under the desk and skilfully hiding from the eyes of her teammates as she pulled up her covers and made sure her left leg in particular was as nice and toasty as possible. In reality the whole situation was quite uncomfortable, but the hope that tomorrow would see her as the full-time owner of her own little foot toy was enough to send Weiss off into a world of pleasant dreams, even as below the tiny Cinder was subjected to a hell unlike anything she could have ever imagined.

When the next morning comes, what state has Cinder been reduced to?
13533212211212.title: A Permanent Part of the Heiress’s Foot?

choices: " I can get her off, let me try."
"Make sure to wear something extra sweaty for her."
135332122112123.content:
As the forceful heiress slept above, Cinder was feeling hotter than she ever had before in the tight space off all this fabric. The combined stench from all four of the girls made for a toxic tasting air, burning her lungs with each forced huff as the night went on. Spending a day under Weiss was one thing, but at this rate, Cinder would be stuck beneath the sword wielder forever! The heat made sweat pour out of every crevice and into her body. Drops of sweat seeming to soak through from Ruby's boot to completely cover the poor girl to a flattened puddle.

An hour or so went by, suffering through heat, sweat, grime, and the occasional toe wiggles. That's when the heat really began to do it's job. All the layers placed around her left foot were cooking her skin, forcing her pores to open up to cool off and let more sweat escape. Cinder, finally free from the content rejection of escape, began to try and peel herself free from the stubborn girls sole. But, the force from the combined fabrics were pressing back on her, forcing her body to remain flat and squished further into the sweaty sole.

Each little pore started to nip at the fire users body, pulling it under Weiss' sweaty skin. Having space to move into, her body instantly found relief by reform under her skin, sinking Cinder in like a tattoo. While the room was silent, Cinders tiny screams echoed out through the boot as she tried desperately to break free from this torture. Every little inch she was pushed back was only met with force from the socks, keeping her nostrils filled with sweat; and also giving the heiress exactly what she dreamed for.


The sun rose the next morning as Weiss began to wake from a lovely dream, feeling refreshed but extremely hot. "Oh god...I can't imagine how bad it must me down there. She has to be gone for sure!" She thought to herself, feeling her foot pruning from the long night in multiple layers. Taking a quick look around to see her teammates still somewhat asleep, she quick threw the covers off and set the sweaty boot down with a Stomp. If Cinder had fallen asleep somehow last night, she wanted to make sure she was awake for this. "Now, let's see how far you sank in last night." She said with a sadistic smirk, beginning to untie Ruby's boot.

The heat and stench could be smelt as soon as Weiss took her foot out, spreading across to the whole room. "Oh god, *cough cough* what a disgusting stench." She winced, starting to peel off each layer of sock and nylon, each one getting sweatier as they were removed. While her plan was beginning to come to and end, the smell from last night began to wake the other members of team RWBY. Yang in particular was the one to wake up first.

"Ugh....god, what IS that smell? Weiss, did you cause all of this?" The blonde fighter asked, plugging her nose as she rose with a rude Awakening. That's when she remembered that today was her day to spend with Cinder underfoot. She had big plans for her, wanting to go training and fighting with her in her favorite brown boots. Her lilac eyes looked down at the heiress' feet, seeing them already barefoot from a goodnight sleep. "Oh riiiiight, hey Weiss, time to give up the insole. That little bug and I get to spend the day together. Hopefully we will get off on the right foot." Her smug face from her pun only made Weiss groan in disgust. "Do you always have to make a pun?"

Yang hopped off her bed and waisted no time picking up Weiss' feet, trying to find Cinder. "H-hey, what do you think you're doing?!" She shrieked a bit, flustered to see her teammate so willingly grab her feet. "Relax, I'm just peeling her off your sole and then I'll.....huh? She won't come off...I can't even feel her!" At that moment, Weiss gained a wicked smile and devious eyes as she whiped her foot from Yang. She quickly looked down at her sole to see Cinder clear as day. While it wasn't what she wanted to happen, after scratching at the girls face, she found that she was scratching her own skin directly.

"Oh my god, she's under my skin! It worked!" She exclaimed with glee, taking pride in the girls broken and screaming face stuck as a part of her. "Wait, what do you mean it worked?! Did you do this on purpose?!" The brawler replied with for eyes. Her excitement let her master plan slip out, and now she would have to cover for herself. "I mean...it worked, my foot is nice and warm just like Ruby said it would be! She let me borrow her boots to stay warm last night. My feet get pretty cold without them."

Yangs eyes seemed to calm a bit, not really believing her, but knowing there wasn't much more they could do. "Of course you'd get cold feet Ice Queen. You must have been cooking to get her under your skin." She sighed, giving cinder a poke before standing up and starting to get ready for the day. Weiss was filled with pride, stroking her pruny foot over and over to just tease the little girl. She had become part of her now, and Weiss would get to enjoy the pleasure of knowing she would be stomping over a worthless little bug every second of everyday.

As she began to get up though, Yang stopped her for a moment. "Hold on Weiss........
135332122112123.title: Weiss' New Tattoo

choices: Shrink Coco Adel, leader of Team CFVY
Shrink another member of Team CFVY
1353322.content:
How about a member of Team CFVY?

The leader Coco, or another team member?
1353322.title: Coffee Fix

choices: Ruby Rose, hoping to snap some cookies from the cafeteria
13533221.content:
It was well past the time Coco would usually have returned to her team’s dorm for the night and she was in a bad mood as she stalked down the halls of Beacon Academy. Partially because of the severe talking to she’d just gotten from Professor Goodwitch, partially because of the thin coating of dust that was still irritating her skin, but mostly because of the fight that had precipitated it all.

That braggart Cardin Winchester had been giving her teammate Velvet trouble since the day he’d entered the academy. For the most part Coco had tried to let it slide. After all, Velvet herself had asked her team not to intervene, feeling it wasn’t worth getting in trouble just to put some troublesome first years in their place. But really, there was only so much she could tolerate.

So when she’d caught Cardin and his cronies planning to dump several beakers full of powdered dust over the innocent rabbit Faunus for no reason other than pointless bigotry and their own sense of entitlement, she’d retaliated by punching the numbskull in his big stupid face. She’d gotten herself covered in half of the dust from the beakers for her trouble, but the other half had ended up over Team CRDL and Cardin had been left with a broken jaw so it was 100% worth it.

Of course she’d gotten dragged off by Goodwitch afterwards, both to get scolded for straight out punching another student and to get checked for any side effects of the dust exposure. Mixing powdered dust without a proven recipe was dangerous at the best of times, mixing several beakers worth was just asking for trouble. Even so, there was no immediate sign of any problems, so after brushing off any obvious deposits of dust, Glynda had let her go with instructions to get some rest.

All of this had left Coco with a distinctly sour disposition, which was only worsened as she inevitably remembered all the other times some jerk had taken issue with Velvet’s ears, or Fox’s eyes, or Yatsu’s quiet nature. All of it was giving her the worst headache.

In fact that headache was quickly becoming more of a problem than she had anticipated. The drumming in her skull was building to a painful crescendo as her vision began to swim. She stumbled into the wall as she experienced a sensation like the floor had suddenly dropped away and she was starting to fall. Instinctively she brought up her arms to break her fall. Then everything went black.

…

Coco didn’t know how much time had passed by the time her vision started to return, her senses still dulled by the aftermath of whatever fate had befallen her. At least the headache was fading.

Yet as her eyes adjusted again she was faced with an impossible sight, enough to make her wonder if she was still unconscious. Where before the carpet had extended just a few feet before the next corner, now it extended out as a vast plain before her, the wall she had fallen against now far out of reach and the ceiling looming an impossible distance overhead.

The rational part of Coco’s mind wanted to deny what she was seeing, but the part of her that was training to fight monsters for a living couldn’t deny the reality of her situation. Someone, impossibly, the fashionista had been reduced to what she would roughly estimate to be around 2 inches in height. Small enough that the reverberations of the footsteps now echoing down the hall shook her to her core, her eyes trailing up and up to behold the rapidly approaching figure of…
13533221.title: Miniature Fashionista

choices: Sees Coco’s flattened body and peels her off
Sees a squished lump of trash
135332211.content:
Coco’s breath caught in her throat as she looked up at the massive form of her Faunus teammate. Usually she was significantly taller than Velvet, ears notwithstanding, so it was particularly jarring to see the gentle girl now standing taller than most buildings, her rapidly approaching footsteps producing miniature earthquakes even through the soft carpeted floor.

It was clear that Velvet was dressed for bed, her feet bare and the rest of her body covered only with a pair of light brown booty shorts and a tank top. The slight bounce of her chest made it clear that she wasn’t wearing any underwear either. Her state of dress and the manner in which she was glancing around nervously as she walked suggested she had left the dorm in something of a rush.

The fast speed of the Faunus’ approach left Coco with only a split second to reach a determination of her next actions. On the one hand she could flatten herself to the wall and avoid her friend’s gaze, but then she’d be left alone in the hallway with no way of seeking help. On the other hand she could dash out and try to get Velvet’s attention, with the associated risk of being crushed accidentally.

Well, she wouldn’t have come to Beacon if she wasn’t prepared to take risks.

Realising this was her best chance of getting help, Coco threw caution to the wind and quickly dashed out to the center of the hallway and started to wave her arms up at Velvet, yelling as loudly as possible to get her teammate’s attention. For a brief moment she thought she had been successful, the Faunus’ eyes turning in her direction. But then they continued on and the sky was replaced with the descending shadow of Velvet’s right foot.

When Coco hadn’t returned after the earlier incident with Cardin, Velvet had become worried. It was bad enough that her leader was going to get in trouble because of her problems, but the chance that the dust had caused some harm the taller girl was almost more than Velvet could bear. She loved her team, she really did, and more than anything she didn’t want them getting hurt for her, or because of her burdens. It wasn’t that she didn’t appreciate the fact that they cared about her enough to step in when she was in trouble, but she just wished they’d be more careful about it.

It was with that determination that the rabbit Faunus had left the safety or her dorm room in the direction of Professor Goodwitch’s office, hoping to meet Coco along the way. She kept glancing around out of nervousness that should other student would see her in her night clothes, but so far the cost appeared to be mercifully clear. For a brief moment she thought she heard someone in the distance, but as her eyes flicked in that direction she confirmed that the hallway was still empty and casually took another step in her ongoing search for Coco.

Coco didn’t even have a chance to dodge as her friend’s foot came down with crushing force, forcing her to her back and filling her vision as it sought out the ground below.

For Velvet it just felt like she’d stepped on an uneven bit of carpet that flattened out evenly under her weight, whereas Coco experienced the unsettling and painful experience of her body flattened out under the sole of the Faunus girl. Rather than being crushed to death as she had expected, her body gave in under the pressure and flattened out into a two dimensional shape, crushed deep into the carpet by Velvet’s slightly damp sole before being lifted into the air once again.

The slightly gummy nature of Coco’s body allowed her to stick to her teammates’ sole as Velvet continued down the hall and around the corner, step after step pounding her into the ground and grinding out the third dimension of her body. Her face had been flattened to the ball of the Faunus’ foot and her senses, when they weren’t consumed by the pressure and agony of being forced into the carpet below, were dominated by the taste and smell of Velvet’s foot.

This continued for several dozen steps but eventually the slight irritation to Velvet’s sole and the quiet squishing noise of the progressive flattening of her body was enough to draw the rabbit girl’s attention to her sole and she paused to lift her foot an examine her unwanted passenger.
135332211.title: Lepus Maximus

choices: Safely arrive at the dorm, Fox and Yatsuhashi are on a mission (Reserved)
They make is safely to the dorm room and the rest of their team
Velvet runs into someone on the way to their room
1353322111.content:
For a long moment Velvet wasn’t sure what she was looking at. A clump of tan and brown smeared over her foot, the main mass a mix of textures while the extremities were a consistent tan colour that nearly blended in completely with her sole and looked almost like…

With a gasp the Faunus stumbled back and nearly put her foot back on the ground before catching herself against the wall and lifting her foot as close to her face as possible. Ignoring the slight smell that assaulted her nostrils, her keen eyes confirm what she had feared, the small form of her squished team leader practically ironed into the sole of her foot.

For a few terrifying seconds Velvet was sure that she’d killed her friend, snuffed her out with her careless steps, but then Coco twitched and in a single blur of movement the bigger girl had dug her nails beneath the edges of her friend’s flattened form and ripped her from her sole with a sound and sensation not unlike removing a wet bandage.

Coco was aware of the lessened pressure as she was lifted from the ground but wasn’t sure what was going on until she heard the sound of Velvet’s gasp and the subsequent violent movement as the girl stumbled into the wall. For Coco’s sake, Velvet tried to get her breathing under control, though the tears continued to trail down her cheeks. She lowered her voice to a whisper as brought her cupped hands up against her chest. “I’m really sorry I stepped on you Coco, and I’m so glad you weren’t hurt. 1353322322.title: Raven.

choices: Try and ask a member of team RWBY for help
13533223221.content:
Raven watched her daughter from afar as she so often did. Every time she would either be chatting away with friends, doing dangerous missions, or just enjoying herself training. Each and every day she was getting stronger, that was something to be respected.

Today was more of the same though. At least that's what Raven thought as she took flight and landed on a nearby tree branch. She was currently in her bird form as she watched team RWBY through their window. It was open so it was easy to hear all four girls ramble on about... stuff.

That girl in black, Blake, she thought her name was, was mostly keeping out of the conversation. She seemed more interested in her book. Raven could tell the Schnee girl was stressed out from their team leaders bubbliness and was doing her best not to yell. Ruby, the leader was a cheerful as always. She was just like a mini clone of Summer.

Then there was Yang. She looked so much like her, except she seemed to get her father's color scheme. She was a walking body of energy looking for adventure. She was also the maker of extremely bad puns. She must've gotten that from her father as well.

A part of her wanted to go talk to her, but decided against it. From what she'd observed of the buxom blonde, she had a very bad temper. She was more likely to hit first and ask questions later. That was something Raven would rather avoid. But maybe one day they'd talk. Maybe?

Raven jumped down from her perch before returning to her human state. It was starting to storm and she wanted no part of the rain. With a sigh she drew her sword and swiped the air. Before her a crimson gateway opened. It was time to leave.

Without lookin back she walked through the portal. When she did she expected to be back at camp. She expected a barren landscape filled with tents, fire, and infighting. Maybe even Vernal kicking a man while he was down? But the last thing she expected was THIS!

Her crimson eyes frantically looked around as if expecting an attack, and what she found shook her. She recognized this place. She'd snuck in here a few times when it's residents were out. This was team RWBY's dorm. Only it looked a hell of a lot bigger. Or to be more precise, she'd gotten a hell of a lot smaller.

"How?" Raven whispered. She must be at least an inch or two tall. Three if she was being generous.

Up above the voices of team RWBY were like thunder. At her size it was like she didn't escape the ensuing thunder outside. Just how had she gotten here in this state? Did her semblance have something to do with this? If so, then maybe it could fix it?

She tried using her portal again only to end up closer to team RWBY, or Yang to be more accurate. And did this dorm just get even bigger all of a sudden? That's when it hit her that she'd just lost an inch. Somehow going through her portal shrunk her. Raven made a mental not to use her semblance again lest she shrink out f existence. She currently dove under a bed for cover as team RWBY's conversation ended.

Raven watched as It appeared all the girl's were splitting up. Yang looked like she'd be staying for a while. As the rest of team Ruby appeared to be leaving, Raven was left with quite a dilemma. She needed help, as loath as she was to admit it. She could either try and get it from Yang, but that had it's fair share of cons. Or she could try asking one of her teammates for help.

What was she going to do...?

The dust would shrink the affected target and would make them squishy along with making them unable to use their aura or semblance, turning them into nothing but a little toy for Raven to play with, unfortunately the vial of the had cracked during her battle with Cinder and was slowly taking it toll on Raven and would eventually reduce Raven to a few inches in height.

141.content:
Jaune opened his eyes wearily, his mind felt foggy as light flooded into his room. He groaned as an odd headache slowly ebbed away, his hand lazily tried to rise to block out the world, but it wouldn't respond.
"What- did I sleep weird again...?" Jaune mumbled, trying to turn his head. Not even that would respond, his mind slowly activated as his eyes were oddly forced open. He recognized that he wasn't in his own bed- he was somewhere unfamiliar. Trying to say something he noticed that he couldn't talk, "Hey?" He blurted out, yet no sound was actually released. He gulped as he noticed that he wasn't alone-

What did he turn into?
141.title: Jaune

1413.content:
Jaune gazed up at the dark ceiling with minor worry, above lay a Cabernet of some kind, rolling his eyes to the side showed a toilet of some kind. It looked like one of the dorm bathrooms.
"Calm down! Perhaps I slept in the bathroom? That can happen- right?" Jaune swallowed, not fully grasping the situation.

After a few minutes of waiting, a door creaked open, light flooded the room making the tiny leader squint slightly. He noted down that he couldn't close his eyes, although he felt no need to blink. A tired looking figure yawned as it stumbled into view, Jaune almost immediately sighed with relief as none other then Ruby shuffled into his view. He tried to call out to the sleepy leader, her bed head clearly showing as she dumped her towel and clothes on the floor, "Ruby! I was wondering what happened- did I sleep in your bathroom? What's up with that? Haha-!" Jaune nervously tried to communicate, yet he felt something was wrong. Little red looked huge from this perspective, her eyes stared directly at little Jaune without surprise or greeting. Her huge hand lazily reached out to him, causing him to yell.

Still unsure what was going on, the once blonde haired leader of JNPR was lifted up with ease by the leader of RWBY, her iron tight grip squeezing him heavily as he questioned what was going on once more. A mirror filled his vision, showing a tired Ruby awkwardly biting off the top to her toothpaste. Jaune gazed blankly at the hand that held him, yet all he saw was a frayed toothbrush. Slowly putting two and two together as the tube of toothpaste approached him, he struggled harder then ever to move, yet his toothbrush body refused to move. It wasn't long before Ruby covered his face with minty toothpaste, filling his tastebuds to the brim as he dreaded what would happen next.

The light he had slowly dimmed as he suddenly hit a warm wet surface, Ruby's hard molars bit down on him as she rinsed a bit of toothpaste that fell off. Jaune winced as Ruby's morning breath wafted through the mint.
"Ru-" He yelled, before suddenly getting yanked through pursed lips. His body used to clean the back of each tooth roughly and quickly, in the darkness and foam, Jaune felt like he was in an earth quake before he popped out, trying weakly again to communicate as he tried to recover. "R-" He started, before Ruby bared her teeth once more, opening her mouth to jam him in, scrapping across the top to remove the gunk, occasionally biting on his body before retreating. He didn't even bother trying to communicate as she shut her mouth, foam from his rough housing dribbled down to her chin as she mashed the little brush boy against the front of her teeth.

Jaune felt battered and bruised as he was laid out onto the sinks counter top, he watched with stunned awe as the hyperactive, yet innocent, leader rinsed her mouth out with water, spitting it out into the sink before reaching out for him again. He whined softly as he was brought back into her minty mouth for one last scrubdown.

Back of the teeth, across the top, rubbed up and down her sudded taste-buds before being grinded across her grinning teeth once more. As she set him down on the counter again, he hoped she was done with him, watching her rinse her mouth out a few times before thankfully putting the toothbrush into a cup. He was too battered to even notice her turn on the shower as he dizzily tried to recover from Ruby's tongue lashing and embarrassment of being used.

He felt a slight queezy feeling, like his soul was leaping out of his body. As his vision returned, he slowly registered his new surroundings- he'd turned into-
1413.title: Toothbrushing

14132.content:
Jaune slowly registered an annoyed Weiss throwing clothes on, he instinctivly tried to look away from the cursing dust user.
"Other people need to use the shower too Ruby- the other ones broken!" Weiss complained, looking uncomfortable in her own clothes. The blonde haired boy winced as he saw the normally clean freak girl dump a handful of wetwipes into the bin, he guessed that she didn't want to be late or unclean. He also guessed that fate had chosen this day for him to be one of her items.

He swallowed as hard as a sock could swallow as she sat down next to him, her face cringing as she felt her toes slide against each other. Without any wet wipes left and with time ticking on she mentally swore as the ice queen of the school roughly grabbed Jaunes paralized body. It didn't take long for the complaining Jaune to work out what he was as he saw his partner get swiftly jammed onto Weiss's left foot.

The small leader whimpered as Weiss hardly glanced down, her unwashed foot swiftly entered into him, wiggling down his sock body.
"W-weiss-!" He tried to call out once more as she tugged him tight. Her uncaring eyes wincing as she slowly brought a finger down, idly rubbing his body between her toes, mouthing 'gross' every now and then before remembering the time. Jaune could only whine as the petite girl slammed him into the ground, grinding him down with each step before the lighting changed. Giving up yelling, the tiny sock accepted his fate at the feet of one of his friends as she ram rodded him into her boot. Her cold and clammy foot slowly warmed up as it wriggled yesterdays sock lint into her new socks.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------

Weiss stomped down her heel just as the shower turned off, She shot the door to the shower a dirty look before opening the front door-
"It's 8:54" She called through, smiling as she heard Ruby crashing around the bathroom before leaving herself. She swiftly shut the door behind her before matching off at a quickened pace, listening to her heels crack on the tiled floors as she briskly walked to lessons, Unaware of the torment she was putting her sock through as it soaked up a day and a nights worth of sweat. Weiss sighed, regretting skipping her evening shower for sleep, but glad she found the pack of wet wipes.

She arrived just in time to class, taking her regular seat near to the front as she prepared for her lesson. Her long toes idly curling and pinching at the worn down sock as the lesson started to begin.

It wasn't until later that the sock was to be removed.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------

Jaune felt his body giving up, the abusive toes constantly gripped and pulled at his nose and tongue as his unaware tormentor enjoyed her lessons. The cold feet had slowly heated up durning the day as it flossed him thoroughly between each toe, even when they stopped pinching him he could feel the tiny pieces of lint she had managed to grind down lodged between her toes. After hours of tapping, clenching, wiggling and stomping in the cramped prison of Weiss's boot he realized they had reached the time he had been dreading. Her foot firmly planted it self on his body as she got ready to fight her opponent in a training session. She was merciless- stomping twisting and running to finish the match as fast as possible.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------

Weiss panted, a bead of sweat dribbling down her forhead as her opponent surrendered. She smiled, giving a small bow as the bell rang out once more. The young dust user almost ran as everyone made their way to the locker rooms to get cleaned up. Her grin widened as she slipped into the showerroom first, her mind set being 'first in last out'. Happy to be alone, she quickly yanked off her boots,
"I've got to get up before Ruby-" She winced, noticing the outine of her toes from the sweat on the light blue sock, not noticing her abused sock gasping for air and feebly escape from her filthy foot, Weiss quickly yanked off the rest of her clothes, subconciously procrastinating releasing her foot from her sock last as she hurried to get into the shower.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------

Jaune couldn't complain, he had finally escaped the old boot, his mind and body too worn out to care about the changing girl ontop of him as she hopped out of clothes and made her way towards the showers. Her fingers slowly peeled him away from the sweaty foot just as the noise of chattering girls drifted into the locker room. Jaune didn't care too much until the rushing Weiss flung him into the middle of the floor as she hurried to get to the shower.
"Wait! Weiss!" Jaune tried to yell, but it was pointless. He could already feel her scrubbing off the lint that had once been apart of him. A shudder ran down his spine as the door opened, the crowd of girls wandered towards his crumpled body.

Given no time to think as some of them started to take their boots off, his mind went blank as he glanced up at Coco's sunglasses before her plump bare foot landed ontop of him, her heavy weight grounding down on his frilly body before kicking off. Not given time to recover, a long white socked foot was quick to replace it, kicking him back slightly across the tiled floor. He just barely saw the previous girls bunny ears before a nylon clad foot covered him. The skirt of Ruby fluttered over head as she bore down into him,
"R-Ruby-" Jaune attempted, before Yangs boots decimated his attempts at speech. He was put through turmoil as Blakes bare foot replaced that. The rest of the crowd piled in, completely trampling the poor sock into the ground, he occasionally managed to spot someone he recognised like Emerald and her team before they too hopped ontop of him without thought, Cinders heels finally making him give up hope of escaping the constant trampling.

The crowed slowly died down as everyone made there way into the showers. Jaune couldn't even admire the sight as his flattened body lay still infront of the door in pain. He managed a small groan as he heard the door opening once more for another stomping.
"Wow- when did we get a foot rag?" Nora's chirpy voice buzzed in, her boots and socks slipping off ungracefully as she bounded over to Jaune. Without pause, she quickly stepped down, wiping her feet harshly against the poor socks body with glee before Pyrrha and Ruby stopped her,
"I don't think the school would invest in that-" Ruby smilled, the sock on the ground radiated joy as Pyrrha picked him up away from her hyper team mate. After a quick glance, she dropped the sock off on Weiss's bench,
"Sorry Weiss-" She spoke softly, leaving the sock rest.
14132.title: Socked feet

141321.content: Who is going to sit on Jaune?
141321.title: Who is going to make Jaune their seat

141322.content:
Jaune felt his body move a bit- before the famillier dizzyness washed over him. Everything briefly faded to black as before. He groaned, hoping he was going to change back.

Confusion struck him hard as he awoke in the locker room- the girls still getting changed around him.
"What-" He stuttered, trying to work out where he was. He couldn't move again- his body stuck in place as a shadow cast over him.

What had he turned into this time?
141322.title: Transformed

choices: Pyrrha Nikos (intends to use Jaune as a shower cloth)
Cinder Fall (intends to use Jaune as a sweat rag)
1413222.content:
When Jaune had lost consciousness he had hoped to wake up back in his own bed, or at least somewhere other than the girls’ locker room. A part of him was still hoping that this was all just some crazy and scarily realistic feeling dream. Or maybe he’d gotten hit in the head during training and this was all just the result of a concussion. In truth, he’d take waking up in the infirmary, again, over… this any day of the week.

But of course it wasn’t to be, and he found himself once against looking at the same scene as before, though admittedly from a notably different angle. His new body now hung from a small hook on the rear wall of the locker room, giving him a perfect view of the surrounding students in varying states of dress and the shower beyond. If the circumstances were different, he may even have enjoyed it somewhat.

Jaune could more or less feel that he was still mostly two-dimensional, but couldn’t see the exact form he had taken. The cotton and fuzz of his abused sock body had been exchanged for the pliable and absorbent texture of an all-purpose rag, the shape of his body now a flat square of cloth.

He couldn’t see it, but the shadow above him could.

The trapped knight had very little time to take in his new situation as the encroaching shadow fell further across him. His senses appeared to be focused somewhere near the ‘front’ of the rag but from his low angle he couldn’t make out the face of his visitor, nor could he do anything to stop her slender fingers closing around him and removing him from his place on the wall.

Tugged off the hook, Jaune was allowed to flop listlessly against the side of his newfound capture as they turned and headed back towards the changing area, or the showers beyond. He still couldn’t see their face, but as they advanced he heard his capture’s voice booming around him, declaring that whatever he was, he was just what they had been looking for.

He’d recognise that voice anywhere, but what was she going to use him for?
1413222.title: Absorbent Knight

choices: Snaps out of it and finishes her shower, taking Jaune with her
Snaps out of it and finishes her shower, hanging Jaune back up
Becomes more aroused at the contact and brings Jaune ‘lower’
14132221.content:
Jaune looked up in confusion as he was raised and hung from a small hook in one of the showers, finding himself now nearly face to face with his partner, the tall redhead looking down at him with the small smile he was used to receiving on a daily basis. But that look that usually brought him comfort now filled him with dread, as Pyrrha turned on the shower and reached to grab the soap.

Unaware of Jaune’s plight, Pyrrha was just glad she’d managed to find a spare shower cloth, or close enough. For whatever reason there seemed to be precious few available in the locker room today, and she always preferred to have one to clean out the hard to reach places of her body. Hanging her find from the nearest hook, she flicked on the shower and quickly began lathering herself up with soap, unintentionally giving her partner the show of his life as she ran her hands all over her body, making sure to lather herself thoroughly before reaching for the unfortunate rag once again.

There was nothing Jaune could do as he was grabbed by his partner, her wet hands feeling ice cold against his ‘skin’ as the water literally soaked into him. Before he even had time to brace himself the part of the rag most closely linked to his face was pushed up against Pyrrha’s abs and his senses were instantly filed with the acidic taste of the soap covering the girl’s skin, together with the accumulated sweat and grime from a long day of classes and battles. His body was quickly moved across the redhead’s abdomen and sides, around her back and up and down each arm and leg, picking up more and more soap and grime as it soaked deep into his body.

Unfortunately for Jaune, he soon found that cleaning his partner’s extremities was the least of his problems, as Pyrrha lifted an arm and mercilessly ground his ‘face’ against the days’ worth of filth that had accumulated within her armpit. An overwhelming quantity of sweat, and a healthy dose of acidic soap, poured into his body as he was vigorously rubbed into the grimy flesh. He’d known the girl could work up quite a sweat during practice but he’d never really had to face the consequences of it like this, as the redhead was good at making sure to clean up after practice.

Of course, no sooner was he freed from one hell then he was plunged deep into another, as Pyrrha casually moved him from one pit and rubbed him just as vigorously into the other. For Jaune it felt like things couldn’t get any worse, though deep down he knew this was far from done.

For Pyrrha there was no reason to pay any more attention to this particular rag than she would any other, which was to say no attention at all. Finishing with her armpits to her own satisfaction, she took a moment to squeeze out the excess soap and grime from the cloth before lowering it her feet, quickly cleaning the soles before taking her time to clean between each toe. Excessive perhaps, but she was nothing if not fastidious when it came to showering.
