Weiss felt- tenderized. Her body going limp and no longer supporting Yang's foot as well as it should of done.
"Please- just take me off-" She said in her head.

Yang pulled the sock up again.
"Well- I guess this is going straight in the bin. This really socks- sucks... dang it Yang, you can make a better pun then this. Your really making a foot of yourself" Yang thought. However, the sock suddenly seemed to hold this time round as she pulled it up. "Hu- alright then- guess it won't go in the bin yet" Yang shrugged, testing the elastic.

Weiss was petrified, her entire body tensed up as she held her place on Yangs foot. She didn't want to get tossed out and thrown under a heap of rubbish, if she turned back under a pile of stuff that could be dangerous. Yang usually left clothes under her bed- if she could just hold on during the gym session she would be in a much better place later.
14321.title: Weiss's gym hell with Yang

145.content: Alright then would one of these characters suffice
145.title: Another character to transform

1453.content: How about one of the two from the flower power duo?
1453.title: Flower Power tf

14532.content:
It was late at night an Ren was taking a walk through the streets, tomorrow was Nora's birthday and he had no idea what to get her,being his closes friend that he had known since childhood, Ren wanted to get her something extra special but he was having a hard time thinking of something that would really stand out.

As he walked a voice came from a small tent just across the street from Ren,"Hey young man, come over here"said the voice from the tent as Ren listened, walking into the tent as he saw a gypsy woman.

"I noticed you walking across the street and I felt that something ails you, what does that happen to be?" the lady asked, "Well... Tomorrow is my best friends birthday and I have no idea what to get her" Ren replied

"Well then I just the thing for you" said the woman pulling out a vial,"Drink this potion made from various types of dust and by tomorrow morning you'll have exactly what your friend wants" The gypsy said giving Ren the vial as she let him out.

While walking back to his dorm Ren looked at the vial, "How is drinking this supposed to give me what Nora wants, I was going to ask but she pushed me out before I could ask" Ren thought,"Then again it is rather late so I guess it wouldn't hurt to see how" Ren said as he walked, once in his dorm he drank the potion and fell asleep hoping that the potion would work.

When Ren wakes up what has the potion turned him into...
14532.title: Ren

choices: Ren manages to contact Nora through his Aura
Nora breaks her socks in for a few days...
145323.content:
Ren awoke to the sound of Nora calling his name "REEEENNN!" he tired to call out to tell her to stop yelling but found that he couldn't talk for some reason. "You could at least have made pancakes on my birthday Ren!" She tossed up his sheets and where she expected to find him there was only one thing, a lone sock with a tiny thunderbolt on the lip of it gray in color and just as fuzzy as she remembered it. "OH MY GOSH! Ren found my lucky sock! The pair is together again!"

Ren shuddered hearing those words, as he realized that was the reason he was unable to talk or move, he had turned into one of Nora's socks. He remembered when it had first gone missing, one day when he had been doing laundry he had taken the over worn pair to wash, when one of them didn't come back with him Nora was mad for both the wash and loosing the other sock, he had always tried to keep her wearing clean ones but she had mostly refused washing those spasific ones. As she pulled the other one from it's hiding place within her underwear drawer she smiled with joy, something Ren had been trying to get her to do for her birthday but not like this!

"You ready to get back into action boys! I know you've been missing my feet like I've been missing you." She wiggled her toes in anticipation and as the foot of the red head pushed into him he found where all of his senses really were. First the inside of the sock was full of taste buds, even the light sweat that Nora had gotten in the night was a torrent of salt, the faint funky smell wafted from it. His eyes were mercifully at the very edge of the sock, meaning they would rest outside her boots. The final part was when her foot and leg fully rested within him and her toes wiggled a jolt of pain and extacy ran through him. With Ren and his twin in place Nora pulled up her boots, the smell inside was the stuff of nightmares and Ren balked at it just hanging over them. Nora wasn't about to go slow though and roughly shoved her foot into the boot, happily pressing the poor sock into it's rightful place. Ren tried to scream as the pressure her boot put on him and the horrid smell combined made his whole Aura cry out, although nothing could be felt by the oblivious girl who had only just gotten her favorite socks back. Just a few quick stomps full of pain and pleasure both and she was ready to face the day, wondering what other surprises Ren might have for her.
145323.title: Nora's missing sock

choices: Everybody is shrunk and team RWBY are unaware
15.content:
*Editors edit*
I've added in two additional choices to separate shrink chapters and TF chapters a bit.
15.title: Other

151.content:
Weiss sat back- her present was almost done. After giving Blake the dust upgrade Ruby had been getting hyped up more then usual about weapons, since it was her birthday coming up Weiss thought it would be a good idea to give Ruby the same treatment.

After multiple talks to people within her families company she finally managed to gather some expensive dust prototype. It had been deemed safe for use, it only had a few more tests to pass for it to go on the shelves.

"I'll have to ask Ruby to review the product at some point." Weiss spoke calmly as she hid the vile away, remembering the dust reacted badly with the dust in her sword, she carefully separated the samples. It wasn't fully tested, but mixing those two dust samples could disintegrate the prototype. Weiss sighed as she started to put all the dust back in her suitcase, being careful not to mix the prototype with the other dust in her possession before she tensed up to a door slam.

"Heeey~ Weiss! What are you doing?" Ruby called out from behind Weiss, stomping her feet dry on the welcome mat they bought last Christmas. Ruby heard a smash that drew her attention upwards. "W-what the? I thought Weiss was here?"

Unaware to the leader of Ruby, Weiss had done what she set out to avoid. Trying to hid Rubies present, she dropped the prototype and another dust vial, smashing them both and mixing them into a pile of goo. Without thinking, she brought her hand down on the goo "Ruby's going to be so disappointed..." She started to mutter, turning around to her friend before she blacked out.

Ruby slipped off her boots and wandered to where she thought Weiss was.
"That's weird... Weiss left her suit case open." With a slightly worried frown, she noticed the broken viles, picking them up and tossing them into the bin, she returned to put away Weiss's stuff. "Hey Weiss! I'm putting away your stuff! It's all over the floor and I think we're having guests around later!" Ruby yelled to the closed door of the bathroom.
After slipping the suitcase back, she sat down on a chair, glad to take the weight off her feet. Out of the corner of her eye she noticed a strange bubbling droplet. "What is that...?" Ruby pouted, rolling from her chair to get a better look. It looked like some kind of liquid that was melting away. "Ah-? It's dissolving? Uh- Weiss? What is this?" a little nervous, she extended a finger to poke the strange object. As she made contact, she too blacked out.

Weiss lay on the floor, having narrowly avoided Rubies nylon boot feet stomping around the room she had finally found a reletivly safe haven under a chair. While the smell of her 'glorious leaders' feet was still pungent in the air, she still felt relativly safe here. Somehow the prototype had managed to shrink her on skin contact.
"How did that skip testing? I thought it was essentially safe, they just had a few tests to pass the governments strict laws on dust use...!" Weiss panted, feeling oddly out of breath. She was sure she had been stepped on at some point, it felt as though her body had gone briefly two dimensional... but is that even possible? While Weiss pondered this news as well as how to get Ruby's attention she noticed the giant clutz flop out of her chair. "Never mind how do I get her attention, how do I avoid getting flattened by her....!?" Weiss spoke jokingly, yet her face paled as she watched her friend crawl across the floor like a lost puppy.
"-What is this?" Ruby boomed out, before her body suddenly vanished before Weiss.
"R-Ruby?" Weiss yelled, noticing what was left of the mixture bubble out of existence as she rushed out towards where her friend had been.

"A-ah-?" Ruby gasped, her landing had been soft, landing on the ever expanding bed of someone from her team. "What happened?"
151.title: Ruby and Weiss shrink

choices: Yang realizes she's alone and has some 'fun'
1511.content:
As Weiss scanned the floor, Ruby slowly gathered where she was from the bed.
"Whose bed is this? Why is everything so big?" Ruby yelled, before noticing her own fortified bed, "N-no way! This is my room? Ah- everyone was just behind me, surely they'll know what to do!" Not grasping the concept of being crushed by mistake, the tiny Ruby cheered for joy as she heard the front door open as if on cue.

Down below, Weiss gave up on her search for Ruby as she heard the door open. Having experienced Ruby's stomping feet earlier, she decided against standing in the middle of the room.
"I hope your safe...!" She muttered, taking shelter with the junk hidden under Yangs bed.

"Yo- I'm back. Blake said she had something to do so she split. Is Weiss here?" the blonde powerhouse called out, slipping her shoes off and hanging up her coat. Without waiting to long for a response, she thundered lazily into the room, suddenly realizing she was talking to herself. Shrugging it off she wandered into the bathroom with a yawn, kicking close the door with a socked foot before brushing her teeth ready for bed.

"Yang!" Ruby yelled once more, her voice cracking from yelling so hard. Realizing it's no use now that her sister was in the bathroom, the young leader collapsed. "Gyah! This is already exhausting... I wonder what that liquid thing was" Her eyes glazed out as she tried to put her brain to use, her hands rubbing furiously at her hair, "Weiss's case was open- was Weiss shrunk too? Did I step on her!? Ah- I never thought of that!" As questions collided with questions, the scythe wielder failed to notice Yang grabbing her sleeping shorts and top from under the bed. Thankfully the used clothes were far away from Weiss's position. "A-ah! YANG!" Ruby cried out once more, before watching Yang yank down her shorts and panties right in front of her, "W-wah! Yang, change in the bathroom! Wait- what are you doing?" Without her scythe to grant her a speed boost, Ruby couldn't hope to dodge Yangs bare rear crashing into her.

Yang kicked off her used shorts as she sat on the bed, unaware of her audience or her flattening sister as she started to kick the used clothes under the over filling underside of the bed, narrowly missing a yelling Weiss. After changing top and peeling off her socks, she finally started to slip on her tight shorts she uses for sleeping. Tugging them up her sweaty thigh, she briefly hopped up, trapping a screaming Ruby between her cheeks as she sealed off the exit with her tight sleep wear.
"I didn't get to tell Ruby that everyone canceled on us" Yang yawned, standing up to stretch. Her cheeks subconsciously tensed briefly mid-stretch before she relaxed out of it- stifling another yawn as she crawled under the covers. "Good for me- I really need an early one- shower can wait for the mornin'~"

Weiss was having her worst day yet, surrounded by Yangs discarded used clothes, trapped under her bed after being trampled by Ruby- she swore she was the most unlucky person in the world, not yet knowing about Ruby's situation. She waited for the creak of the bedsprings above her to settle before making her move through the maze of clothes. As the room grew darker, the bed springs started to creak less and less and the labyrinth became increasingly harder to navigate. Weiss swore under her breath as she realized she had almost stumbled down the still warm orange sock of the buxom tank of the party. "I hope your having more luck then me..."
1511.title: Yang enters

choices: Weiss becomes trapped in Blakes cleavage
15112.content:
As soon as Weiss stumbled out from Yangs used shorts, the door slammed once again.
"Oh great...!" Weiss whined, listening to the bangs of shoes coming off in the distance. Quick on her feet, Weiss quickly made her way over to the chair in the room, deciding to climb up higher to try and get the newcomers attention.

"Hey Blake!" Yang yelled from bed, wiggling to get rid of what she assumed was a piece of fluff from her old sleepwear, never would she of guessed that it would be her sister trying to get her attention. The bed headed blond gave her best smile as the fauna wandered into the room.
Blake raised an eyebrow as she saw Yang already in bed,
"I thought you were going to the gym with Ruby later?" She asked, wandering over towards the bathroom door,
"We finished up early- it's been a looooong day" Yang yawned back, tucking herself under her warm blankets.

The sound of a tap soon filled everyone's ears as Blake wandered into the bathroom to freshen up, the door soon swung shut as a clang from the toilet seat suddenly erupted. While Yang's rear lazily chewed on Ruby's struggling form, Weiss was on her way to finishing her plan for attention. Having made it almost to the chairs seated section, she was already beginning to congratulate herself for her plan. Reaching the first way-point, she was instantly discouraged to find the backing of the chair on the other side.
"Ruby you clutz! You turned the chair round to sit down!" Weiss cried out, "Why didn't I consider it... now I need to traverse a part I'm not entirely sure is safe..." Glancing at the lazing Yang and the bathroom door, she quickly made her mad dash for the other side of the chair.

About halfway across the chair, the black cat of the party sauntered out of the bathroom, her stocking wrapped feet thudding gently on the floor. Continuing her conversation with Yang she wandered over towards the chair, casting a shadow over Weiss before spinning the chair to face the desk.
"No- no no! This isn't happening!" Weiss yelled, picking up her speed as the titanic ass hovered over her minuscule body. Thankfully, Blake decided to open her book and find her page before sitting down, the force of her sitting almost blasting poor Weiss off the edge.

Unbeknownst to everyone- within Yangs sweaty ass, little Ruby was struggling to escape. Almost every bit of progress she made though, caused the titan holding her to jam her deeper into the horrid dungeon.
"I-if this keeps up I'll-" Ruby gasped, not wanting to continue her thought process. The cheeks were tightly smooshed together by Yangs weight, making progress slow and disgusting for the little leader. After one final spert, her hopes of escaping were dashed by Yang finally fixing her itch with a finger. Poor Ruby felt her body flatten to the plump rear repeatedly as Yang subtly scratched at her under the covers.

Weiss was having a much luckyer break with her climb, the chair thankfully had many resting spots and Blake's movements were relatively slow and predictable for Weiss's quick brain. Climbing was hardly a challenge from all her training and dedication, every move she made was calculated and pulled off perfectly. While she was focused with climbing, the conversation above did grab her attention.
"Weren't you returning with Ruby?" Blake boomed overhead, slipping a bookmark into her book,
"Yeah- I kinda split away from her though- I had to pick up her present. She might be sleeping round someones house or something- she's making a ton of friends recently" Yang yawned back, her hands returned to the back of her head as she gazed up at the bed above her. "Weiss is also missing, they might be doing something together".

Having reached the top, Weiss set out to yell a retort. She knew she was too small to be heard by the titanic giantess that surrounded her but it was something that she was finding increasingly relaxing. Before she could whip one out though, she noticed Blakes arm pit come increasingly close, exposing a way into her clothes. Gazing up towards her scarf she the sudden scary idea of climbing Blake to get to her ear.
"Blake!" She called out without response, her feet stomped in frustration as she realized the ear wasn't only her best bet, but possibly her only chance. Clambering to her feet, she ran towards her friend's underarm with new found determination. Quickly jumping out and grabbing the material she realised her bad timing as Blake began to move. "Wait! Bl-Blake! Stay still!" She yelled, realizing she didn't want to be thrown off or flattened to her teammates armpit she hurredly slipped into the clothes, narrowly avoiding the colliding skin. Pinned between Blakes skin and clothes, she watched with horror as she watched the arm swing in time with Blakes walk. Getting pulverized under there would be a form of torture Weiss was determined to avoid.

As Blake filled her cup full of water, she failed to feel once of her friends begin to climb up the side of her boob. Trying not to yawn, she took a brief sip before wandering back. She rubbed her temples as she wandered back towards her book, glancing over at the snoring Yang who had kicked the covers from her while spreading out.
"Honestly..." Blake smiled, setting down her water as she wandered over to Yangs bed. Unaware of bouncing boobs controlling Weiss's fate, she bent over drag the covers back over Yang. Her bra strained against the sudden weight as Weiss was tossed to the side. Unable to detect any distress however, Blake simply stood back up to return to her book. The sun had fully set a while back, and her torch was running low on wax. With a sigh, Blakes final action of sitting down bounced the unready Weiss about once more.

While Ruby was trapped for the night, what would become of Weiss?
15112.title: Blake returns

choices: They shrink infront of Weiss and Ruby on the trip back.
152.content:
"Mission completed!" Yang yelled, stomping down the final creature of grimm, "In record time I might add!" Her smirk echoed through the team as they all fell exausted onto the rocks surrounding them.
"Why were the creatures of grimm even out here?" Ruby spoke out, looking around the vast meadows. Weiss, feeling the need to educate her younger classmate, stepped forward,
"They occasionally let the smaller, weaker Grimm to slip through to this point to focus on some of the bigger opposing forces" Weiss smiled, tipping her nose up confidently as she scanned the trees "it makes a rather interesting training situation for students that are just learning the ropes. I have to admit though, there were some grimm that haven't been recorded before" As Weiss spoke, their pickup arrived, Weiss and Ruby jumped into the machine while Blake scanned the area.
"What's wrong?" Yang questioned, before she could say anything else she noticed Blake swat her neck.
"Nothing, just- mosquitoes..." Blake frowned, she thought she saw something weird from that mosquito but decided to ignore it.
"Ouch- hey!" Yang also swatted her neck, quickly checking her hand to find the crushed form of a mosquito, "Dang it, I react badly to these things... lets get back to the dorm before more show up.

Little did everyone know, that tiny mosquito was an abnormality of nature. A creature of grim granted with a special ability to shrink it's user. Sitting back down in the helicopter, Yang and Blake did not realize what was coursing through their veins.
152.title: Blake and Yang shrink

choices: Let's find someone to talk to
It might wear off- keep us hidden for now
1521.content:
While the conversation was in full swing on the trip back, a sudden pain twinged in Blake and Yang. It wasn't a huge amount of pain, but it was noticable on their faces,
"Hey- are you two ok?" Ruby wandered over towards her sister as the helicopter landed at the acadamy.
"I'm fine- m-must of been something I ate!" Yang joked, exchanging a worried glance from Blake as they both thought back to the mosquito bite. Weiss wandered over to help Blake up, but as she reached her she suddenly vanished.

Gazing down on the floor, Weiss saw what appeared to be a very confused and bewildered little Blake toy wandering around. Her mind worked hard to process this new information as Ruby stumbled backwards,
"Y-yang?!" Ruby yelled, having leaned over to support her sisters weight, the last thing she expected was for the weight and her sister to vanish. Her foot slammed down upon the tiny Blake, flattening the tiny girl to the bigger girls tred as she fell.
"Ruby!" Weiss yelled, grasping the situation. She quickly snatched up a confused Yang from the floor before jumping down.
"I'm alright Weiss!" Ruby laughed it off, starting to stand up. Weiss looked deathly pale, looking down at the ground. Ruby traced her line of sight to a tiny crumpled Blake sticker on the ground. "Cute!" Ruby started, before remembering her disappearing sister, "Wait- Yang vanished! Also, where's-" Ruby was cut off by Weiss's scared stare. In her closed fist lay a struggling Yang.

After a few minutes, Blake managed to reform. Everyone slowly calmed down as they grouped together to discuss the situation. Blake and Yang told the two other team members about the mosquito bite, it was the only thing they actually shared.
"I've never heard of an event like this happening before..." Weiss murmured, comparing Blakes height to Yangs. Oddly, Yang was far bigger then Blake, while Yang was the size of a small doll, Blake had become the size of a bug. Is was quite worrying to see Blake so tiny,
"Perhaps I'm smaller because I was injected first" Yelled Blake, "it might of used more on me as it's first target!" Blake rubbed her throat as she sat on Yangs shoulder. Measuring up, sitting down she was the size of the powerhouses ear.
"No offense, but I hope so- I reaaaally don't want to be that small!" Yang bluntly put it, giving an apologetic glance as Ruby panicked in the background.
"We need to inform someone..!" Ruby eventually decided, almost crushing the two tiny figures as she rushed back in. Thankfully Weiss moved them both out of the way from the hyperactive girl.
"No- they could be experimented on. I know a few people that could potentially look into a cure for this discreetly" Weiss spoke with confidence, "It should be your choice though-"

Yang gave a silent gulp as she began to talk it over with Blake... they eventually decided to-
1521.title: Instantly found

choices: We can get Blake up to Yangs height
Return to normal- there will be a few changes to cope.
15211.content:
Yang shook her head,
"I'd rather avoid the lab rat approach- it might be better to get a teacher" She glanced at her shoulder, getting a confirmation from Blake.
"Understandable- lets go get a teacher" Weiss spoke clearly, getting up to leave. Yang waved her down again,
"Hey! You have to carry us! I trust my sister with my life but-" Yang glanced over at Ruby who tried to hold her hand still. It shook viciously with adrenaline while she gave a nervous smile to Weiss.

"O-of course! I can handle that-!" Weiss shook, blushing heavily as she reached down to pick Yang and Blake up, Yang started to regret her decision as the, now nervous, Weiss picked her and Blake up.
"I hope there's a way to turn back-" Blake mumbled, clutching onto Yang's clothes for dear life.
"Sure there is! Here-" Yang cheered, sitting cross legged in Weiss's clammy palm. She carefully plucked the tiny Blake from her shoulder, examining the black haired doll briefly before wedging the smaller girl between her breasts. "That should stop you falling out!" Yang winked to a slightly embarrassed Blake, "Aw- so cute!" She cooed, Blake murmered something as she blushed harder, "I really hope this is temporary-"

It wasn't long before the team bumped into Glynda,
"Glynda! Help, help, help, help!" Ruby burst out, annoying Weiss instantly. "Blake and Yang have shrunk! Some kinda grimm got them!" Ruby spluttered, alerting a few students around. Pyhraa and Nora, standing at their locker, spun around at the news.
"Ruby, I wanted to let her know in PRIVATE- jeez now the whole schools going to find out" Weiss stormed forward, jabbing Ruby in the arm, "Think first-" Weiss gave a final sigh, suddenly remembering what she was carrying. Glancing down at a shaken up Yang she became appologetic as Ruby retorted in a sing song voice,
"Think first!" Ruby laughed slightly- finally over her nerves as a concerned Glynda demanded an explanation-

____________________________________________________________________________ ________________________________

"So- yeah! That's what happened!" Ruby blurted, "They're also super stretchy and flatten out like a sticker when stepped on!" She smiled, happy with her explanation. Both Yang and Blake winced slightly at the last part before looking up to the giant teacher.

They had all moved into Glynda's office to avoid the gathering croud. Yang and Blake were happly on the more solid ground of Glynda's desk as she listened to the story. Blake was happily sitting by Yangs feet this time.

"They can be flattened? How did you find this out- it seems impossible." Glynda asked, glancing down at the two shrinkee's. Her eyes didn't even hint at surprise as she wrote something down in a document,
"Ruby stepped on Blake" Weiss sighed, Ruby started to stutter once more-
"On accident! Besides- she wasn't hurt at all! Look-" Ruby stuck her thumb out, aiming for the stunned Blake-
"Hold on a second!" Blake yelled- unheard by her -act first, think later- leader, the thumb completely flattened her to the desk, grinding her down before releasing.
"See!" Ruby spoke triumphantly as Glynda examined the flat Blake.
"Interesting- Yang is the same?" Glynda asked, picking up a startled Yang, her strong fingers stretching out her shocked face with curiousity. She ajusted her glasses slightly before continuing to play- ignoring the groans that came from the putty in her hands.
"We haven't tested it on Yang-" Weiss bit her bottom lip, "I think it's actually quite uncomfortable for them" Weiss looked over to a, now guilty Ruby.

Yang was put down on the desk as Glynda decided to speak.
"Rumors travel fast at the acadamy- I'm guessing there are students who were listening at the door too. With Ruby's loud voice, it's without a doubt that everyone will know about your situation by the end of the day." She sighed- "I'm not sure if this will be temporary or permanent- this has happened on rare occasions. It can last years or even days- for now..."
15211.title: Teacher, teacher

choices: Skip ahead- everyone's used to the situation
Everyone's getting used to the situation
152112.content:
Yang and Blake sat back on the table, watching people walk in and out of their room. Yang admired the amount of detail going into the house while Blake worried about the lack of detail on her size.
"Nah- it'll be fine! I'll just carry you around everywhere!" Yang laughed, nudging Blake over with a finger, much to Blakes distaste.
"I can't always rely on you though, what if I need to go to the bathroom at night? Or get a snack from the fridge?" Blake pouted slightly, Yang simply smiled, picking the tiny Blake up and setting her in her lap,
"Relax! Check it out- they're setting up steps to places in your size! Oh- they're modifying my personal frid- I mean- OUR personal fridge to let you open it by button press!" Yang smirked, rubbing the black cat behind the ears as she spoke. "Plus- we're like- invincible right now!" Her grin grew as she stretched out the startled cat girl, letting her reform before apologizing.
"Please don't use me as your personal stress toy!" Blake joked, slightly worried that Yang was getting too used to the situation too quickly. She gazed up at the golden goddess with a wince, she was only as big as Yangs foot.
"Ah- but we're invincible! Wouldn't matter anyway!" Yang laughed, "Although being stretched out earlier did suck- well-" Yang looked conflicted for a second before realizing she was scaring her friend. Her gloved hand rubbed Blakes head roughly as she reminded herself that Blake was not a toy, she was a friend.

The passing thoughts that popped up made Yang slightly nervous, what would the future hold?
152112.title: Normality-

1521121.content:
A couple months later both Blake and Yang could be found sitting on the bottom bunk of their bunk beds. With Blake in her lap they leaned back against the pillow as they watched a movie on Yangs scroll.

Usually Weiss or Ruby would be watching over them but today was combat class and it would not be safe for them to participate with their size.

Suddenly they looked up as the sound of the door being unlocked could be heard as it began to open.


Who is it?
1521121.title: Skip ahead- everyone's used to the situation

15211212.content:
Yang slowly got up, grabbing a disgruntled Blake by habit as Weiss made an ungraceful entrance.
"Hey Weiss!" Yang called, feeling Blake tense up. Weiss seemingly ignored her as she dragged her feet into the bathroom, "Looks like it was a long day, wonder if I can do anything to cheer her up-" Yang pondered, her hands automatically stretching Blake about, a bad habit she had picked up at somepoint. A toilet soon flushed followed by the sink turning on, snapping Yang back to reality "Oh- sounds like she's done- why are you so flat? Did you want me to use you as Weiss's toe rag again? I thought you didn't like that?" Yang mewed, dropping the crushed toy between her breasts, "I'm joking, I'm joking! Sorry, my bad habits come back to haunt me! Hehe-" a blush spread across her face as she looked away from the annoyed sticker smooshed between her boobs.

Weiss wandered in from the bathroom, her body tired from the long day of work. Her eyes drifted towards her bed which had a lone Yang standing in the middle.
"What are you doing on my bed...?" Weiss frowned, sitting down next to Yang to remove her shoes.
"Watching a film with Blake, it's rather good!" Yang smiled up nervously, Weiss sighed back. Her hand grabbing and dumping Yang to the stool close to the bed before wandering off to get changed.
"You two are lucky you didn't need to do combat today-" Weiss glanced at Yang, stuggling to see any sign of Blake before giving up and grabbing her sleepwear, "Ruby seemed super excited to come back, quick warning, she might have another 'prank' up her sleeve-".
"Not the best place to put me...- us -..." Yang muttered, half paying attention to what Weiss was saying. While Weiss had initially taken up a motherly role over the shrinkees, Yang's carefree attitude towards accidents and Ruby's odd pranks had made her a bit to relaxed, she had even started to laugh at some of Ruby's 'pranks'.

"Yang, what if Ruby comes back and doesn't notice us?" Blake called up, making the giant blonde jump slightly,
"Quit worrying will you, I'll just dive off- we are invincible" Yang smiled down, picking her up and putting her down next to her. "Just sit back and relax!" the blond power house of the group sat next to her, kicking her bare feet over the edge with ease as she listened to Weiss complain about her day.
"I really want to get down now though..." Blake stumbled over her words, "If you get crushed they usually find you quite easily, while when I get crushed- well-" coughing slightly as she noticed the dark twinkle in Yangs eye.
"Oh? I can help you out, Ruby discovered something super weird about our bodies the other day! Check it out!" Yang chuckled, grabbing the nervous Blake by the head. Not hearing the complaints, Yang stretched the little Blake toy as far as she could, aiming for the top of the chest of draws they were sleeping on. "Like a rubber band! Neat, isn't it?" Yang laughed again, her fingers slipped mid laugh, launching Blake over the edge of the stool. "Oh dang- that's not good..." Yang sighed, knowing she had abused her friend once more. Before she could jump down she didn't notice a shadow get cast over her.

Ruby yawned, her body feeling battered from the long combat class. She rested her back pack on the stool as she unpacked some of her books, carefully putting them down on her bedside table.
"I've got an awesome new prank to show you two-" Ruby spoke happily, a yawn escaping her lips, "You've also got a task Blake! Tomorrow- sleep~ leader~ need-" Her face turned into one of bliss as she stripped off into her bed, not noticing a surprised Yang stuck to the bottom of her backpack as she slid it under her bed. "Night you two-" Ruby spoke softly, "Night Weeeeiss" She called out, hearing the muffled sound of Weiss yelling goodnight with a toothbrush in her mouth.

'Where did Blake land?'
15211212.title: A tired and aggravated Weiss

choices: "You really should learn to respect others stuff-" (Punishment)
152112122.content:
Weiss yawned as she exited the bathroom, her feet shuffling slowly towards her bed. She glanced from Yangs bed to the chair, noticing she wasn't there.
"Great-" Weiss sighed, checking her feet and her bed before she suddenly felt something bounce of her chest. The dust users tired eyes glanced towards Ruby's bed, noticing a panting Yang next to a broken up pencil she was using for ammo to get her attention. Her pencil.

Yang's happy go lucky smile twitched as she was yanked up from the ground by the annoyed Weiss. Her body squishing slightly from the pressure,
"Y-yo!" Yang spoke jokingly, giving a weak wave. The ice cold look gave her shivers, "So- uh- long day?" She smiled, breaking Weiss's cold exterior a bit, "Hey, at least you don't have to carry these babies around everywhere, major back problems!" Yang laughed, pointing to her boobs. Weiss smiled wearily,
"I think mine are actually bigger" Without warning, she pushed Yang into her chest, giving a small smile as she compared sizes with the nervous Yang, "Fairly sure just one of them is bigger then your entire body"

Weiss eventually let Yang go, returning to her bed. She gave her aching feet a small rub, she slowly thought about making the tiny Yang give her a foot massage to compensate her lost pencil, there definitely needed to be some form of punishment.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Blake landed with a thud infront of the bathroom door, her body battered from Yangs careless playing. She slowly rose to her feet, noticing her dangerous position outside of the door. After only a few steps, the sound of running water vanished to be replaced by the noise of a turning handle.
Blake gritted her teeth, running as fast as she could as she heard the sound of footsteps sticking to the wooden floors, shuffling slowly towards her. A moments darkness was all it took before Blake felt an enormous amount of pressure.

The cat girl gave a small whimper as she lifted up with Weiss's damp foot, her sticker like form mixing perfectly with the dust and debris that had already started to cling to the dust wielders foot as she wandered around obliviously. Her foot THUDDED constantly on the ground, grinding the little cat girl further into the tired foot. The creaking floorboards groaned as the giant girl stopped, her feet slowly rocked to keep balance while she stood still on the tiny cat girl.

After an uncomfortable amount of time spent ground into the dusty floor the foot thankfully lifted. Blake tried to move as Weiss's tired eyes checked over her, unable to pick out the tiny form from the small amount of dust and dirt picked up from the short walk around the room.
"W-Weiss- w-wait" Blake tried to talk, her voice too weak to be heard even from Yangs height. She whimpered as Weiss let go of the foot, pressing down with her entire body weight as she checked her other foot.

It wasn't long before the giant foot above stomped off to bed, Weiss's icy cold fingers did little to make the tiny Blake feel better about the situation as they gently massaged her in.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Weiss happily mewed as she felt her toes click, she tilted her head towards Yang, biting her lip awkwardly, thinking about the nerve the tiny had for breaking her stuff as she said-
152112122.title: Tired Weiss

choices: Saw the flattened form of her partner adhered to Weiss’s sole
Saw nothing but dirt, and continued to massage both feet
1521121221.content:
Weiss’s tired eyes glared at Yang as she thought back to the all the trouble the tiny girl had caused her over the last two months. It would have been hard enough to look after a placid, well-behaved person at Yang’s size, let alone Blake’s, and Yang was anything but well-behaved. She’d wander off whenever Weiss wasn’t looking and found her way into every nook and cranny, including some that Weiss would very much like to keep to herself, thank you very much. Half the time she’d take Blake with her as well, willingly or otherwise Weiss couldn’t tell, which would make things even harder to deal with. She’d even gone and lost Blake out the window once, necessitating hours of what was supposed to be study time spent carefully scouring the court yard until Weiss had finally found the little Faunus flattened in the grass, having been trampled by some nearby students.

At first Yang’s little escapades had evoked concern in Weiss, genuine fear for the safety of her friend and a maternal instinct she hadn’t even known she possessed. Over time, however, concern had turned to exasperation, and exasperation had turned to annoyance. Because really, why was it her responsibility to look after someone as irresponsible as Yang? Sure, there was no way she could trust Ruby with such a responsibility, not by herself, but that didn’t make it okay for Yang to make things so much more difficult than they needed to be. And now the oaf had gone and broken one of her favourite pencils for no apparent reason other than getting her attention. The nerve of her!

With a quiet little huff, the heiress decided enough was enough and reached out to snatch Yang off the bookcase faster than the girl could react, roughly squeezing as she brought her hand back to her bed. “You really should learn to respect other’s stuff… and you can start by making it up to me for the pen.”

Caught off guard by Weiss’s sudden aggression, Yang didn’t even have a chance to respond before she was dumped onto the heiress’s bed just short of her right foot. The force at which she impacted the bed winded her slightly but it didn’t take long for the blonde to climb back to her feet and send a glare of her own towards her giant teammate. “What the hell Weiss! I was jus…”

“Save it!” Weiss’s booming voice cut off the shrunken girl’s protests, as she shifted her right sole directly in front of the girl, her left moving to lay flat on the bed, unknowingly burying Blake beneath her foot once more. “I’ve had a long day, and you’ve just been lying around watching movies. Now it’s your turn to earn your keep.” Wriggling her toes, she shot a pointed look at Yang. “My feet are sore, do me a favour and give them a massage.”

With the heiress’s foot right in front of her, Yang was taken back by more than the other girl’s words. Even though Weiss had only just had a shower, the blonde could still smell the sweat on her sole and the distinct scent of the grime between her toes and in the folds of her feet. It was somewhat of a revelation that even a girl as obsessively clean as Weiss could have feet like this, the heady bouquet of scents making Yang dizzy. It wasn’t terrible, not at this range, and Yang was used to the smell of sweaty bodies by now, but it certainly wasn’t pleasant either.

Seeing the hesitation on Yang’s face, Weiss decided to take matters into her own hands, forcing her foot forward until it bumped into the tiny girl, temporarily forcing the brawler’s face and upper body into the sole and almost knocking her over completely. “I’m waiting Yang. And just so you know, if you don’t get at it, I’m just going to step on you and do it myself.” She probably wouldn’t actually do that, she wasn’t quite there yet, but she was getting tired of the blonde’s hesitation.

For Yang it was like being punched in the face by a moist mattress, the smell hitting her almost as hard as the foot itself before she stumbled back and away from the offending appendage. Even from such brief contact she could already feel a thin layer of the heiress’s sweat coating her face and soaking into her top. Her immediate instinct was to wipe the sweat from the face, but under the weight of Weiss’s glare and the looming threat of her foot she instead took a careful step forward and slowly, hesitantly, brought her hands to the other girl’s sole.

The shrunken girl’s palms sank into the larger girl’s flesh, barely noticeable to Weiss but a good couple of inches from Yang’s perspective. Repressing the urge to move back in revulsion, while still trying to keep the rest of her body as far away as possible, Yang starting moving her hands back and forth along the ball of Weiss’s foot, shuddering slightly as her fingers slid across the slick flesh. The smell was stronger at this range, but manageable, though that did little to take her mind off the feeling of the sweat now pooling between her fingers. It was almost like she was kneading the sweat out of the heiress’s soles, slowly coating her hands with the viscous fluid.

Honestly Weiss hadn’t really expected to feel much from her friend’s attentions. Maybe a slight tickling or scratching sensation, but no real form of relief. She was more than a little surprised then to feel a small tremor go down her spine at the feeling of the brawler’s strong hands running across her sole. Suppressing a gasp, she resisted the urge to make good on her previous threat and just smash Yang between her feet and use her as her personal foot toy.

Finally lifting her left foot from the bed, and giving Blake some much needed air, the heiress moved in closer to the brawler, wriggling both sets of toes at her newfound servant. “Good girl, but I wouldn’t want my left foot to get lonely.”

Being face down on the bed had warmed Weiss’s left sole more than the left, and Yang could smell the difference as it closed in, more than doubling the intense aroma that now enveloped her and resulting in a notable rise in the local temperature. Her hands had already been coated in the sickly gunk from Weiss’s right sole to such an extent they were almost black and it only took at glance at the new arrival to tell that it was even dirtier than the first.

Looking closer, the shrunken blonde…
1521121221.title: Put to Work

choices: Flicking Blake towards Yang (“Here, I think you both owe me.”)
Flicking Blake away from the bed (“You need to learn to save yourself.”)
15211212211.content:
“Oh geez.” Looking closer at Weiss’s left sole, Yang sighed heavily as she spotted the flattened and mangled form of her partner, blending in almost perfectly with the rest of the detritus picked up in the short trip from the bathroom to the bed. The Faunus was dripping in the sweat of the heiress’s sole and from what Yang could make out her expression was twisted in a pained grimace.

Above, Weiss took note of the blonde’s sudden lack of action, swinging down the big toe of her right foot to not so gently nudge her head. “I didn’t ask you to stop did I?”

Raising her voice for the first time since her original attempt to reason with the aggravated giant, Yang pointed one sweaty palm at the stricken girl. “It’s Blake, she’s stuck to your sole Weiss!”

“What?” Raising her foot away from Yang and lifting it to her face, Weiss took a brief sniff before turning her head away, unaware of how sweaty the foot had gotten from its brief time being pressed into the sheets. Forcing her eyes back to the sole, she carefully examined the myriad specks of dirt, more carefully then she had before, and finally set eyes on her smallest teammate.

Groaning loudly, she started to scratch at her sole, trying to get her fingernail under the little Faunus even while her mind turned to darker places. Although she had difficulty making out the miniature girl at the best of times, and wasn’t always able to tell her intentions, Weiss was pretty sure that Blake wasn’t being as deliberately difficult as Yang. But even so, her smaller side had led to her getting in all kinds of trouble, nearly having the heiress pulling her hair out in worry. Even beyond incidents caused by Yang, the Faunus had managed to independently get into trouble a number of times.

When the little girls had been introduced to Team JNPR, Blake had somehow managed to fall into Pyrrha’s cleavage and had been lost in there for hours, carried around by the redhead through a day of classes and training before finally coming loose in the showers. Then, just the other day, she’d walked out into the hallway by herself, or at least that had been the way it seemed to Weiss, and been trampled over by several students before sticking to the treads of Velvet’s shoes. That time it had taken Weiss, with some help from Yang, a whole day to find and free her.

Frankly, it was an endless headache she could do without.

Finally catching the edge of Blake’s flattened body, Weiss’s nails ripped the tiny girl from her sole in one motion, producing a wet slurping sound as the sodden Faunus came free. Frowning in disgust at the sweat-soaked form, Weiss sighed as she balanced Blake on one finger, thinking for a moment before pushing the finger into her own ear, scrapping off its tiny passenger deep within her ear canal. “So talk, how’d you get like that?” Shooting a quick glare down at the still staring Yang, she pointedly wriggled her toes again. “And you, I still didn’t say you could stop.”

While Yang reluctantly resumed her ministrations, Blake struggled to reform, her battered body slowly returning to its ordinary shape as she took in deep breaths of air and wiped the thick layer of sweat from her face. Though it wasn’t the worse experience she’d had since being shrunken, her time under Weiss’s foot had not been pleasant, the smell and heat amplified several times over at her scale as compared to Yang’s. “I…” She knew even here she had to speak loudly if she was to be heard by Weiss, taking a deep breath before continuing. “Yang was messing around again. She stretched me and I snapped back. Went flying across the room and then you… stepped on me.”

Blake could tell that Weiss was not in a good mood, so she was hesitant in her words, though she hoped that the heiress’s discontent would be turned more towards her partner then herself.

Sighing loudly, Weiss quickly dug the tiny Faunus out of her ear, staring down at the little girl as she momentarily distanced herself from the sensation of Yang tending to her soles, before eventually…
15211212211.title: Getting an Earful

choices: Weiss gets more proactive, making good on her earlier threats
Weiss wakes up Ruby or gets one of her other friends to join the fun
152112122111.content:
Because of course it had been Yang’s fault, and of course Blake had neither managed to get out of the way or to get Weiss’s attention when she specifically checked her sole. Really, what the hell was she supposed to do to keep them safe it they wouldn’t put in the effort to stay out of danger themselves? Right then and there Weiss decided that enough was enough. She was going to teach both of them a lesson and make sure they’d never again even think of disobeying her.

It was for their own good. And just slightly for her own. Her feet were still killing her after all.

Focusing her gaze on Blake, Weiss could tell the shrunken student was trying to say something to her, but all she could hear were little squeaks. It didn’t matter anyway, she’d already made her decision. Curling back one finger she casually flicked the tiny Faunus off her fingertip, sending her careening towards Yang with pinpoint accuracy. “Here, I think you both owe me.”

Caught off-guard, Yang only had time to take a single step back from Weiss’s foot before her partner slammed into her, instantly disappearing into her expansive cleavage. With both Blake’s body and Yang’s top covered in the heiress’s foot sweat, there was no resistance to the Faunus’ path, and the blonde was forced to go fishing between her own breasts before finally pulling the now very disgruntled girl free. “Heh, sorry about that partner.”

For her part, Blake just glared half-heartedly at Yang as she focused once again on reforming, distinctly aware that the layer of sweat from Weiss’s foot had now been joined by her larger partner’s boob sweat, leaving her feeling like she’d taken a bath in an ocean of sweat.

The reunion of the tiny girls, such as it was, was interrupted as Weiss extended her feet towards them once more, her cold eyes looking down on them without remorse. “It’s time that you two learned the consequences of your actions. I’m not letting you get any sleep until my feet have been thoroughly tended to.” Predicting their objections before they could even be spoken, she raised one foot menacingly over her teammates. “Or… I could just flatten you both right now.”

Yang knew better than to try and argue with Weiss while she was like this. Better to just let her do her thing and hope she would come to her senses later. Sighing deeply, the blonde went to place Blake on the bed, only to be interrupted by Weiss once again.

“Not there.” The heiress wiggled her toes invitingly, already looking forward to the return of Yang’s hands, plus a new little addition. “Put her up with my toes. She’s so tiny I wouldn’t feel her anywhere else.”

Blake didn’t like the sound of that, but she liked the thought of being stepped on deliberately even less, so she nodded reluctantly at the questioning look from Yang, her viewpoint elevating quickly as her partner stretched up and set her at the base of Weiss’s toes. It was the smell that hit her first, magnified at her smaller scale and so much worse near the toes than it had been under the sole. As the Faunus struggled to keep her balance on the slick skin the toes shifted before her, sliding against one another as the grit between them moved back and forth.

Below, Yang reluctantly returned to her earlier task, finding the sole of Weiss’s foot no less damp and odorous than it had been when she last touched it, the sweat pooling between her palms and bubbling up between her fingers as her hands moved back and forth. To make matters worse, the larger girl kept her other foot menacingly close, occasionally going so far as to bump it against her in a not so subtle encouragement to continue her efforts, each time leaving a giant sweaty footprint all over Yang’s clothes and skin. The sweat and the grime was even starting to get into her luscious hair, something she was going to have a serious word to Weiss about later.

If it was bad for Yang though, it was worse for Blake. The moment the Faunus’s hands made contact with the heiress’s largest toe they nearly slid straight off, her left hand nearly getting caught in the gap between the toes and coming away covered in something she’d prefer not to think about. Unprepared to face the price of failure she pushed on, running her hands along the toes while simultaneously trying to keep the rest of her body away from their looming embrace. She was only marginally successful at best, the massive toes dripping sweat down on her no matter where she tried to stand, and there was only so far back she could go without risking falling off completely.

While her teammates were in hell, Weiss was hovering somewhere closer to heaven. Yang’s strong hands were doing wonders for the sureness in her feet, and in only took a little bit more gentle ‘encouragement’ to convince the brawler to switch her attention between both feet. Meanwhile, Blake’s ministrations, while minor in comparison, produced a pleasant sensation across her toes, akin to the feeling of scratching a deep and persistent itch. The urge to just bring her feet together and rub both of them into oblivion was almost overwhelming, but she held off… for now.

The desire to feel something more, however, would not be denied. If she couldn’t crush them, then she’d have to try something else. It was difficult to see Blake from this range, especially while peering between her own toes, but with a little bit of skill she managed to use one toe to not so gently nudge the tiny brunette face-first into another, while simultaneously pressing the big toe of her other foot against the back of Yang’s head, pushing the brawler’s face against her sweaty sole. “Now, both of you. Lick!”

Suddenly finding herself with a face-full of foot flesh, Yang gulped at the forceful command from above. Some of the heiress’s sweat had already leaked into her mouth, but the thought of deliberately licking the foot was almost enough to make her turn and run. It was clear, however, that Weiss wasn’t giving her an option, so she reluctantly stuck out her tongue and ran it across the sweat-soaked skin. Instantly, Yang’s mouth was filled with the horrid taste of sweat and grime, every instinct in her body telling her to spit it out even as she forced herself to swallow and lick again.

Above, Blake was having similar problems. Knowing it would be pointless to fight she carefully ran her tongue along the inside of Weiss’s toe, shuddering at the combination of sweat, grime and toejam that she picked up in the process. Swallowing with extreme effort, the Faunus could feel the fowl concoction coating her throat and stomach, screaming at her not to re-open her mouth and take another lick. She did it anyway of course, well aware that she was at the mercy of her teammate’s toes. Just a brief moment of hesitation saw her getting nudged again, more violently this time, and she quickly found herself facedown between two of the heiress’s digits, her next mouthful coming with a significantly greater amount of toejam than the last.

Biting her lip, Weiss had to suppress the urge to outright moan as her unfortunate teammates continued to serve her feet. If the feeling of their hands had been close to heavenly, then their tongues had definitely pushed her beyond that. Part of it was the sensation, but mostly it was the knowledge of how much at her mercy the two girls were. Before they’d shrunken they’d both been taller and physically stronger than her, but now they were insignificant bugs before her overwhelming power, unable to resist even her most unreasonable whims.

And even now, she had the ability to make it so much worse for them.
152112122111.title: Two Tiny Helpers

choices: Weiss continues torturing her shrunken teammates
(2 weeks later) Yang and Blake have been fully broken in by Weiss
Weiss decides to introduce Yang and Blake to another part of her body
1521121221111.content:
Unable to resist any longer, Weiss spared a single look at her former friends turned playthings before bringing her feet together in a single unstoppable movement. There was a satisfying lack of resistance as her soles came together and her toes clenched down, Yang reduced to a rag between her feet and Blake little more than a pleasant itch between her toes.

Wanting to enjoy her power to its fullest, the heiress began sliding her feet back and forth against one another, further flattening and stretching Yang’s now thoroughly sweat-soaked body as it was smeared between the shifting soles. Simultaneously her toes began scrunching and un-scrunching around the stricken Faunus, happily moving Blake back and forth between their unforgiving embraces, smearing her deep into the crevices between each toe before passing her to the next.

Just a few short hours ago, Weiss would never have even considered doing something like this. She would have yelled at anyone who even suggested it as a possibility. Now all she could think about is what she’d been missing these last few months. Seriously, if she’d known how good this would feel she would have let Ruby go on thinking that Yang and Blake were just a doll and sticker respectively so that she’d never have to share them with anyone else ever again. As it was, she was going to do her best to keep them with her whenever possible.

Unaware of the heiress’s thoughts, Yang and Blake could do nothing but struggle to maintain their consciousness as their defenceless bodies were battered and squished from every direction. Yang had been reduced to little more than a flat sticker, now stuck almost completely to Weiss’s left sole, face-down, even as the right one continued to run across her, ironing her further and further into the warm flesh. All of her senses had been consumed by the heiress, unable to smell or taste anything other than Weiss’s sole, unable to hear anything but the sound of the blood pumping through the larger girl’s veins, unable to see anything but darkness, and unable to feel anything but the agonising sensation of being slowly turned completely two-dimensional.

Blake meanwhile was being thrown back and forth between her former friends’ toes like a tiny ragdoll, one moment crushed to a disk between the big and second toe of one foot, the next buried deep within the crevice between the third and fourth toe of the other. Occasionally she’d be smeared so thoroughly into one spot that the questing toes would temporarily lose track of her, only to find her once again as a toenail scrapped her away from her latest prison and sent her plunging into another. It had only been a couple of minutes since this torture began, but already Blake had lost all sense of up and down, her senses jumbled all over the place as her body was slowly caked in an ever increasing mass of toejam, so much so that soon Weiss was playing with a ball of toejam composed less of the Faunus than it was the random bits of grime that ended up between her toes.

Neither girl could truly fathom how this was happening. Sure Weiss had been irritated, angry even, but this, this was beyond anything they could have expected. Their teammate was stubborn and competitive, and enjoyed being in control, but for her to completely dominate them like this, to disregard their feelings and treat them as nothing more than playthings was insane. And yet that was the reality they were faced with, endlessly squished by the heiress’s smelly and sweaty feet.
1521121221111.title: Forceful Heiress

choices: Contact some researchers at her family’s company
Get everyone to bed and figure things out in the morning
Call Team JNPR over and explain the situation to them
15212.content:
Yang cupped her hands around Blake so the smaller girl could speak into her ear without being overheard by their teammates.

“I don’t want everyone learning about this. At my size if anyone tries anything then…” the tiny girl shuddered, and Yang could feel the sensation moving through her shoulder, crooking one finger to gently rub her friend’s back. “But I also don’t want to stay like this forever, so maybe Weiss can find some people that can help us… discreetly.”

“Okay.” Yang spoke loud enough for Weiss and Ruby to hear but still trying to keep her voice low enough to avoid hurting Blake. “We’ll trust you on this one Weiss. Just make sure whoever you contact for this isn’t going to treat either of us like lab rats.”

If the way the heiress’ eyes flicked to Blake before nodding was any indication, she knew what Yang was talking about. “Don’t worry. I’ll be careful.” She paused for a moment as her eyes shifted again. “You’re both important to me so… I’ll look after you.”

Yang shot Weiss her usual bright smile and Blake did her best to smile as well despite the situation, even though Weiss couldn’t really make out the Faunus’ face at their new scale difference.

For her part, Ruby could barely contain her squeal of glee as she reached down to grab her shrunken teammates, only to have her hand slapped away by Weiss.

At the hurt look from her team leader, Weiss rolled her eyes, setting her hand down flat in front of Yang and letting the doll-sized girl climb on before curling her fingers around her. “Don’t just grab them you dunce! What would you do if Blake fell off and we lost her? Or do I have to remind you that you’ve already flattened her once?”

In her annoyance Weiss reflexively tightened her grip on Yang, though she loosened it quickly when the blonde gave a low groan, shooting the little brawler an apologetic look.

Not noticing the interaction, Ruby pouted but didn’t argue Weiss’ point, following along as the heiress headed to the dorms with her miniature friends in hand.

Once they made it back to the dorm, Weiss’ first priority was to…
15212.title: Trusting the Heiress

choices: Weiss (they spend the night on Weiss’s bed)
Her own bed (they spend the night on Blake’s bed)
152122.content:
Fortunately the trip to the dorm was uneventful, and Weiss managed to slip inside without anyone noticing or asking about the doll-sized Yang and even smaller Blake.

Once inside Weiss carefully placed Yang on her pillow while taking a seat in the middle of the bed and inviting Ruby to sit beside her, on the opposite side from Yang and Blake. Both shrunken girls looked on in concern as the surface of the bed was depressed under the weight of the larger girls while they themselves made no impact, the difference in mass becoming all the more apparent.

Taking a few deep breaths to collect herself, Weiss allowed a brief glance at Ruby to ensure the younger girl was listening before focusing on her shrunken friends. “Okay, it’s getting late and I think this has been a long day for all of us, so I suggest we get some sleep for now and worry about how we’re going to handle this… situation tomorrow morning.” She paused for a moment as Yang and Blake had a brief discussion and then nodded their approval. “Good, so that just leaves the issue of where you two are going to spend the night. Frankly, I don’t think it’s safe for the two of you to sleep by yourselves, especially Blake, so I would prefer if you slept in my bed. Beside my pillow that is.”

Ruby perked up at the suggestion but was silenced by a quick glare from Weiss. “They are not sleeping in your bed! It’s enough of a death trap for you!”

Looking back to her pillow, Weiss noted the slightly cautionary look on Yang’s face. “Or if you’d prefer you could sleep on Blake’s bed. I’m against it, but I won’t stop you.” Her eyes flicked to Blake, but at this range she still couldn’t make out the Faunus’ expression.

Yang turned her head slightly to make eye contact with her partner, still standing on her shoulder. The smaller girl hesitated for a moment before nodding towards…
152122.title: Bed Time

choices: Weiss’s hand roughly closing around her
1521221.content:
Knowing that the heiress probably couldn’t see Blake’s nod very well, Yang vocalised the Faunus’ position. “Okay Weiss, we’ll sleep with you I guess.”

Her choice of wording brought a brief blush to Weiss’s face before she shook it off and smiled down at Yang and Blake. “Go...good. You’ll be safer I’m sure.” Despite their concerns, both girls made a valiant effort to smile back, trying to put their friend at ease.

Giving a small nod to herself Weiss ushered Ruby off her bed and started rummaging around in her dresser for her night clothes. Of course it was only then that she realised that the two shrunken students didn’t have any night clothes of their own to wear, other than what they’d been shrunk in.

For her part, Blake had just reached the same conclusion. Yang didn’t seem phased, suggesting they just sleep in their underwear if their clothes were too uncomfortable. The idea didn’t really appeal to Blake who, as much as she hated to admit it, was used to hiding herself, but it was better than the alternative. Reluctantly, the two small girls stripped off, Yang wrapping her own clothes and Blake’s, as well as their miniature weapons, in her jacket, and handing it to Ruby to be placed gently on the nearby desk. At their scale it wasn’t like their weapons would be much use in any case.

Having finished changing herself, Weiss tried to carefully climb into bed as Ruby flicked the lights and ascended to the higher bunk in a blur. The shift in weight on the bed nearly sent Yang tumbling towards the larger girl, and it was only her hand around Blake’s waist that stopped the Faunus from tumbling down the bed and under Weiss’s shifting body.

From the way the sheets and mattress gave way instantly to the larger girl’s weight, both girls knew that getting caught up in that wouldn’t have been a pleasant experience.

Worryingly, the heiress didn’t seem to have noticed her friend’s movement, merely laying her head down on the pillow beside them, giving them a soft smile and quiet goodnight before closing her eyes.

Out of sight, out of mind seemed to be in full effect as it had barely been a minute since Weiss closed her eyes when she rolled over completely to face the opposite direction, the violent movement of the bed nearly sending Yang, let alone Blake, into danger. It was only the blonde’s quick reflexes grabbing a fistful of sheets, and her continuing grip around the Faunus’ waist that stopped them.

Blake was shivering again, and Yang belatedly released she’d squeezed a bit too hard and slightly flattened the smaller girl’s abdomen. With a quick apology, the blonde lay the Faunus down beside her, opposite from Weiss, knowing the brunette’s night vision would allow her to see the apologetic smile directed towards her. “Don’t worry, I’ll stay between you and Weiss. Everything will be fine.”

That was a small comfort only, given Yang’s own size in comparison, but Blake tried to feel comforted by it. At least she wasn’t alone. Though she dared not put voice to her thoughts, the tiny Faunus feared that, without Yang, she would end up lost entirely in a now unfathomably large world, or unknowingly squished into oblivion by her giant teammates.

For her part, Yang wasn’t as concerned with getting lost but still feared what would happen if Weiss or Ruby lost track of her, or worse if she was found by someone with less benevolent intentions. She feared for Blake as well, knowing how easy it would be to lose her partner now.

Fitfully, the two shrunken girls feel into a restless sleep.

A couple of hours later, Yang awoke to find…
1521221.title: In Bed with Weiss

choices: Folded her arms tightly across her chest
15212211.content:
Yang was rudely awakened by a sudden sensation like a vice closing around her chest, her eyes darting down to see the manicured fingers of the heiress curling around her like steel cables. She had barely a moment to note Blake still sleeping fitfully near the edge of the bed before the hand retracted, lifting her from the sheets and drawing her back towards Weiss.

Turning her head slightly, Yang prepared to give her captive a piece of her mind for the rough treatment, only to see Weiss’s sleeping face through the sliver of moonlight that filtered through the curtains. It had taken several gruelling hours of combat to fight their way to the lead Grimm, a massive mutant Wyvern that had peppered them with razor-sharp feathers as they approached. Pyrrha had been lucky, with her shield and skill allowing her to avoid the feathers, while each of the others had been cut by the deadly projectiles at least once but fought through it to face the beast head-on.

While Teams SSSN and ABRN distracted the Wyvern, Team RWBY had taken out its right wing and foreleg with a combination attack and CFVY had taken care of the left. With the Wyvern grounded and crippled Team JNPR had broken open its jaw and put Miló’s spear form through its open mouth and out the back of its skull. With the monster dead the other Grimm had scattered and either fled or been mowed down by the pursuing students.

After a long flight back to Beacon and a quick medical examination Pyrrha had been allowed to return to her dorm to get some much needed rest and was out like a light the moment she hit the sheets. She hadn’t even had the energy to change properly, simply stripping down to her panties and throwing on an oversized shirt before falling into bed, too tired to be mindful of potential exposure to Ren and Jaune. Now awake, she stretched happily as she felt her joints click back into place and the relief in her muscles after far too much use. Rubbing her eyes, she looked over the rest of the room to greet her teammates, only to find that they had apparently already left the dorm.

What the redhead didn’t know, and could not possibly have guessed, was that her teammates were very much still in the room, just shrunken to a much smaller size. The compound in the mutant Wyvern’s blood that had fuelled its own growth had been transferred to the other students through the tips of its feathers, and had had quite the opposite effect on the physiology of humans. Whereas Pyrrha had gone to sleep and woken up as her usual self, her friends had fallen to sleep at one size and woken at another, thoroughly shocked and confused at their giant surroundings.

But what size are the shrunken members of Team JNPR?

With no conceivable means of contacting the redhead at this range, he had scaled down his own sheets to the floor and then climbed his partner’s bed, finding Nora still asleep at her own greatly reduced size.

“We haven’t had a chance to check on Jaune yet,” Ren explained, “if he’s like us he’ll probably be on his bed.”

Jaune, however, had taken more damage than anyone else on the battlefield, with multiple cuts and a significant abdominal wound that may have done some major damage if Weiss hadn’t frozen it over to prevent him bleeding out. As a result the mutagen level in his blood was much higher than any of the other students, and he had unfortunately been reduced to around one fifth of an inch. Now no larger than an ant, he could only stare up in terror and awe as Pyrrha loomed large above him, the entire room seemingly vibrating in time with her gargantuan footsteps as she approached his bed and caste her impossibly vast eyes down towards him.

Realising that this may be his one and only chance of getting his partner’s attention and hopefully escaping from this nightmare, Jaune started jumping up and down, waving his arms and yelling like a mad man, hoping beyond hope that he would be seen and rescued.

And yet, even to this tiny girl he was nothing more than a twisted piece of gum, beneath her rear and beneath her notice. The underwear the heiress had worn to bed was little more than a thin string of fabric buried deep between her cheeks, leaving Jaune’s moist and grimy body to be smeared across the small girl’s buttocks, mixing with both Weiss’s own sweat and the copious amount of foot sweat that Pyrrha had left behind when she flattened the unfortunate fencer. If the boy really had been shrunken worse than she herself had been, then Weiss had the best chance of finding him, and she figured that she might as well start on his own bed, since that had been the last place he had been seen at full size. Of course if she had known that Pyrrha had sat on this bed that morning she may have suggested another location. Not that it would do Jaune any good right now.

Turning quickly to look at her partner as she went to leave, the heiress narrowed her eyes. “You better not forget I’m here Ruby! And make sure everyone else knows as well. If I get crushed again I’m taking it out on you.” Even at her tiny size she managed to glare with sufficient force to get a quick gulp from the younger girl, and a firm promise not to forget. Satisfied for now, Weiss turned her attention to the task of finding her little friend, unaware of how close he truly was.

Still plastered to his crush’s ass, Jaune could feel the heiress’s movements as she walked around the bed, her cheeks shifting beneath him and progressively stretching him out to conform to their shape. The bits of him that had been left closest to her crack, including the left side of his face were being slowly pulled into the sweaty crevice, chewed up like a piece of gum as they were drawn inexorably inwards. Simultaneously the right side of his face, part of his chest and a flattened arm had become partially adhered to the inside of her dress and were being stretched out across Weiss’s left buttock, one bloodshot eye at the very centre of her cheek staring out from his otherwise indistinguishable body. On the other side the remainder of his body, including most of his lower half, was being similarly dragged across her right cheek. More and more he was coming to look like little more than the seat of a pair of abused panties, if a somewhat oddly designed pair. Worse, his captor was working up a sweat in her search for him and his already soaked form was picking up a new layer of perspiration, flowing both from the crack that was eating him alive and down the heiress’s back.

Still completely oblivious to what she was putting Jaune through, Weiss eventually determined that Jaune either wasn’t on the bed or was too small to be seen by even her. Somewhat depressed by her failure she peered over the side of the bed, noting how the sheets had fallen partially to the floor. Figuring it was easier than waiting for one of the others to move within earshot, she plopped down on the edge of the sheets and pushed off, sliding down to the floor like she was riding a giant water slide, and having to repress the urge to squeal at the sudden rush of speed and adrenaline. She had been concerned she would feel some friction or burning in her butt, but the trip was surprisingly comfortable, oddly moist even, like she really was taking a trip on a water slide.

At his size she may as well have been sliding on concrete, and the knight felt as if he was being grinded beneath a steam roller as his friend unknowingly used him as a make-shift toboggan.
