1542232111321.content:
By the time Weiss’s eyes had fallen on Jaune’s blackened form he had already disappeared halfway beneath the Faunus’ toes, his legs and torso crammed between the digits as the rest of him was slowly dragged into their embrace. What could be seen was mostly just a black mangled lump of flesh and clothing, still recovering from the successive crushing he had endured.

It should have been nothing to Weiss, so why did she feel like there was something different about this particular rag, other than being an impossibly tiny thing? She watched one of Blake’s toes come down on it, witnessed the way it squished out beneath her weight. The way it almost seemed to be trying, and utterly failing, to twitch away from its merciless captor.

Whatever it was, it might be worth investigating before it became a permanent resident of her teammate’s toes. As it was it had almost completely disappeared by the time the heiress raised her voice. “Blake stop, there’s something at your feet.”

“Huh?” The larger girl had no idea what her tiny friend was talking about but obediently froze on the spot, ceasing the nervous movements she hadn’t even been aware of before that point and casting her gaze down to her feet. Even with her enhanced vision she couldn’t see what Weiss was talking about but she trusted the girl enough to wait obediently as the fencer approached her toes.

Weiss had to suppress unpleasant memories of her experiences with Pyrrha as she approached Blake’s feet, all too aware of the shadows cast by the rest of her team as Yang and Ruby closed in to see what she had found. The black rag had been reduced to a single scrap sticking out from between the brunette’s second and third toes and it took a few solid pulls before the taller girl got the message and separated the digits far enough for the wet piece of fabric to slowly slide free.

By the time the heiress had started to pull on him, Jaune’s head had already been pulled between Blake’s toes, only one crushed arm extending out to secure his freedom. His entire body and face slid across the moist flesh of the Faunus as he was slowly pulled free, ensuring that by the time he was raised to look Weiss in the face a fresh layer of toe jam had completely obscured any features that had remained recognisable through his previous torment.

Weiss’s first instinct was to throw this putrid thing away. It was wet and slimy beneath her hands and smelled like a dumpster full of sweat, not to mention that the grime with which it was covered was starting to come off on her hands, staining her pale flesh black. Yet she still couldn’t shake the feeling that this was something worth investigating further. Turning her gaze up to meet the towering forms of her teammates she stuck the slowly reforming Jaune out in their general direction.

It had been the intention of the heiress to hand the dirty thing over to Blake, or possibly Yang, but instead she found it snatched from her hands from behind by an enthusiastic Nora, who instantly began playing with her battered teammate. “What is this thing? It’s so squishy!” Unaware what she was really holding, the redhead stretched out the tortured student before crushing him back together with her hands, marvelling at the elasticity of this new toy.

Making sure not to crush her smallest teammate in the process, Yang stepped forward to get a closer look, noting the sheer quantity of grime coming off on Nora’s hands. “Hey, give it here.” Snatching the redhead’s toy with a quick smile, she stretched it out into a sheet and tried to rub off some of the grime with her thumbs. Seeing something paler underneath she redoubled her efforts, eventually resorting to spitting on her defenceless friend and rubbing his body vigorously against the front of her pyjama top. It took some doing but eventually she’d managed to clean off the majority of the mess, though her top was now filthy itself and her mouth was unpleasantly dry.

What was revealed was a twisted mess of tan flesh and torn fabric, which Yang stared at in confusion for a few moments before her partner made a surprised noise and stepped forward, keen eyes zeroing in on the mop of blonde hair visible at the base of the upside down mass.

“It’s Jaune.” Taking the unfortunate boy off her partner, Blake turned to face the quizzical expressions of the others. “Look closely, he’s been pretty badly squashed but it’s him.” Careful not to do more harm than good she held up the rag of a boy, still wet from Yang’s spit, for the others to see, Nora shooting her little teammate a bashful smile as she recalled her former actions.

Of all of them Ruby seemed the most enthusiastic about their discovery. “Wow, he’s so tiny! I mean he’s even smaller than Weiss. Way smaller.” She either ignored, or more likely didn’t notice, the annoyed look the heiress shot her at that comment. Watching as Blake laid the boy gently on the table she took a moment to poke him with her comparatively gargantuan toe, noting the complete lack of resistance as her toe tip sank into his body. “Why isn’t he reforming though?”

Pushing her partner’s foot out the way, Weiss bent down for a closer look, glad that the boy at least smelled better than he did before. “Given his state he’s obviously been squished quite a bit. Possibly even by Pyrrha. It may take him longer to reform.” Shaking her head she turned her back on the tiny knight. “Let’s just give him some space for a while.”

The others nodded in agreement, shuffling away from Jaune as their conversation turned to their next course of action. With all members of Team JNPR and Team RWBY now accounted for they had the opportunity to try to find a way out of this situation, or maybe just see what they could do with their new bodies. Yang and Nora in particular were keen to explore, while Ren and Weiss argued strongly for staying where they were until Pyrrha returned. There was also debate over whether their tiniest friend should be left peacefully to reform, or carried along with them if they left.

For Jaune the conversations of his companions were just a dull blur of noise at the edge of his perception, his aching body slowly but surely beginning to morph back into shape. At this point all he cared about was that he was free and currently lying a comparatively safe distance from the still shifting feet of his friends, even if the smell of feet and ass still filled his noise and his body was unpleasantly moist from Yang’s rather enthusiastic cleaning procedure.

In the end though, Jaune’s fate remained in the hands of his friends and their final decision.

Always a bundle of energy, Ruby could consider things better when she was on the move, though she did tend to get a bit distracted while doing so. She was careful enough at least to step around Weiss, or more accurately the little heiress had taken to hiding behind her other teammates and glaring balefully at her partner as the larger girl stomped past.

The fifteen year old’s footsteps, however, were falling dangerously close to Jaune, his own teammates too distracted by the discussion to keep track of the tiny knight. With each pass Ruby’s feet drew inexorably closer to her stricken friend, vibrating the desk beneath him as his eyes shifted around in a desperate attempt to see what it was that was approaching.

She was almost completely on top of him when the door to the room suddenly swung open, the noise and motion startling everyone and instantly drawing their attention to the door. Caught in mid-stride, Ruby faltered in her step, her foot sweeping across the desk slightly and catching Jaune’s edge. It was only a glancing blow but it was enough to unstick him slightly from the desk and send him sliding across the surface, his body stopping just short of the very edge and the drop beyond.

Unaware of her partner’s position, Pyrrha strode back into the room, the shadow she cast over the desk joined by two others as Glynda Goodwitch and Winter Schnee entered the room behind her.

While her friends had searched for Jaune, Pyrrha had headed across campus to the headmaster’s office, where she’d interrupted a meeting between Professor Ozpin and General Ironwood regarding the security for the upcoming Vytal Tournament. Professor Goodwitch had also been present, as well as Ironwood’s offsider Winter, who had apparently come to Beacon earlier than scheduled after hearing that her younger sister had been injured in a battle against the Grimm.

When Pyrrha had advised them that Team RWBY and the remainder of Team JNPR had been shrunken both Glynda and Winter had volunteered to check on the situation while Ozpin and Ironwood continued their discussion. The older Schnee in particular had been quite keen to investigate, though it was only on the trip back that Pyrrha had discovered her relationship to Weiss.

Seeing the congregation of her friend’s on the desk, Pyrrha stepped closer, concerned green eyes checking that everyone was present and accounted for, though still failing to spot her insignificant speck of a partner. To her left Glynda looked down at the shrunken students with an expression of fascination, while Winter frowned on her right, eyes flicking around in search of her sister.

Still hiding behind her taller teammates, Weiss remained out of sight from her larger sibling, not out of fear but because she was embarrassed to be seen like this by the only family member she was truly close to. She respected Winter, and she didn’t want to seem weak in front of her.

Not aware of their teammate’s thoughts, Yang and Blake noted the searching look on Winter’s face and her striking similarities to Weiss. Putting two and two together, the bumblebee duo stepped aside and exposed the heiress to her sister’s line of sight and instantly concerned expression. Leaning down to get a closer look, the older Schnee pressed her ample chest into the edge of the table right in front of the Team RWBY girls, bending herself at an uncomfortable-looking angle to get as close as possible to her tiny sister.

For Jaune, the descent of Winter’s chest cast a vast shadow as he was…

Meanwhile, staring down at her sister, Winter noted her ragged appearance and wet clothing, not to mention the grime in her hair. “What happened?” She frowned slightly at the smaller Schnee’s visible wince, and lowered the volume of her voice. “Why are you so… messed up?” Keen to hear the answer she somehow managed to compress herself even closer to the table, her twin mounds spreading out yet further as they completely obliterated Jaune beneath their weight.

It took a moment for the situation to click in her mind but when it did she wasted no time in slamming her full ass down on the hapless tiny, disguising the motion as a tired and defeated slump.

It would be wrong to say that Glynda hated Jaune, but she’d never been particularly fond of the boy that she knew full-well had lied his way into the academy. She didn’t know that she was returning him to a hell he had already experienced as she annihilated him beneath her tremendous rear, and she didn’t particularly care either. Pyrrha was still looking frantically for her lost friends, and was glancing fearfully back at Nora every other second, while Winter continued to hover protectively over Team RWBY as an imposing and immovable guardian. As much as she didn’t want to admit it, Glynda knew it would not be possible to grab everyone, and that maybe she’d have to settle just for the two she’d already managed to acquire, at least for now. “Ms Nikos.” The authoritative tone was enough to stop the redhead in her tracks, and drew curious eyes in Glynda’s direction. “It’s clear that we will make no progress searching like this. The best course of action now is to remove as many variables as possible and shift the odds in our favour.” She had to hide her grin at the hopeful look that came over Pyrrha’s face. “Team RWBY are accounted for so I suggest that Ms Schnee take them elsewhere while the two of us focus on recovering the rest of your team. Doctor Oobleck has some aura scanning equipment in his lab. If you can obtain it for me we can use it to search for your friends. Meanwhile, I’ll make some calls.”

Winter eyes flicked between her sister’s team and Beacon’s vice-principal, experiencing somewhat mixed feelings as her eyes lingered on Weiss’s teammates. “There’s a full lab facility on the General’s airship. I could take them there for observation.”

The former heiress had never told anyone, could never, but she had a ‘preference’ for playing with tiny little things. Maybe it was her father’s controlling upbringing, or maybe it was just something inherent to herself, but Winter enjoyed domination, especially the idea of dominating people who were smaller than herself (so long as they were of age of course). The concept of being a literal giantess had occurred to her more than once, but prior to this very moment had seemed nothing more than a foolish fantasy that was well and truly beneath her.

Now however, she could see not one but four tiny people standing right before her. Of course she’d never consider doing anything with Weiss and to her mind Ruby was too young and naïve to partake in such things, but she couldn’t help flicking lustful eyes towards Blake and Yang. She was perfectly aware of the way they had been staring at her chest, in fact she had deliberately flaunted it for their benefit. 1542232113.content:
Unfortunately for Weiss, Pyrrha remained utterly oblivious to the torment she was putting the tiny girl through as she continued to stomp around the room in a fruitless search for her partner. If any of the others had taken the time to look up at the redhead’s soles as she stalked across the room they may have seen the crushed body of the heiress slowly slipping completely into the embrace of their friend’s toes, but everyone was too preoccupied with the search for Jaune to witness Weiss’s fate.

For her part Pyrrha didn’t even consciously notice her toes’ new companion. She dimly registered a slight itch beneath the toes of her right foot, but pushed it quickly from her mind as she continued her search, subconsciously allowing her toes to shift and grind against each other to relieve the itch. By the time she had once again risen on her toes to check the highest bookshelf in the room, the feeling had vanished completely, the heiress’s body reduced to little more than a sweat-soaked tattoo, completely at the mercy of her unaware captor.

As Weiss suffered in silent agony beneath Pyrrha’s toes and Jaune continued to be chewed up by her shifting buttocks, the remaining members of Team RWBY and Team JNPR continued to scan the room, in a search that had been doomed to failure the moment it began.

After nearly twenty minutes of searching, Pyrrha finally reached her limit, her concern for Jaune reaching a critical point as she whirled back to face the dresser she shared with Nora. If her partner wasn’t in the room then perhaps he had ended up somewhere else, somewhere worse. Maybe he needed her help right now, and if that was the case she couldn’t just stay here. If she was unable to find him herself than she would just have to seek the help of someone else. And while she was at it she could find some way to help her other friends, or at least a way to look after them better.

The bigger members of Team RWBY were one thing, and Nora and Ren should be relatively okay, at least as long as Nora kept an eye on her own partner, but Pyrrha was worried about Weiss. The girl was so tiny that she could easily be crushed without anyone noticing, and probably wouldn’t even be able to cause an irritation if she was. The thought was enough for the redhead to shudder in fear, unconsciously clenching her toes as she dwelt on the possible dangers to her little friend, completely unaware of the agony she was inflicting on that very same friend with her careless actions.

With a quick shake of her head, Pyrrha shook those thoughts from her mind and pulled open the top drawer of her dresser with more force than strictly necessary as she focused on the task at hand. So sharp was her focus that she hadn’t even seen Ren standing on top of the dresser as she approached, her teammate’s casual gaze turning into one of shock as the piece of furniture shuddered beneath him from the redhead’s violent opening and he tipped over the edge into the drawer below.

Heedless of Ren’s fall, Pyrrha whipped off her T-shirt and tossed it to the side, narrowly missing Ruby in the process, and then reached down to grab a bra. Grabbing a plain green sports bra with nothing more than a glance, she failed to take note of the tiny green-clad passenger in the left cup. The shrunken boy had less than a second to cry out, struggling to find his voice in the wake of his fall, and failed to make so much as a peep before being slammed face-first into the underside of his teammate’s giant chest, his squishy body offering no resistance as it was instantly flattened by the massive orb.

In ordinary circumstances, Ren’s size would likely have been sufficient for Pyrrha to notice his location, even as the weight of her left boob fell fully upon him and smeared him across the cup, but unfortunately he had come to line up perfectly with a seam in the fabric, and any irritation he caused was dismissed as a by-product of the seam’s location. Blissfully oblivious, the redhead secured the clasp and pulled the straps tight, unknowingly amplifying the pressure on her unfortunate friend even as she successfully squashed any lingering irritation.

Face covered with the creamy flesh of his teammate’s chest, Ren could do nothing to save himself as the heavy mass heaved in and out in time with Pyrrha’s breathing, the tight bra ensuring that he experienced no relief from the overwhelming pressure. It only became worse as the redhead leant down to retrieve some socks from a lower drawer, the full weight of her chest bearing down on the tiny boy. To add insult to injury the boobs began to jiggle slightly as the giant girl briefly moved to one foot, unknowingly crushing Weiss even further as she bore all of her weight down on the toes holding the shrunken fencer while she slipped a well-worn sock over her left foot, only to repeat the process with her right foot, hiding the little heiress from sight behind a wall of white cotton.

Apparently not content with the pain she had so far inflicted on her vulnerable friends, Pyrrha straightened quickly and donned a loose shirt before grabbing a pair of skin-tight jeans. She hadn’t put any particular thought into the choice of clothing. The jeans had merely been on top of her pile of pants, but the consequences of the choice would be dire indeed.

The jeans were only halfway up the redhead’s legs when their tightness began to hinder her progress. Used to this issue, Pyrrha didn’t let it bother her much and merely redoubled her efforts, hopping slightly in place as she fought her own personal battle against the reluctant garment. It was no issue to her that she was bouncing on her toes, driving the digits into the ground over and over again as the coarse fabric of her socks was rubbed against their underside. Nor was the bouncing of her chest any great concern, the overworked bra struggling to keep them contained as they threatened to burst from its confines. She certainly didn’t pay any attention to the way her hips were moving side-to-side, her meaty buttocks sliding against each other freely.

What she couldn’t ignore, however, was the moment she stepped down too hard with her right foot and lost her balance all at once, stumbling backwards and nearly crushing Blake and Yang in the process before landing heavily on Ren’s bed. For Nora, standing on that very bed as she searched for Jaune, there was no warning to herald the massive weight of Pyrrha’s rear as it crashed down upon her, mercilessly reducing the hammer-wielder to paper-thinness as the springy surface of the mattress left the redhead bouncing in place for a few moments while she regained her bearings.

It took a moment for what had just happened to sink in completely, but when it did Pyrrha blushed furiously as she sprung back to her feet, utterly heedless of the continued bouncing of her chest, yet painfully aware that her shrunken friends had undoubtedly seen her fall. As she rose up she momentarily revealed the squished Nora spread-eagled across her left ass cheek before obscuring the girl completely from sight as she finally managed to pull the jeans up and over her hips.

For Nora, who was still trying to process what exactly had happened, the momentary relief of being out from under Pyrrha’s weight was replaced with pressure and pain as the coarse fabric of the jeans bore down upon her, pressing her deep into the soft mass of her teammate’s ass flesh. For Jaune the experience was even worse. He had been pounded mercilessly when his partner had fallen and now the cheeks were squeezing him worse than ever, seemingly doing their outmost best to squash him into nothing. Then they began to grind him into dust as the redhead moved across the room.

Glancing around the room, Pyrrha noted Ruby standing near the foot of her own bed, catching the girl’s eyes as she grabbed her sneakers. “I’m going to go get some help okay.” Slipping her feet into the sneakers she gave them a good few stomps to make sure they were straight. “You guys stay here and see if you can find Jaune for me.” Tying her laces she briefly ran her hands over her outfit, pausing with her hands on her hips as she saw Blake and Yang approaching from her left. “I’ll be back as soon as I can. I’ll lock the door so you should be safe while I’m gone.”

As Pyrrha turned to leave the room, the remaining members of Team RWBY…

15422321131.content:
Team RWBY merely waved Pyrrha off as the giant redhead vanished through the door, completely unaware of what just transpired. Had they been more aware beforehand they would've stopped the tournament champion from leaving as fast as she did. But unfortunately that wasn't case.

Team RWBY would continue their fruitless search for the microscopic blonde. They searched drawers, beds, the floor, umder the beds, and there was still no sign of team JNPR's leader. Maybe he was even smaller then they initially though? Or maybe he just wasn't in here. Either way he remained missing,

"Alright everyone, let's regroup!" ruby called out. It took a while but the rest of team RBY assembled, with noticeable absences. "Where Ren and Nora?"

Blake and Yang shrugged. Not that Ruby mentioned it, there was a distinct lack of energy in the room that would normally come from team JNPR's hyperactive hammer wielder.

After a quick scan, Ruby noticed something else. "Where's Weiss?"

Everyone began to grow nervous now, Team JNPR might've shrunk, but they were still big enough to noticed by people as people, Weiss on the other hand was small enough to be mistaken for a bug at a first glance.

"Everyone scatter and search around!" Ruby ordered. The rest of her team nodded. Speeding through the dorm with her semblance, Ruby began to call out. "Weiss!? Ren!? Nora!?"

This process was repeated by Blake and Yang, only at a much slower pace. "Ren!? Nora!? Weiss!? Is anybody in here!?

"Weiss if you're in here just yell!?" Yang shouted, No response. The blonde even lifted her foot just in case and was relieved to find no Weiss splatter.

Eventually everyone regrouped in the center of the room. "Any luck?" Ruby asked, clearly worried for her partner.

"None." Yang frowned. "I don't think their even in the room anymore sis."

"Then where did they all go?" Ruby sulked.

Blake who remained silent began to ponder. Where had their friends run off too, and how did they disappear without anyone's notice? Could it be that... They shrank again? Blake shuddered at the idea but quickly pushed it aside. If that were the case then she'd be a bug or a speck by now?

"Hmm?" She hummed, tuning out Ruby and Yang's conversation.

She then thought about Pyrrha. Could the redhead have accidently crushed them and they were stuck to her like stickers right now? She did accidently step on Weiss earlier. It was plausible, though Pyrrha wasn't known for making the same mistake twice. The more Blake pondered this the more ridiculous it sounded. Pyrrha could be clumsy she wasn't that clumsy. So that still begged the question... Where did everybody go?

Ren awoke with a yawn from his deep sleep. It had been quite a while since he had such a peaceful rest, what with the tournament fast approaching. Training with the rest of team JNPR really did take it's toll at times. After giving his arms a good stretch and rubbing the sleep from his eyes, Ren finally got a good look at his surroundings.

When he did his eyes bulged. Surely he must still be dreaming? The last time he checked he was in his dorm, not some soft green desert. Hold a moment?! Soft... Green... Desert! Upon closer inspection Ren realized that this abnormally soft surface was in fact his own bed.

"How is this possible?" He wondered whilst trying to remain calm. He steadily rose to his feet before giving his arm a good pinch. He winced in slight discomfort before reality came crashing down. This was no dream! He's somehow shrunk. Looking down at himself he hazard to guess he was at least three inches tall.

Worry filled him as he turned to look at his other teammates bunks. He couldn't see anyone in either Jaune or Pyrrha's beds. Could they have shrunk as well. He then turned his attention to his friend Nora's bed. Much to his relief and surprise, she appeared to be normal sized and snoring.

"Well at least Nora's alright. But still I have to check on the others." Ren reasoned to himself. Once he knew everyone was okay they could all put their heads together and figure out what was going on. Hopefully everything would go smooth and their would be no unfortunate accidents. At this size anything could happen.

With his thoughts cleared and his breathing steady... Ren leapt into action.

15423211.content:
Ren carefully scaled down his bedsheets as to not go splat on the hardwood. He doubted his aura would do much to protect him if he fell. Once he reached the ground level he could only marvel at his dorm. At his three inch height everything was the equivalent of a castle or skyscraper.

"This is amazing." Ren mused before getting his mind back on track. He couldn't afford to get distracted by this new change in perspective, even if his shoes were now like that of a bullhead. He needed to stay focused. He'd already made up his mind to check on his team leader first.

Jaune would probably need the most aid of everyone in the room. Though he would never admit that out loud. The blonde had the least ability on the team, though with Pyrrha's aid he was steadily improving. But given his base personality he was probably freaking out right now. Well, if he were awake that is.

Taking a deep breath, Ren regained himself and bean to sprint across the hardwood floor. Every once in a while though he had to maneuver around the occasion garbage that littered the floor. Things ranging from discarded syrup bottles from Nora's pancake binge, discarded boots, or much to his own shock... A bra.

"That's definitely not Nora's." Ren commented before continuing his trek. He would have to make a mental note to his team about their bad habits. Especially Pyrrha if that bra was anything to go by. Leaving your unmentionables out on the floor was unacceptable.

Ren finally made it to Jaune's bed. The whole structure looked twice as big as Beacon Academy it this size. It would no doubt be a pain to climb, but it had to be done. Before Ren could make a move however, the voice of his still normal sized teammate filled his ears.

He turned his head to the side to see Nora cradling her pillow while trying to bit the top. She must be having the pancake world dream again. It was the only time she tried to bite anything in her sleep. Her knew from personal experience. Aura or not, getting bit hurt. With a sigh, Ren started his climb.

It must've taken him a while because once he reached the top he felt his muscles burn. It was as if he was back in the training room sparing with his teammates. Ren took a moment to catch his breath and continued he Journey through Jaune's bed.

When he reached the center he began to call out for his leader. Jaune! Jaune! Are you up here!"

No answer.

He was about to call out again until a familiar voice greeted him over the horizon of green. "Ren! Ren! Is that you!"

"Yes! Are you okay!" Ren answered, relieved to know his leader was okay. He ran over the horizon to meet up with his teammate and when he did he instantly stopped.

Ren was not expecting this.

15423222.title: Time Jump Scenarios

choices: You successfully manage to make your way to Ruby
154232221.content:
This was it. After, admittedly, more setbacks than you would have liked, you were finally here. You’d arrived at Beacon Academy, home to Vale’s best and brightest hunters and huntresses in training. Now that you were here you could finally commence your grand plan to meet the legendary Ruby Rose, woo her with your carefully thought out confession, and score yourself a famous girlfriend.

It had been a year since the defeat of Salem and the pushing back of the Grimm to the edge of human civilisation, an effort in which Team RWBY had been instrumental. Though they had returned to Beacon as third year students, Weiss Schnee, Blake Belladonna and Yang Xiao Long were now household names across Remnant, and Ruby, who had dealt the final blow that finally slew the Grimm’s Queen, was widely considered the most important hunter of the modern age despite still being just seventeen. To you she was beyond beautiful, and more importantly while rumours and half-truths abounded about the romantic entanglements of her teammates, the younger huntress had remained single, focused on her training and the protection of innocents.

Your family and friends had said you were crazy to think you’d ever have a shot with someone like that, but Ruby presented as so down to earth that you were convinced it wasn’t crazy.

If nothing else you had confidence. Confidence that you could make this work.

Your original plan had been to gain entry to Beacon as a student, but unfortunately you’d failed to make the necessary grade to obtain entry, so now you were going with plan B. Sneaking in and praying to Oum that you didn’t get caught, or at least not before getting the chance to meet Ruby. Civilians were allowed to visit Beacon, but the areas they could access were limited, and you’d already moved into parts of the grounds that were supposed to be off limit.

This meant keeping to the shadows and as low to the ground as possible, so when you heard raised voices as you slunk across one of the Academy’s courtyards, you immediately hit the ground, slipping behind a bench as dust-fuelled blasts started exploding all around you. Apparently two of the older students were engaging in a duel, authorised or otherwise, and you now found yourself stuck in the middle as they hurled large quantities of dust all over the place.

Had you just revealed yourself they certainly would have stopped, but you’d also have been thrown out of Beacon immediately, so you kept your head down. And you paid the price when two particularly powerful blasts struck the bench, fire and lightning combining in a maelstrom of destruction that left a crater in its wake and set your nerves ablaze with pain. Though your Aura protected you from the worst of it, your vision still went black as you hit the floor.

……………

You had no idea how much time had passed by the time you regained consciousness, though the shift in the shadows suggested it had been several hours. You were still surrounded by the scenery of the courtyard, but somehow you hadn’t been discovered or moved. It took you a few moments to realise why, but eventually the sheer size of your surroundings sunk in.

Somehow, impossibly, the combination of the dust that had flooded your system had reduced your height to barely a couple of inches, well hidden among the rubble of the unfortunate bench.

Fearful for your safety, your first thought was to get help from the closest available person, but after a few seconds to consider you decided you’d much rather seek help from Ruby and her team and headed off in the direction of the third-year dorms.
154232221.title: Welcome to Beacon

choices: Agree to seek assistance from the Professors
Ask to get help from Weiss’s expert knowledge
Ask Ruby if you can speak to her somewhere private
1542322211.content:
It took some doing, but eventually you managed to make your way to the edge of the courtyard and towards the entrance of the dorms. It was hard to cross that much ground in your reduced state but on the up side it was much easier to keep out of sight of the passing students and faculty.

Of course even if you were able to avoid the giants while staying off the paths, approaching a doorway was an entirely different matter. No sooner had you crossed the threshold than a shadow fell upon you, instinct alone allowing you to leap to the right just as a massive boot crashed to the ground where you had been standing. Heart in your throat, your eyes trailed up and up, until finally coming to meet silver orbs that peered down at you with curiosity.

Physically speaking, the last two years had been good to Ruby. Though still smaller than her sister and Blake she’d gained a few inches, and filled out slightly in the usual places. Her facial features had matured somewhat but maintained their youthful vigour and curiosity as she gazed down upon your tiny form. Shoulder-length hair shifted as she bent forward, and long slender fingers wrapped around your body before bringing you face-to-face.

For several long moments you just stared at each other. For your part you were too in awe at being this close to your crush to find any words, while Ruby looked like she was just trying to process what exactly was going on. Eventually, it was the young huntress who broke the silence. “So… is this some kind of semblance or are you a mutant or something? You’re okay aren’t you?”

Never in your wildest dreams had you pictured yourself in a scenario like this. Cupped gently in the hands of your crush, at a size difference in which she could probably literally crush you. Gentle eyes looked down at you, while her body warmth flowed through you, and all you wanted to do was bare your heart and try to get a kiss from those luscious lips.

“That’s… I… I’ve always.” The plan had been to marvellously confess the moment you managed to come face-to-face with this girl, but now that you were actually here you couldn’t find the words. Your jumbled response only made Ruby look more concerned, which wasn’t exactly helping you feel any less enamoured. “I mean, I’m not sure how this happened. I was normal, and then I got hit by some dust and I… became this. By the way, big fan.” You blushed at the lame finish.

The bright smile and giggle you received in return made it all worth it. “Don’t you mean small fan? Aha, sorry, Yang joke.” Glancing to the side quickly she stepped into the nearest alcove, giving you both some privacy. “You’re really okay though?” You nodded. “Okay then, should I take you to the professors? Goodwitch may know how to help, or maybe Oobleck. Or, I guess if it has to do with dust Weiss may be able to help. Her family are kind of the experts in this stuff.”

Now you were at an impasse. Your first instinct was to go with Weiss, since she was Ruby’s partner and time with the heiress would mean time with your crush as well. But then again, if you really wanted to get out of this mess the professors might be a better bet. Or maybe, just maybe, you could take this chance to… experience something else you’d always wanted to experience.
1542322211.title: Meeting Ruby

choices: Start slowly by massaging Ruby’s perfect feet
Take things further and lick the sweaty soles
Request that Ruby trample you under her feet
15423222113.content:
What you hadn’t said yet, what you hadn’t told anyone, even your family, was that you had a massive foot fetish. You hadn’t yet had the good fortune to meet a girl who’d actually let you near her feet, or had a girlfriend at all for that matter, but your scroll was full of pictures of women’s soles and various other fetish material. In particular you’d spent hours scouring news and publicity footage of Team RWBY for those rare glimpses of their bare or nylon-clad feet, with a particularly keen eye for any picture showing the usually hidden feet of Ruby herself. It would be nice to say that there wasn’t a folder on your scroll just for those pictures, but that would be a lie.

Originally, the plan had been to confess to Ruby, go on a few dates, and then maybe raise the possibility of tending to her feet. But your current situation just raised too many possibilities for you to ignore. If you couldn’t bring yourself to confess, maybe you could go for something else instead. “Actually, before that, would it be possible to talk to you somewhere else… somewhere private.”

Ruby raised an eyebrow but didn’t object, looking around quickly before basically teleporting to a nearby classroom and closing the door behind her. Her control over her semblance had improved remarkably over the years and you barely felt the acceleration as she moved. One moment you were cradled protectively in her hands and the next you were standing on a desk looking up at the towering brunette, struggling to find the right words to make your request.

“This may sound strange but I… I would really appreciate it if you could let me… let me touch your feet.” Ruby frowned slightly and for a moment you were sure you had offended her, but the look in her eyes was more one of confusion than distress. “We don’t have to if you’d rather not, but if you let me try just once, I promise we can stop if you don’t like it.”

A few years ago Ruby may not have understood what you were getting at, but years of interactions with her more… active teammates had taught her a thing or two about the world. “This is a sexual thing isn’t it? You’ve got a thing for feet?” Your sudden furious blush was all the answer she needed. “I see. Well… if you really want. I’ve got to warn you though my feet get pretty sweaty when I use my semblance.” A quick flick of eyes down to her heavy boots. “It’s like a sauna in there.”

At this point it was difficult to believe what you were hearing. You had thought there was no way you could be any more attracted to this girl, yet here she was actually agreeing to let you at her feet. “Sweaty is fine. I really appreciate just getting the chance.”

Ruby just nodded in response, hoping up onto the desk and tugging off her boots. She quickly pulled off her leggings as well, bunching them up and throwing them into the boots before propping up her feet, sole-first, on the desk in front of you. She hadn’t been lying about the sweat either, a light sheen across her soles speaking to the accumulated moisture. Surprisingly enough the smell was actually kind of nice, at least at this range, and sweatiness aside they appeared to be quite clean.

Every instinct in your body was screaming at you to jump right in and take full advantage of the treasure that had been identified to you, while the rational part of your brain warned you not to take too much advantage of Ruby’s kindness. Looking up to meet Ruby’s curious eyes you weighted your options before eventually deciding to…
15423222113.title: Revealing the Fetish

choices: “…see what it’s like to be completely buried beneath my feet.”
Someone or something interrupts before Ruby can finish.
154232221131.content:
As much as you wanted to dive straight into heavier worship, you were fully aware that you had no idea what Ruby might actually be into. The fact that she was letting you touch her feet suggested she at least had some interest, but you’d only asked about touching. If you suddenly started licking the soles or asking for something more she might get weirded out, or worse yet become angry. So you were going to start things slow with a nice gentle massage.

Approaching the towering girl’s left foot you reached out to touch the skin of her sole, your heart beating a mile a minute as your hands slowly pressed against the sweaty flesh. The feeling of it was difficult to describe. Her feet were warm and moist, the sheen of sweat pooling between your fingers and flowing over the back of your hands, and her flesh was incredibly smooth. Quickly you began moving your hands around in a massaging motion, doing your best to be felt as you pressed against the slightly springy texture of her soles. At your current height you couldn’t reach much higher than her heel, though you were able to run the very tips of your fingers along her arch.

You’d dreamed of doing this, full-sized or otherwise, more times than you could count. Yet actually doing this, really touching your crush’s soles, was beyond anything you could have imagined.

High above, Ruby bit her lip at the feeling of your little hands running across her foot. Whether as a by-product of her semblance or just by coincidence, she’d always had quite sensitive feet, eternally irritated by even the smallest twigs or stones that found their way into her shoes. Her semblance certainly didn’t help matters, since its use frequently led to her feet overheating and producing copious sweat, which combined with her sensitivity to leave her feeling unpleasantly warm and moist. Right now though, as her toes gently curled at the feeling of your tiny ministrations, she considered that maybe having sensitive soles wasn’t so bad after all.

Though you were unaware of Ruby’s thoughts you were encouraged by the fact that she had yet to pull away or raise any obvious objection to your actions. From your position in front of her sole you couldn’t see her face but the slight shift in her foot suggested she was enjoying the experience. By now your hands were covered in a thick layer of sweat, sliding more easily across her sole as you diligently tended to every inch of flesh within reach. Once you felt that her left sole had been sufficiently tended to you jogged over to the right, not wanting it to feel left out.

If anything the right sole was even sweatier than the left, to the extent that your already slick hands had trouble finding purchase, but you pressed on regardless, determined to tend to both soles equally. To you, the warm flesh beneath your hands felt like heaven and it was a constant battle to keep your focus and not get too carried away. As much as you were enjoying this you wanted to make sure that Ruby enjoyed it as well, or else all of your plans would go out the window. In the end though, it seemed your concerns were unwarranted as a soft moan emanated from above.

“Mmm… you’re actually pretty good at this you know.” Sighing in appreciation, Ruby temporarily pulled back her right foot, allowing her to look at you directly for a moment and shoot you a gentle smile. “But you’re so short your only getting half of it you know. How about this?” Raising her foot into the air slightly she hovered it above you, so close that it sat just above your head and caste a deep shadow over your body. “Think you can get the rest of it?”

Joy bubbled up inside you as your goddess made her pleasure known and presented to you a new prize to explore. From this position some of the sweat from her foot dripped down on you, allowing you a taste of the sweet, if somewhat salty, nectar as it made its way down your throat. Instantly your hands reached up to rub and squeeze at the ball of her foot and the upper part of her arch, eager to lavish attention on those parts of her sole you had so far neglected. Soon the shadows around you deepened as Ruby moved her left foot next to the right, completely obscuring you from view beneath the joined soles as you began to split your attention between both marvellous feet.

For several minutes you lost yourself in a world where there was only you and Ruby’s feet. The manner in which they were arched above you amplified their warmth, subjecting you to sauna-like conditions as you continued your ministrations. After finishing with the soles you moved your hands further upwards towards the toes, rubbing your hands over each in turn, and taking particular care to ensure that that you gave attention to the crevices beneath and between them. The flesh of those tight confines was even warmer than the rest of Ruby’s feet, and the accumulated sweat and toejam quickly began to coat your hands. Above, the giant brunette seemed to particularly appreciate the attention her toes were receiving, clenching them slightly around your hands and moaning softly.

All to soon however, it appeared that Ruby had received her full, as she casually retracted her feet and laid them flat on the desk, allowing her to once again gaze at you directly, quirking an eyebrow as she noted your sweat-drenched form. On the inside she had actually become quite flustered, and was just taking a moment to compose herself, but to you her expression was unreadable.

Not wanting to let the silence drag on as it had before, you quickly attempted to assuage your own fears. “Umm… Miss Ruby, did you enjoy it? If you did than perhaps we… could do it again some time.” You were sweating yourself now, both from the residual heat of those wonderful feet, and from the mounting trepidation that was crawling its way up your spine.

To your relief, rather than become angry or distressed, Ruby just smiled gently, shifting her feet slightly in apparent nervousness that somehow managed to still be cute despite how much she towered above you. “Yes, I enjoyed it. And it doesn’t have to be some time, we can do some more now if you want. I just… needed a moment.” Her eyes shifted to the side evasively but the smile remained on her face. “Actually I was wondering if you wanted to…”
154232221131.title: Getting to Know Ruby’s Feet

choices: Accept Ruby’s offer wholeheartedly, become her pet and nothing more
Accept Ruby’s offer and work towards your eventual confession
Confess your love now, putting everything out in the open
1542322211311.content:
“Actually I was wondering if you wanted to see what my feet taste like.” Though she managed to force out the words without stuttering, Ruby blushed crimson as soon as she finished, drawing up her knees to obscure her face, and peeking over her kneecaps to gauge your reaction.

For your part you found yourself temporarily stupefied by the question, actually having to pinch yourself just to make sure you were still awake. All things considered you’d wanted the chance to lick her sweaty soles from the start, and now they were being offered to you without question. “Ye… Yeah! Definitely! Uh, I mean, if that’s really okay with you.”

Smiling in relief, Ruby extended her feet back over you, allowing the sweaty soles to hover just short of your face. “Of course. I suggested it after all. Go ahead…” She paused for a moment, as if seriously considering her next words, before apparently deciding to go with it anyway. “Dig in.”

You needed no further encouragement than that, immediately reaching up to gently coax her right sole a little lower before extending your tongue and taking a first tentative lick. You’d already gotten a taste of her sweat earlier when some of it had dripped onto your face, but the feeling of running your tongue along her sole was something altogether different. Even before you swallowed the first mouthful, just the feel of your tongue running over her warm flesh was already enough to drive you crazy. The salty texture set your taste buds buzzing and the feeling of the thick liquid running down your throat as you greedily gulped it down was one of the greatest things you had ever felt.

Though you’d dreamed of this before, you’d never really paused to consider what Ruby’s sweat would actually taste like, more interested in the action than the result. Surprisingly enough it was sweeter than you’d expected. It was still salty but it seemed the young huntress did not have an abundance of impurities to flush out of her system, possibly due to the sheer volume of her sweat. Good news for you since you’d already swallowed enough to make you sick otherwise.

Soon enough you’d lovingly tended to both soles and switched your attention to the toes, running your tongue along and between them, and happily lapping up the sweat together with the toe jam. Admittedly the grime was harder to swallow than the sweat and sat heavily in your stomach but you couldn’t bring yourself to care much. To you it still tasted better than anything you’d ever eaten before, and you started to press soft kisses to your crush’s toes in thanks for the meal.

Ruby bit her lip again as she looked down at you through the gaps between her spread toes, savouring the feeling of your tongue and the little kisses as you dutifully pampered her feet. Despite the influence of the rest of her team this was the first time she’d really turned her mind to whether or not she had a fetish for such things, or anything for that matter, but now that she was actually experiencing your ministrations she felt like she could really get used to this. The feeling of your hands had been bliss, but the feeling of your tongue was heaven itself.

“Hey.” Again a pause as Ruby waited for your attention. “Do you think maybe you want to make this a more permanent arrangement? I’ll keep you safe and in return you…” She wiggled her toes, briefly rubbing one of them against your face. “You tend to my feet. I could keep you in my boots when I’m too busy to tend to you personally, and when I’m free we could do more of this. You’d be like my own personal foot pet.” It wasn’t that she wanted to enslave you or anything, but she suddenly found herself deeply interested in the idea of having you tend to her feet on a more long-term basis.

You’d lost count already of the number of times today this girl had surprised you, yet this was easily the most surprised you’d been all day. Your first instinct was to immediately accept your idol’s suggestion, and devote yourself mind body and soul to the care of her feet, but you managed to contain yourself long enough to consider your other options. When you’d come to Beacon your goal had been to confess your love to Ruby, and even now you hadn’t yet lost sight of that goal. Maybe it would be better if you confessed now, lest your relationship become one of physical contact only, but then again maybe it was too soon for that and it would be better to take up the offer for now.

After consideration, you decide that the best course of action is to…
1542322211311.title: The Taste of Success

choices: Ruby heads back to the dorms and lets you out once she gets some privacy
Ruby goes about her day while keeping you in her boot, may forget about you
Shift the story forward two weeks, settled into your new role
15423222113112.content:
“Mistress… I humbly accept your offer.” You weren’t ready to throw away your chance at romance quite yet, but you also couldn’t turn down the opportunity to serve your goddess’s feet. Sure, your ultimate goal was to confess to Ruby, but there was no need to rush into it. By agreeing to be her pet for now you would not only get the chance to get closer to her but you’d be able to endear yourself to her enough that your chance of having your love accepted would go up significantly.

Ruby blushed at her impromptu title, but smiled widely nonetheless. If someone had told her this morning that by the end of the day she’d have a living breathing human as a tiny foot pet she’d probably have taken them to a hospital for possible head trauma, yet here she was looking down at her own personal servant as he returned to diligently pampering her soles and toes. “Mmm… good. Serve me well and I’ll make your life as comfortable as possible.” The brunette giggled at her own attempt at a regal tone, trying to get into her new found role as your master.

Content in your new arrangement and spurred on by your new owner’s words, you continued to tend to Ruby’s soles with your hands, tongue and lips as she sat back and enjoyed the sensations, the both of your drifting off into pleasurable thoughts as the minutes tick by.

After some time, Ruby noted that she really needed to get back to her team before they became suspicious, shooting you a devious smirk as she carefully snatched you up and held you over the opening of her left boot. “It’s time for you to go home for now. Make sure you head to the toe so you don’t get crushed.” Though she tried to maintain a persona of authority, she did pause long enough to receive your nod of approval before dropping you into the footwear.

A small part of you was worried that falling the length of the boot would lead to serious injury but as you landed on the moist insole you found yourself slightly winded but otherwise unharmed. You took a moment just to breath in the strong scent of sweat that surrounded you, before a sudden shadow reminded you that time was a factor. Glancing up quickly to see the toes of Ruby’s still bare foot descending into the boot, you quickly sprinted towards the toe-end, needing to tuck and role for the last few inches but successfully making your way to the very end of the boot.

Here the smell was even stronger than at the heel, leaving you surrounded on all sides by a thick miasma of lingering sweat and Ruby’s mild foot scent, not to mention the palpable heat that felt like a gentle sauna. You breathed in deep as the shadows around you grew darker and the grasping toes of your mistress filled your vision before falling upon you with gleeful enthusiasm.

Pulling the boot all the way on, Ruby smiled softly at the feeling of your tiny body as she gently dragged it into the grasp of her toes, pulling it up and into the crevice between the digits and her sole. She giggled at the feeling of the sweat pooling up from her insole as her foot pressed down, wondering just how badly soaked her little friend was going to get. Though a part of her was concerned at the possibility of drowning, the slight tickle she had come to recognise as the feeling of a tiny tongue running over her flesh reassured her that her pet was doing just fine.

Securing the other boot, Ruby pushed herself off the desk and onto her feet. Though she took care to ensure that her full weight did not fall on the toes of her left foot she was still aware of the sole sinking slightly deeper into the insole. Momentarily concerned, she clenched her toes down slightly, relieved to feel her new toy wiggling in response and the gentle kisses being pressed to her sole, before taking her first tentative step and striding out of the room with increasing confidence.

Far below, you found yourself surrounding by warm flesh and overflowing sweat, trapped in a constant cycle of weightlessness and crushing force as the mighty toes above you rose and fell. It would be an exaggeration to say that the pressure was pleasant, but it was worth it for the chance to keep worshipping your crush’s feet as she went about her day, and it didn’t seem like you were at any risk of being killed. Though who knew how long it would be until you got out.
15423222113112.title: New Role, New Experience

choices: Stick to the original plan and confess your love to Ruby (Reserved)
Forget about confessing and devote yourself fully to her feet
You have no choice, Ruby decides she likes you better as a slave
154232221131123.content:
That day’s trip in Ruby’s shoe ended up being the first of many, as you quickly found your place among your owner’s toes. You’d spent most of that day in the boot, playfully stroked by the huntress’s toes as she went about her business, before being released later that night for another round of worship out of sight of the other members of Team RWBY.

In the days that followed the two of you tested the limits of your newfound durability, quickly finding that you could take the full force of Ruby’s foot without being crushed, allowing you to be freely shifted between her sole and toes as she walked around the academy. Your nutritional requirements also appeared to have been reduced significantly, able to get by just on the sweat and toejam you were able to salvage from the brunette’s feet, supplemented by crumbs and such that Ruby would occasionally slip into her boots for you to enjoy.

You spent most nights squeezed between your goddess’s toes, lathering them with attention until both of you fell asleep, though a couple of nights had been spent rolled up in a used nylon if Ruby had to stay up particularly late or was otherwise too tired to play.

Although for the most part you were willing to try anything, the two of you had agreed that it was best if you weren’t in the boots for combat exercises and training. Even though you could take the pressure of many steps the amount of force that was exerted when Ruby ran with her semblance was enough to crack the ground itself, and there was no telling what that would do to you. On the other hand, you appreciated the affect her semblance had on her feet, and more than once had been given the honour of licking clean the intensely warm and sweaty soles that resulted.

Over time, the young huntress had become more and more actively involved in your worship sessions, moving from passively watching you pamper her soles to actively pressing you against them, squeezing you between her toes or rolling you between both sweaty soles like an oversized marble. Of course there were still plenty of occasions where she’d leave you to your own devices but you found yourself really enjoying it when she became a more active participant.

In this manner two full weeks had passed and you now found yourself once again tending to Ruby’s sweaty post-workout feet as she went over some last minute revisions for the next day’s classes. To the casual observer it would seem like she was ignoring you entirely, but the occasional shift in her toes to touch your head told you otherwise. Every while and then her eyes would flick down to look at you, and her lips would quirk up slightly as she returned to her work.

Meanwhile, you occupied yourself tending to her feet, inhaling the sweet scent as you pampered her precious soles with your hands and tongue. This was all second-nature to you by now, which gave your mind plenty of time to wander to more complex matters, such as where exactly you wanted your relationship with Ruby to go from here.

The two of you had certainly grown closer, so now might be your best opportunity to finally confess your true feelings and take a shot at being upgraded from foot pet to boyfriend. But on the other hand, you really had gotten used to your current role, and you couldn’t help but wonder if becoming Ruby’s boyfriend would actually be a demotion. If the two of you were dating then presumably you’d be doing other things than just tending to her feet, like going on dates and such, and that would mean an overall decrease in the amount of time you could spend pampering her soles and toes. Was that really what you wanted right now?
154232221131123.title: A Foot Pet’s Odyssey

choices: “…we pick up where we left off.” (intimate foot worship)
“…you give some attention to my [body part].” (writer’s choice)
“…I finally introduce you to the rest of my team.”
1542322211311231.content:
“Ruby.” You kept your voice relatively low, but your mistress had gotten used to hearing you by now so even that was enough to draw a curious gaze in your direction. You nearly faltered before those beautiful silver eyes but took a deep breath and forged onwards. “Can we talk seriously for a moment? Without any role play.”

Ruby’s eyebrow shot up and her lips quirked in confusion but she nodded slowly. “Okay. Is something wrong?” That was just like her. Even after everything that you’d done and the amount of times she’d happily rubbed you against her feet, she was still concerned for your safety. It was that kindness that had drawn you to her in the first place, and which now made your heart throb once again. You had to do this. There really was no other choice.

“Listen I… the truth is I came to this academy just to meet you. I tried to get in as a student and when I was rejected I snuck in instead, which ended up leading to my current state. I knew it was stupid, and I knew how much trouble I could get in, but I didn’t care. I just wanted to meet you.” You could see Ruby opening her mouth to respond but hurriedly cut her off, wanting to make your position clear. “I know I already said I was a fan but… it’s not just that. I’m not just a fan. I’ve idolised you since the first time I saw you on the news. You were so strong, and so kind, even though you were just a kid like me. Everyone said I was stupid, that nothing would ever come of it, but I… I had the hugest crush on you. It was all I could ever think about. That’s why I needed to meet you.”

You sighed and looked down, not trusting yourself to meet her eyes right now. “I’ll admit when I first came here I was just being foolish. I was just one of those guys who crushed on their idol from afar, without really knowing anything about you.” Mustering your courage you looked up, noting Ruby’s widened eyes and shocked expression. “But that’s not the case anymore. I know you now. Even if it’s just as your foot pet we’ve been together almost every minute of the last two weeks. And in that time my… my feelings have only grown stronger. It’s not just a crush anymore I… I think I really like you.” You paused to take a breath, once again diverting your gaze as the massive brunette continued to stare down at you. “I’ve really enjoyed being your foot pet, and it’s not like I want that to stop but… I would really appreciate it if you’d give me the chance to date you as well.”

The silence that dragged on from that point was suffocating, long seconds ticking by as you waited for the rejection you were increasingly sure was going to come. You realised too late that this had been a mistake. Obviously this girl who had reduced you to the status of a pet would have no interest in actually dating such a tiny pathetic thing as you. How stupid could you get?

While you suffered in silence, high above Ruby was having her own internal crisis. She’d never expected this, though in hindsight she realised that the signs had all been there. This little guy had said from the start that he was a fan and he’d happily accepted tending to her feet, so it really wasn’t much of a stretch at all that he’d have that kind of interest. And it wasn’t like it was something she didn’t have experience with. More than one guy had confessed to her over the last few years and her response had always been a polite thanks, but no thanks. It just wasn’t something she’d been personally interested in and, honestly, if this one had succeeded in his initial plan to meet with her and confess at full size then he would have received the same response.

But this was different. It would no longer be accurate to describe her little friend as a stranger. His physical intimacy with her feet aside, they’d spoken for hours. They’d become close. And Ruby would be lying if she said she didn’t hold significant affection for her tiny companion. She wasn’t sure if this affection was the same as that which had been directed towards her, but as she watched the clearly dejected boy turn to retreat further across the bed, she knew that she had to act. “Wait! I wouldn’t mind. Let’s do it, you know, let’s, err… let’s go out.” She blushed at her jumbled sentence.

Shocked, you felt your heart jackhammering in your chest as you spun to confirm what you had heard, blushing yourself at the incredibly embarrassed look you were met with. “Really! I… good, I really, thanks, err… I mean, please be good to me.” Wait, that wasn’t right.

For a long moment the two of you held each other’s gazes, blushing furiously, then Ruby giggled, her tight lips cracking into a smile as her shoulder’s hunched over. That was all it took to crack your composure as well and soon the two of you were laughing uncontrollably over your shared awkwardness. Your heart, which had been beating out of control, now felt light as you looked up at your frien… no, your girlfriend’s mirthful expression. “What now?”

Wiping briefly at her eyes as she finally managed to stifle her giggles, Ruby’s smile only widened as she considered the possibilities that now lay before you both. “How about…”
1542322211311231.title: True Feelings

choices: Ruby says: “I’d like you to meet my little boyfriend.”
Weiss says: “What’s with the stupid doll Ruby?”
Ruby says: “He’s going to be our new team foot pet.”
15423222113112313.content:
“How about I finally introduce you to the rest of my team.” Ruby smiled down at you and you enthusiastically nodded in response. Though your true crush was the team leader, you’d be lying if you said you didn’t have any interest in the other members of Team RWBY. They were all attractive in their own rights, and if the opportunity arose you’d be happy to tend to any of them, provided of course your girlfriend was comfortable with that.

“Good, because they should be back pretty soon.” Truth be told, Ruby had been a few moments away from dumping you back in your boot when you’d decided to make your confession, precisely because she was aware that her sister and friends would soon be returning. The three of them had headed into Vale earlier that morning for something or other, and though they’d invited their leader she’d politely declined with the excuse of needing to study.

Now though it was as if her words had summoned them forth and a soft click heralded the electronic lock on the door being released, the door swinging open to admit the room’s other occupants.

Yang entered first, holding the door for her two companions as they stepped inside. The last two years hadn’t changed the blonde as much as her sister. She’d gained a couple of inches and her muscles were somewhat more prominent then they had been previously but she was otherwise unchanged, her hair and chest as voluminous as ever and her smile still bright. Their day on the town had seen her don a simple checked flannel shirt, strategically undone just enough to show a tantalising amount of cleavage and complimented by a pair of loose jeans.

Blake followed her partner into the room and stood by her side as she waited for Weiss to enter. She hadn’t gained much height either, now just narrowly edging out Ruby as the second tallest member of the team, though like Yang she’d gained some more definition to her physique. Although her curves had remained static she still maintained the best butt on the team, crammed into some tight black slacks topped off with a properly buttoned shirt. The most significant change was that her ears were now uncovered, sitting up proudly from her long black hair as her perpetually calm gaze challenged anyone to take a shot at her heritage.

The last to enter the room was Weiss, her slender form slipping through the gap left for her by her teammates. Much to her own chagrin, the heiress hadn’t gained any height since she started at Beacon, and though she continued to wear heels to address this, she was now clearly the shortest member of the team, her head only coming to around the same height as Yang and Blake’s chests. Her physique had remained as slender as ever, shown off with a simple white dress and blue vest. At present she was wearing her hair down, allowing he long locks to run over her delicate shoulders.

You observed all of this from your perch on the edge of Ruby’s bed, aware of the deep shadow being cast over you as your newfound girlfriend leant forward to look down at her team. Though each of the girls glanced up as they entered, not even Blake paid enough attention to notice your miniscule form peering down at them as the three casually gathered at the centre of the room.

Of course, the first thing Weiss noticed was that her leader did not have her face buried in a book. “You better have been studying properly while we were out Ruby. If we don’t all pass the next test it will disrupt our mission schedule.” Hands on hips she looked at her partner with a stern expression, while Blake and Yang lost interest and started drifting back towards their own bunks.

Used to this by now, Ruby let the comment roll off her, responding with a simple wave of her hand as a broad smile crossed her face. “Never mind that. I’ve got something to show you guys.” Maintaining eye contact with her partner she reached down and snatched you up, catching the rest of her team’s attention as she hopped off the bed and displayed you proudly in her cupped hands.

Less than a second later you were looking up at three pairs of curious eyes as the older girls leaned in to see what Ruby had to show. Silence raining for a few moments before…

"Yup, he totally loves feet!" Ruby responded, still almost shouting so the whole dorm could hear.

"No please let me!" Yang interrupted.

"I'd also like to have a go with him if you don't mind Ruby," Blake asked their leader.

"Well, I think that he...
154232221131123133.title: The Team's Pet.

1542322211311231332.content:
"Well, I think that he should go with ___!"

The girl in question's face lit up with joy, taking you from the grasp of Ruby and into the palm of their right hand, the other taking off their shoes, the girl of course being:
1542322211311231332.title: -Should go with ___"

15423222113112313321.content:
Yang slowly peeled off her white socks, and excitedly sat down on her bed placing you before her toes. They had a fresh coat of yellow nail polish and smelled of lavender. She tilted her feet so that they faced upwards, revealing her somewhat sweaty soles. You couldn't believe it, they were slightly bigger, and less sweaty, but just as good as Ruby's.

While Yang was getting prepared to be pampered the youngest of the 4 switched on their game console, handing Blake and Weiss a controller each, and put in Lane Combatant, a side view fighting game. "How about this, the winner gets him next?"

"Prepare to lose Schnee." Blake confidently said, whilst selecting her favorite character.

"It is on Belladonna." The former heiress retorted.

Yang wiggled her toes, catching your attention. "Well buddy, gonna begin?" Yang teased, while poking you in the chest with her big toe, you quickly went to the nearest foot and started rubbing, causing Yang to moan with pleasure.

"ROUND TWO. FIGHT" blasted from the TV, Weiss had won the first round. "Prepare to eat your words, Blake!"

Yang was quite angered upon hearing this and decided to get a little revenge on this girl, Neon meanwhile hadn't been paying attention to Yang and instead went on a tangent about random things, this only fueled Yang anger as she dropped her on the floor with a squash."Hey what gives" Neon said in annoyance, only to be stepped on my Yang who was currently enraged.Yang stomped down on Neon over and over again reducing her to a blobb as she picked her up and cleaned her off a little wit a nearby water fountain.
