1543332.title: All teachers/adult relatives are shrunk

15433321.content:
Jacques Schnee was angry, then again that wasn't anything new. He was always angry in some compacity. If it wasn't White Fang stealing dust shipments from him, then it was Ironwood's dust embargo.

Day after day the world's number one dust industry leader was losing more and more money. Sure the SDC had more than enough profit to stay afloat, but the losses themselves were still infuriating for the CEO.

"Damn James and this damned embargo." Jacques seethed. He was currently trying to calm his nerves with a glass of wine. This what he normally did when he needed to take the edge off. Just him, his private study, and a cool glass.

As he took a sip of his wine he looked back at the paperwork that littered his desk. Seeing the redline of progress skewing downward only served to remind him why he was so frustrated to begin with. It was all James fault! He and his little tin toys couldn't protect Beacon themselves and now he was he one having to suffer for it!

If only he had a seat on the damn council. He'd send James and his army of failures packing. Maybe he'd do better playing shield for a backwater village somewhere?

Come to think of it... he could take his rebellious daughter Winter with him while he was at it. Damn brat.

Weiss was a bit of a rebel as well, but with the proper guidance and a little discipline, he could iron her out. Whitley was shaping up to fine man much like himself, why couldn't his other children be more like him? Then there was his wife, Willow. The less he thought about her the better. He just hoped he wouldn't find her passed out again on the floor with bottle in hand.

"Hmph!" The snow-haired CEO grunted. He took another swig before dumping the offending papers in a drawer. Just looking at them sickened him. "What to do now?"

An excellent question. He canceled all his appointments for the day, so he was essentially free. Weiss was locked away in her room, Whitely was probably cooped up in the Schnee library, Willow was no doubt in the gardens, and Winter was off with Ironwood somewhere last he checked.

He gripped his glass tighter as he polished off his wine. Maybe he'd go for a walk around the premises. He still did that from time to time. Maybe he'd even put a few of those 'animals' in their place while he was at it. Those mutants were always good for a laugh.

With his mind made up, the Schnee patriarch rose to his feet to take a walk. But not before pouring himself one more glass for the trip. He took a long sip before making his way into the hall. As he did he began to feel rather strange.

"That's odd. I suddenly don't feel to..." His sentence halted as a bizarre aftertaste struck his taste-buds. He looked back at the wine in his hand before his vision suddenly went dark. The last thing he heard was the sound of shattering glass.

After nearly an hour, the aging CEO began to awaken. He groaned in discomfort as he wasn't used to sleeping on a hardwood floor. He was a Schnee damn it! Schnee slept on the finest bedding possible. "Where...?"

The propped himself up on his knees before taking a look around. What he saw nearly made his heart stop. Everything around him was so... big! This was one of many hallways in Schnee manor, and knew this one intimately as it lead to his office.

"I-Impossible!" Jacques stuttered. His breathing began to grow heavy as he continued to take in his surroundings. Looking behind him he could see the shattered remains of his wine glass. Even shattered it stood above him. He had somehow shrunken. Either that or the world just got bigger. But he knew deep down it was the former and not the latter.

Just how small was he? If had to guess, a 1/2 inch maybe? He was a damn bug!

"No! No! No! No! No!" The ant-man panicked.

That's when he felt it. The largest tremor in recorded history. The shockwave was so powerful it sent him falling on his back. That was going to be sore in the morning.

Another tremor....

…and another!

Again and again the ground quaked. There was rhythm to it. Could it be? Nervously the mite of a man looked up towards the sky and what he saw made his jaw drop. Fear filled his very sole as he saw the giant form of...
15433321.title: Downsizing Jacques

choices: Weiss remains unaware and steps on Jacques
154333211.content:
Weiss Schnee was not in a good mood. But then again how could she be being back at Schnee manor? This place was more of a prison than it was a happy home. Here the Schnee's were cut off from the rest of the world and her father was seemingly the only one entering and exiting as he pleased.

Ever since she ''returned'' to this place, and she used the world loosely, she'd been constantly reminded why she left. Her mother's over reliance on the sauce, her brother's barely hidden resentment, and her father's manipulative and controlling nature. All of these things were major factors in her decision to got to Beacon.

Instinctively the Schnee heiress's finger traced down the scar by her eye. It was just another reminder of her initial decision and her success. Success that had now been flushed down the toilet as Beacon was now in ruins and she was back to square one. All of her hard work was now meaningless.

Well, maybe not completely meaningless. She might still be able to do some good, hence why she was striding to her father's office. The man was suborn to a fault and almost never listen to anything she wanted, but he had the resources to do a great many things. If she could just convince him to give her a platform to tell her story about the events that transpired at Beacon Academy then just maybe...

Her thoughts soon halted as she cut a corner. Something was very out of place about this picture. This was the hallway that lead to her father's private study, so why was there a broken glass in the center of the hall? And... was that red wine staining the carpet?

Something clearly wasn't right here. "The servants would never let something like this escape their notice."

It was the truth, they really wouldn't under the threat of her father's fury. This must have been broken recently then. If so then that meant her father must really be in a bad mood. Although she'd never seen the man break anything, even in his foulest of moods. He opted to take out his frustrations on his family instead.

She wanted to write this off as her father being pissed off, but the huntress in her said otherwise. Though her stint at Beacon may have been brief, she'd learned to trust this feeling. With her curiosity piqued, the snow-haired girl began to investigate. She crouched down over the scene and began examining the glass. She never even noticed the "bug" at her feet.

-----

Jacques was practically screaming as Weiss crouched down over the scene. Her heel had nearly killed him. If he hadn't jumped out the way when he did... he didn't even want to think about it. He was so insignificant now that anyone could step on him and be none the wiser.

Besides that however, he could still hardly believe how massive Weiss was. Her colossal form took up ninety-nine percent of his vision. That scared him, but at the same time this might have been fate presenting him with an opportunity. He had survived his youngest daughter's footfalls and now she was positioned right in front of him. If he could somehow grab her attention then she could get him some damn help.

Jacques hated relying on others, but even he knew he was going to need help on this one. He just couldn't wrap his brain around how all this happened. Was this the result of one of those cursed semblances? Or was this something more? He did distinctly remember a bizarre aftertaste he received from his wine. Was he poisoned? Did someone poison him? If so then who? Who dared to try and poison him? One of those sub-human faunus no doubt.

"Damned animals!" Jacques seethed.

He'd worry about them later. For now had to try and get his daughter's attention. Looking at her hunched over form, he tried to think of the way to go about doing that. He could try screaming and waving his arms. Childish, but it just might do the trick.

He could also try climbing her until he reached her ear. If he made it there then their was no question she'd be aware of his presence. But if she started moving while he was climbing then who knows what could happen. This idea was very risky.

Jacques cursed. "Damn it all!"

He took a deep breath... and made his move.
154333211.title: The Towering Heiress

choices: Jacques loses his grip and is flung somewhere
1543332112.content:
Jacques really didn't like this, but what choice did he have? Yelling and waving his arms had net him nothing, so that left only one other option. The SDC CEO gulped nervously as he stared down the enormous heel of his daughter. The very same heel that almost killed him not five minutes ago.

If he wanted to get help he was going to have scale it and by extension the rest of his daughter. The older man felt the sweat beginning to form on his brow as he eyes the large blue footwear. His gaze soon followed up the rest of the way to where his daughter remained stationary. If he was really going to do this, now was the time.

The mini CEO moved in closer and felt his heart begin to hammer in his chest. It was obvious he didn't want to do this, but the situation was now out of his hands. This was life or death, do or die. He cautiously reached out his hand and felt the smooth surface of the heel. It would be a difficult climb, but he could manage. He was a Schnee damn it!

"Okay." Jacques breathed. "Here we go."

He reached up and began his climb. He stared from the toe section as it would be the easiest place to start. Hopefully Weiss would be moving anytime soon. She seemed to be lost in thought about something. What that something was he didn't really care. All he hoped was that it would keep her occupied ling enough for him to make some real headway.

While this was going on, Weiss was lost in her own head. Nothing about this made any sense? For anyone else a broken glass would be nothing, but her family was far from normal. There had to be some great piece to the puzzle here that she was missing? There just had to be. Her instincts were practically screaming to her something was amiss.

Alas she just couldn't figure out what it was. Maybe it would do well for her to forget about the spilled wine and broken glass and come back to it later. Either that or just inform one of the servants that there was a mess down the main hall. With a sigh, Weiss began to stand.

This action didn't go unnoticed by Jacques as the shadow that loomed over him began to recede. Fearfully the man looked up to see his mountain of a daughter had finished her investigation. This wasn't good. He'd just reached the top of her foot. If she started walking now then... "Oh no!"

With a force Jacques never knew existed, he found himself flung onto the straps of his daughter's massive heel. She must have turned around or something. Had it not been for his aura he would have no doubt been turned into a blood smear. His eyes then widened as he felt a sudden weightlessness.

Weiss had started walking!

"No! No! Weiss, don't!" Jacques pleaded. Unfortunately for him his voice was too small to register. Higher and higher he ascended into the air as Weiss raised her foot. In this moment it appeared as if the world around him was moving in slow motion. Perhaps this was karma's way of messing with him for being a "resourceful" business man.

The feeling of weightlessness hung in the air for another minute... then time resumed. It was as if someone had cut the wire of an elevator and left it freefalling down the shaft. His world was rapidly descending at speeds that rivaled that of a bullhead. He hung on to the heel straps for dear life as he silent prayed.

Soon he was met with an earth shattering bang. The sheer power of the tremor left his bones rattling. How in the seven hells had his body not shattered!? Shouldn't his bones and muscles been torn apart from such force!? How the hell was he still alive, not that he was complaining.

The weightless feeling returned... and the cycle repeated itself.

Weiss had no idea that her father was struggling for dear life from such an action as simple as walking. Regardless, she remained unaware of his predicament and continued down the hall to his office. Each step she took only put her miniscule father in pore peril. Each time her foot connected with the ground the man his grip threating to loosen. If let go now he'd be flung off somewhere or worse!

Looking down the insignificant patriarch of the Schnee family could see what the or worse was. There was a thin gap bellow him that he was just small enough to squeeze through. If he fell down there then he would be face to face with Weiss bare foot.

"Oh. My. God." Jacques cringed in fear. No matter what he couldn't let go. He just had to hang on until Weiss reached his office. Once she reached his door she would stop to knock and he could use those precious seconds to right himself. He just needed to hang on. He would not fall and die like this...

He was a Schnee goddamn it!

1543332323.content:
It was another day in the city of Argus as a couple of two woman, Saphron and Terra had decided to have a relaxing day together. With their son Adrian being watched by a babysitter, the two ladies had the whole day completely to themselves.

As they walked through the city, gently holding hands, they made there way across the street, deciding to start their day with a walk in the city park, unfortunately it seemed fate other plans as the two woman were splashed in the face with a bunch of dust that some person who had been working at the dust shop was throwing out, only for part of the dust in the bag to get blown out into the woman's faces.

"Aggh, what the heck was that?!" Terra complained taking off her glasses to wipe of the excess dust, *cough* "It's seems like some type of dust blown by the wind" Saphron said also in a bit of annoyance. The two ladies were about to walk over to the shop and complain to the employee who had carelessly gotten them covered with dust only to feel weird as the world seemed to get bigger.

"W-what's.. Happening" Sapghron said as she felt her body and clothes slowly start to shrink. "I'm not sure it must be a side effect of that dust" Terra exclaimed also surprised as her body also got smaller. Before the two woman new it they were shrunk down to 2 inches tall much to their shock and concern.

"Oh goodness we've have been made tiny!" Terra shouted in panic as Saphron walked towards her with words to try and calm her down. "Wait, don't panic, we just need to talk to the person at the dust shop, I'm sure they know of some type of dust that can restore us to normal".

However upon saying this the two Moms suddenly heard a loud sound as they looked behind them fear as a crowd as people passed by. This of course was a cue for the woman to run as they ran away from the crowd, unfortunately their small size made out running the footfalls ineffective as a shoe hovered over and slammed down on the two ladies.

"WAIT!!-" Saphron shouted before the large shoe crushed her, "SAPHR- ACK" Terra shouted before another came and trampled her too. Upon being crushed however the woman learned the other affect the dust now had on them, not only were they small but it seemed to increase the durability of their body and seemingly made them squishy as the two Moms were simply flattened under the soles of the shoes.

This hardly made the experience better as after being crushed they then were pulled up with the shoe and slammed on the hard concrete sidewalk with various squashing and splat sounds, this process repeated over and over until the two females detached from the shoe surprisingly right next to each other as they look ahead and now saw where they had landed...

Volume 5 spoilers obviously...

It had been awhile after the battle at haven and Ruby and the others( now dubbing themselves RNJRWBY though still not sure how to add Qrow and Oscar/Ozpin to the team name) had been resting and reconciling with eachother, catching up with what they had all been up to.

One night while sleeping the group of 7 had been covered in a mysterious mist, which slowly shrunk each of them down to a few inches in height, while also making their bodies squishy. After a few hours the group of teens woke up only to find themselves in a cardboard container.

"Where are we?" Ruby said with a yawn, haven been quite tired from having a rough night,"Ugh why does it feel like I slept on cardboard" Weiss groaned as she groggily got up."Well maybe that's because you did sleep on cardboard" Jaune replied noticing the cardboard walls of the container they were in."Weird, it's almost like we're in a giant cardboard box or the we shrunk and were in a normal sized cardboard box" Ren mentioned, not knowing that he was quite on the nose with his shrunk in a cardboard box comment.

Where was the tiny RNJRWBY at...
1543333312.title: Volume 4-6 after the fall of beacon

choices: Roman Torchwicks former right hand woman Neapolitan
15433333121.content:
Despite being shrunken and supposedly captured, they hadn't been to far from where they were at, only being a short while away from the bedrooms that they had slept in. Not only that but besides Yangs robo arm, they didn't have their weapons leaving them mostly defenseless against whom ever had happened to find them.

After thinking about their situation team RNJRWBY had decided to try and get out of the box that they had been captured in. Using the combined abilities of Yangs strength and Jaune aura amplification, the group was able to bust open the roof of the room they were in only to see...
15433333121.title: Founded by someone but who?

choices: A girl( Weiss, Blake or Nora)
154333331211.content:
The group of tiny teens were quite shocked upon seeing the woman who was staring down at them, it was non other than Neapolitan or Neo for short the right hand woman of Roman torchwick was towering above them.

Now at first the team of friends were quite angered to see Neo, realizing that it was her who had kidnapped them, preparing to give the woman with Neapolitan hair a piece of there mind for capturing them only to also realize that they had also been shrunken by Neo based on how she was towering above them, even having a new outfit for the occasion( Neos current outfit for reference).

This made the team of friends quite worried upon knowing that they had been shrunk and captured and without their weapons and with them only being a few inches tall they knew they had no chance at fighting back against Neo, though they atleast had to try.l to defend themselves.

"What the hell, why did you do this to us" Yang said in anger as she cracked her fists ready to punch Neo if she tried anything. With Neo being mute however she didn't reply and instead just silenty laughed to herself at the pitiful attempt from the tiny blonde trying to intimidate her.

Neo personally felt that she had no reason to explain herself after what problems they had caused her and Roman in the past, besides once Neo found out about a special dust that could shrink things, she just couldn't resist using it to shrink and capture the group of teens who had caused her so much trouble in the past, along with the fact that it made the shrunken beings squishy, therefore giving Neo a bunch of toys that could feel pain but wouldn't die to torment.

The tiny RNJRWBY tried complaining to Neo in an attempt to get her to return to normal only for there complaints to go to silence as Neo snatched up the tiny Ruby Rose, wanting to torment the young girl first and to let all of them know of the hell they were gonna be put through.

"HEY YOU BITCH LET MY SISTER GO" yang screamed in anger this caused Neo to turn her attention away from the small Ruby and instead bring it towards her enraged sister, who she casually just squashed with her hand, leaving the rest of RNJRWBY utterly terrified as they saw there friend get so effortlessly squashed without mercy, making Ruby in particular start to tear up at seeing what she assumed was the death of her big sister.

Only for Neo to bring her hand up, revealing a flattened Yang Xiao Long who she casually peeled up and started playing lime a stress toy doing the same to Ruby as she closed her other hand as she compressed the sisters into mush, as their friends looked in horror seeing the torture that Neo was inflicting on them. It seemed that Neo didn't want to kill them she just wanted to make them her personal stress toys for life.

After a few minutes of squashing the sisters, Neo decided that she was done with them for the time being, squashing them together into a gooey ball and throwing the sister ball into her mouth as she chewed them like gum, looking down to see which tiny she'd make her next toy.

Eventually Neo had decided having also blown a bubble with the to mashed together sisters which she popped before inhaling the gooey mass into her mouth to chew up again, Neo had decided that for her next toy she would choose...
154333331211.title: Captured by Neo

1543333312111.content: Neo moved her hand down to pick up one of the men as her next toy, but who does she grab...
1543333312111.title: A boy( Jaune or Ren)

choices: Another one of the tiny teens
15433333121112.content:
The group of friends tried to fight back against the hand that was looming over them, to stop Neo from trying to grab one of them to make her next toy, but to no avail as Neo had snatched up Ren and closed her palm on the small boy, leaving the group quite angered to see their friend get taken away, especially for Nora who was enraged to see her man get stolen from her.

Neo looked at the small little boy as she squeezed her fist tight to squash the little boy in her hand, before playing with him however Neo decided to spit out her pieces of chewing gum in her other hand, leaving the Red and Yellow blob of the 2 sisters on a nearby counter so that she could know where they were for later.

After doing this she turned her full attention to the boy in her hand, who was currently oozing between her fingers due to her tight grip, wanting to get more active on her toy, Neo had brought her hands together as she squeezed the boy tightly between her palms, rubbing them together to really smear the small Ren flat.

Neo then changed from smearing the little boy to stretching him, grabbing a size of him with both palms and stretching him out, making Ren groan in agonizing pain over the torture as Neo basically tried to rip him apart.

During her fun though a loud voice came out at her,"HEY YOU BITCH LET GO OF MY MAN" Nora screamed at Neo, making Neo roll her eyes as she brought her hand down to grab the little Nora to punish her for misbehavior only for the little Nora to try to bite her finger in retaliation as Neo brought her hand away for a moment, now deciding a more direct approach as she pulled her hand back and quickly slammed in down on Nora giving the girl no time to react as she was squash flat.

Upon pulling her hand up she then peeled Nora up as the others tinies quickly rushed to Nora's aid, grabbing a part of Nora body to try and stop Neo from taking another one of them as her next toy, but once again, no matter how hard they tried it led to no success as Neo claimed Nora as her next toy.

Having 2 squishy blobs her hands, Neo then decided to put them in a place where she'd be able to keep track of them, dropping the two blobs on a table as she took her boots of before grabbing the squashed tinies and putting them both in her boots one for each boot as she reinserted her foot, standing up and stomping down on her new insoles as she looked at her toys.

Neo thought for a moment should she get another one of the tiny teens to be her next toy or should she return her attention to the squashed sisters, it didn't take long for Neo to make her decision as she decided.

Who would Neo play with next...
15433333121112.title: Squishy little Ren

choices: Add Weiss and Blake to the Blob
154333331211121.content:
Neo wiggled her toes, feeling the two tinies she had stuck in spread across her soles. They were very comfortable on her feet. Neo then plucked the red and yellow wad of gum off of the countertop, carefully looking over it. A smirk formed on Neo's lips as she watched the wad start to wiggle, the two sisters desperately trying to escape and get unstuck.

Neo promptly flattened the blob between her hands. They were sisters, they deserved to be stuck together. Neo began to knead, stretch, and squish the blob of red and yellow. Ruby and Yang would scream if either had functioning mouths, the pain of being squished and molded by the mute was far from even plesant, but it was at least preferable to being chewed like gum.

Neo's fingers finally stopped their torment as she looked at the ball in her hands, her smile growing wider.

The putty had lost the look of clashing yellow and red, now looking like a lovely shade of orange. The mute knew that it would take the sisters a very long time to get unstuck. Neo began kneading the orange blob in her hands, wondering what to do next...
154333331211121.title: Ruby and Yang

154333331212.content: Terra and Saphron stumble upon the box and decide to have fun with the occupants.

1552.title: Someone or Multiple People?

choices: Descend into an endless series of choice chapters.
15521.content:
Ruby's silver eyes slowly blinked open as the sunlight forced it's way through the dorm's curtains. She whined to herself as she slowly sat up, really wanting to just fall back asleep. She kicked her blankets back, letting out a yawn.

Unbeknownst to the young girl, nobody in Beacon would be doing the same thing as her today. They had all turned into various objects throughout the school, some of which were even in the room with her.

As she hopped down from her bunk, she was surprised to notice nobody else in the room.
"Did they forget to get me up?" She asked herself, stretching her arms into the air. Figuring she was late for whatever was planned today, the silver-eyed girl slipped her pajamas off, putting some panties on. The pleading screams of the soul within the fabric went unheard as she slipped her legs through the holes, pulling them up.

---------------------------------------------------

Yang found herself in a heap on the floor. As she tried to push herself up, she was horrified to find that movement was impossible. She cried out for help, unaware that her voice didn't exist anywhere but in her mind. She continued to shout as her 'little' sister entered her fixed field of view, she was enormous! Yang shut her eyes as she recognized that the giantess was getting dressed, still calling out to her.

"Now, where are my socks?" She heard the large voice, continuing to call out to her sister regardless, "There's one," She heard Ruby again as a large hand curled around her, lifting her into the air. Yang tried to fight the grip, but she still found herself unable to move. Her eyes opened as she felt warm breath on her front, she stared into her disinterested silver eyes.

"Ruby!" She screamed, but the lack of expression on her sister's face proved that she was going unheard. Yang felt air rush past her as she was brought down, her panic heightening as she saw flexing toes before her. Her screaming stopped briefly as she felt Ruby's limb force her body apart, the feeling made her 'skin' crawl, it was horrible. Then, the realization came, it kept her just as stunned as the feeling did, she was her sister's sock.

The sock-girl cried out as she felt the pressure of Ruby's foot press onto her, she tried everything she could to squirm away, but it proved futile. She slowly stopped screaming as the hopelessness of her situation dawned on her.

---------------------------------------------------

"I'm too late to find a clean one," Ruby murmured to herself as she noticed her other sock just poking out from under another bed. She slipped it on just as carelessly as the last, before going over to the drawers for a bra.
15521.title: Lucky Miss Rose

choices: Blake has transformed into one of her boots.
155211.content:
Ruby pulled open her drawer, taking out the first bra she saw.

--------------------------------------------

Weiss Schnee had awoken in a pitch black room, her movement completely gone. The young heiress called for help, her lonely ordeal only lasting for about five minutes before light poured into the room. She tried to look around, finding that her head was fixed in place, looking up in the air.

She let out a scream as the cheery face of her team leader entered her field of view. Feeling a force pressing around her, she was lifted into the air, feeling her immobile body flop around the centre of the force. Of course, the girl's expression remained neutral, she hadn't been hearing this?

"Ruby! Let me down!" She demanded, but the silver-eyed girl didn't listen.

--------------------------------------------

Ruby quickly put her bra on, before taking her dress from another closet. Now hurrying, she put it on, figuring that her teammates would be waiting for her. She adjusted her dress a little, before hurrying over to the cookie jar she kept at her desk, one would have to do as a hasty breakfast. The young girl wolfed her breakfast down.
"Just need my boots and Crescent Rose," She murmured to herself, as if ticking off a mental checklist.
155211.title: Ruby's Late Morning

info.brief_description: Shrink and object transformation- RWBY- What more can you want?!
info.description:
RWBY Shrink/ Transformation!

For anyone that doesn't know what RWBY is, check it out on roosterteeth.com or look at a wiki.

HELLO! Welcome to the first RWBY interactive shrink story on writing.com! I'm amazed there isn't already one out there! Sorry in advance to the creators of the show >_< This would probably be pretty darn weird if you see this interactive!

Anyway, the characters are listed here: http://rwby.wikia.com/wiki/RWBY/Characters



MAIN CHARACTER CANT DIE, at least not in the first couple of chapters, when crushed they just flatten out or something.

A Few Small Rules! <Sorry!>-

This is just for writers, I don't want to put anyone off buuuuut there are a few things I want to keep out of the story-

1. The main character can't die unless specified in the starting text. The default as a whole- flatten out and stretch- kind of thing. Vore deaths are an exception-

2. OC's- I don't want a tiny OC running in to save the day- try and stick with the main cast as much as possible, perhaps throwing in a random student here and there without going into it too much. This includes naming the nameless main character in the stories where you play yourself (Sorry if you wished to be female in these chapters, it's not possible to make a 100% blank canvas character)

3. I won't allow diapers- it's just not my cup of tea.

4. Transformations are object based only! Sorry if you came here for Age regression or something like that!

5. Toilet stuff, fart and such, are allowed but only if you add a bold T to the title of the chapter. Not everyone likes that stuff

6. Try and keep it fairly close to cannon at the start of stories/ try and keep shippings subtle. I've allowed a few arks to go up with this before I made the rule as the contents pretty good but I don't want a shipping war spread across the interactive ^_^

7. No unbirthing- insertions fine, going into the womb is fine, but turning into a baby is classed as age regression to me :P

8. Finally- small chapters or chapters that I feel aren't good enough shall be deleted if I think it doesn't fit. I'll also block off chapters if I think it's going to go into a constant stream of 'How about this character?' with a bunch of empty chapters in between.

Hope the rules don't put you off! Any questions and such, please don't hesitate to message me :P

Special thanks to: Azazel8 for adding many awesome additions
